title: Go.Learn
description: Go Learn empowers learners to access learning content at any time, anywhere. View courses, learning plans and shared content, while tracking your progress both online and offline. Access your content using channels, or upload your own photos or videos from your mobile device to share with others across your organization.
descriptionHTML: Go Learn empowers learners to access learning content at any time, anywhere. View courses, learning plans and shared content, while tracking your progress both online and offline. Access your content using channels, or upload your own photos or videos from your mobile device to share with others across your organization.
summary: Learning on the go

scraped_reviews.content: Atrocious. If I had no other choice than to use this app, I wouldn't. EVERY time I need to get into my lms, I need to uninstall and reinstall the app or it never loads. It's insanely slow and glitches out in the middle of videos, causing me to again uninstall and reinstall. Doesn't matter if I'm on wifi or not. Doesn't matter if I log out before closing the app. if you are a facility looking to use this service, DON'T.

it doesn't work properly on any of my devices. and I've had to complete a mandatory course more than 10 times and it still won't acknowledge I've completed it. it won't even save your progress, so I've had to start from the beginning every single time. this is one of the worst learning platforms I've ever been required to use. I'm so over it!

The app itself is probably fine, but some of my company's learning modules fail to complete or are displayed improperly in the app. Most of them work fine with major Android web browsers, and virtually all of them work as intended with desktop Chrome, Firefox, etc. It is difficult to recommend this app if a company laptop/workstation is an option, but it is usable when necessary.

This is worse than the app that we used to use to do our caregiver learning on.buttons do not display right. Whether it's on your telephone or your tablet, you cannot read the information because there is no pinch in zoom. How are you supposed to answer the questions correctly? It's ridiculous, it's gonna take me 20 hours to do 12 hours of training just because of all the glitching. If I could give it a 0 stars I would.

Doesn't work, never saves completed courses. I completed a few courses that my employer requires me to renew and my course completion date doesn't update. This happens on my phone and tablet. I went on the website and set it to desktop mode and I successfully completed the courses there, so the issue is 100% the app not saving course completion.

App doesn't work. The app will launch the "Overview" screen, which in a regular browser, will prompt a new window to open and begin playing the lesson. In this app, however, it just stays on the overview screen and never actually launches the lesson.
buggy laggy mess that my company forced me to download to do trainings. it is horribly optimized, so a 20 minute test will take you an hour waiting for things to load.

The app frequently gives network connectivity issues even when I am on a broadband wifi network. So I just decided to download the courses. Now after completing the courses I am unable to uninstall the courses. Any help/ guidance would be appreciated.

the video texts are so incredibly small when on mobile. and when doing a video that requires placing items in correct order or moving answers to match others is almost impossible. I think we should be able to access out pay stubs from here like before. greenshades is NOT user friendly.

Very frustrating. The screen goes white with an arrow at the top left screen which does nothing. Tried restarting my phone, but the solution is always the same. Uninstall the app, lose all your data, and then reinstall and have to download again if your lesson is still available. This is the 4th time I have had to do this. Wish it would just sign me out so I could sign back in, but the screen just freezes and remains that way.

Does NOT save progress! I spent over an hour doing a study session provided by a college and all I did was go to a previous page and all my work was forgotten. I had over 75% completed and it just forget it all. On my computer it saves my progress, this app does not. When I completed a separate class, I could not save or exit the screen and lost all my hard work from that aswell. Please fix this, it's absurd.
This app is terrible. my organization uses it for morning check lists. I use the mobile app for convenience, but 99% of the time the app will not load my checklist page.

Not sure if it's the agency I work for or the app itself, but courses are glitchy and badly programmed. Some courses don't even use the next button and ask you to back out and physically begin the next chapter, only for no credit to be given or progress to be saved. Just use whatever website alternative you were given instead.
When i go to type the URL, the keyboard instantly minimizes after popping up for a fraction of a second and I cant type. It does this every single time I click on the text box. This app is worthless

Not a good app zero stars! It doesn't allow you to login at all! To use i-car on your phone or tablet: go to those 3 dots in the corner that brings up your bookmarks and other options etc when in Google. Check box next to desktop site. Then the mobile app page pops up. Go into your history tab after it pops up and click on the page I-car LMS training. The same page pops up again but, go to 3 dots check box again and reload page. You should see your modules now. FYI I had to do this for Android.

It's slow and unresponsive, but by far the most frustrating thing about this app is it does not record your progress. If you leave during the middle of a course, expect to start over from the beginning. If you are actually able to complete a course, expect to start over from the beginning. Want an actual website to log into in order to complete your courses? Apparently it doesn't exist. Looking for assistance with this bug infested app? Apparently that doesn't exist either. Terrible experience.

Won't work on any of my devices except my smartphone, which is extremely frustrating as I don't want to use my phone for a big course. And I shouldn't have to purchase a whole new device because this app is ridiculously limited with which device it will work from. Maybe if I leave a negative review on the actual course, they might decide to dit h this app and go with another app. Go Learn is absolutely useless.

It does the basics it needs to and plays video well. The "gamification" doesn't seem to have a purpose/fun. The big point off is that it doesn't have a persistent log in. I'm not at all worried that someone is going to break into my phone to... Watch SHRM on demand webinars. It stops me from using it and I suspect it encourages others to set an easy, less secure, password.

I would have given it 5 star but I keep having issues signing in on my phone. It doesn't want me to sign it. It says there is an error however when I can sign in on my iPad most of the time but at times it still gives the same error for no reason. I don't like it at all when I have work undone for my classes. Please fix it. Thank you.

It's fair to update comments to absolutely useless app and a waste of space on your phone. The updates haven't fixed these issues it doesn't empower to access your learning via my certification, it's false advertising. Frustrating when the my certification link tells you that it's not supported by the mobile app, what's the point of installing the app then if the link doesn't work lol. Back testing should be done before launching the product.

Not good for androids. It was perfect for first use. Then after that, it has many bug issues from screen not loading, profiles not opening, videos don't play, randomly shuts down. But apparently people who has it on apple says there's nothing wrong with theirs. Not cool & our company is losing money from inactivity since switching to this app & waiting for go.learn to fix the bugs.

No admin functionality but the app works well for what it is. Our users can get in and out quickly. I will also say, it requires a bit of a learning curve to get everything programmed properly. I see lots of reviews about blank pages - that's on the admin side but it's tricky. The mobile app and the desktop/pc/web versions function a bit differently and you have to get your head around that. Lot's of trial and error. Some pages just don't work on mobile. I recently found out you can't display a basic html table with no attributes on mobile. It just didn't work. If we could get admin functions and a truly responsive experience - so that all pages work on desktop/tablet/mobile - this would be five stars. It's really 3.5 but rounding up because the core functions work properly and the end user experience can be simplified so that they go right where you want them to. A pretty good first effort. Time for v2.

Awful app! I get really far into the risk assessments for my work then it glitches out and takes me right back to almost the start of it all, when the thing should take 1 hour to complete takes almost 2 hours and still not finished. So I just exited it and I'll tell my managers that I won't be doing them. Thing is I've tried the app on my phone and on my tablet and both don't work well. Needs fixing. Unresponsive! It's a pain!

"Don't blink. Don't even blink. Blink and your test is dead. This app crashes fast. Faster than you can believe. Don't turn your back, don't look away and Don't Blink! Good Luck." This app crashed no less than 3 times while trying to do an exam- including one time on the final question- and wiped out my answers every time. I hadn't moved off the exam the entire time, had been answering questions quickly but it still crashed with no explanation. Worse than useless.

The app has evolved a lot, and although you do not have all the options that you have on the browser, the app makes learning easier. With the learn offline option, you do not have to worry about having an internt connection or using your internet data to learn.

I tried several times, but the app doesn't open the learning platform with CORRECT login details and worse still, it doesn't let it open on the browser...login automatically redirects to the app on my tab. I am so frustrated as I'm unable to continue my course during my trip. It wasted my precious time.

I am experiencing difficulties with this app. The modules keep freezing up in the middle of the course. I have had to reinstall the app twice now in order to get the modules to play properly. Very frustrating! This should not be do difficult to use.

Doesn't work from a few hours after logging in initially. When I open it thereafter, 'Offline Content' is the only option and it is empty despite having downloaded content and there's no way to access any content. Only solution is to completely reset the app.

This app has been helpful for our training efforts with customers of our products and services, particularly since we work with customers in industrial environments where not everybody has easy access to a computer, and people may literally not have a computer or a desk. Being able to do stuff on their phone means they have access to training materials when they're on the plant floor, or wherever/whenever it's most convenient for their needs.

Sucks!!!! Won't load unless I install and uninstall app time and time again. Also, got to keep logging in everytime I take a short break from a webinar. Waste a lot of time!!!! I need this on the go to earn certification credits ASAP.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lesley D, we appreciate you taking the time to provide the feedback and are sorry to hear about your experience. We continue to make modifications and updates to the app and hope that the response time continues to improve as we make those changes.

scraped_reviews.content: Will be happy to change the rating, I can't get onto the site. I completed the registration. Got the confirmation Email but the link sends me to the old site so I can't log in. Since it hasn't been confirmed (I tried before this review) to copy and paste, log on using my credentials; says they are wrong; opening it in my brower and in the app. please either fix this or tell me what I'm doing wrong. I did pit the correct url in so it's not that its the last step before logining in.

this app is a pain. I'm trying to watch modules and cant proceed until I take a test after each one. Well I'm in the 3rd one and it wont allow me to take the test!! I've watched and re watched the video to proceed and the the button says press here to take the test and its FROZEN!!! I need to do these in a timely fashion and CANT CAUSE ITS FROZEN. I've deleted and reloaded the app and NOTHING!! Anyone else have any suggestions????

I cannot login I used three different operating systems Windows than Android and Apple I use three different browsers in each operating system would not accept my password try to reset password to send link to my email it did not send a link to my email to reset password this is absolutely the worst app that I have ever installed. I do not think I have ever given a app a one-star review before if it would allow me to remove all the stars and give it a zero star review I would
Doesn't load half the time and does not save progress. uninstall
pretty slow. no responsive at all

After downloading the app it kept asking for a URL but absolutely nothing worked, even copy and pasting from my employers original email. I have downloaded this app 3 times and all 3 times I have been given the same error message.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Platform URL
Hi April Davidson, Your platform URL comes from your platform Administrator, not from the Go.Learn app. Please reach out to your Admin directly for your platform URL. You can then login to your learning platform, and we hope youâ€™ll then take time to leave a thoughtful review of your experience using your Go.Learn app. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I literally wish I could put zero stars. The single handed most worthless unusable app of all time. After you spend an entire day of trying to log on, you finally get logged in and you can't even take any courses because they fail to open. POS app. Don't waste your time.
I really appreciate the fact that the app is being developed, I have been able to watch it develop over the past few years.
some modules will not load, and there is no way to refresh or report anything that is broken

This app sucks balls, couldn't even get past the first screen. First, you can't paste the URL into the address bar. Then, it doesn't find the (long ass, btw) url you have to type in. Well, isn't that just glorious?

Requires too much troubleshooting, better off using the web browser. Either something is disabled on the admin side and I'm not able to access course material or the app just simply doesn't recognize that I have access.

Not able to login, I've try to reset the password using app, app sending the link to my email to reset the password, post completed setup a new password, I'm still not able to login when using app while using browser desktop no issue found, currently app complain to stop login and wait until 10 minutes :)
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Hendrawan,

Weâ€™re sorry having trouble logging in. Please make sure youâ€™re double checking the usage of special characters and upper/lower cases. Depending on your issue, you will need to get in touch with your administrator to regain access or to receive further clarification on how to use the SSO. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: It keeps freezing up at the beginning of certain videos and I'm not able to do what I need to do. it's been doing this for over a week. I've made sure I have good service on my phone so it's not that and Its only this app I have a problem with. I'm hoping it gets fixed. it's very frustrating to have my boss ask me when I'm going to be done with this stuff and not be able to tell him a date because the app keeps messing up

Outstanding! My global organization uses this through our LMS. We cannot even imagine trying to operate without this app and service. Our personnel access their courses through this will remote, sitting in the airport, sitting at home and from what I've been told, even on vacation! This is the BEST app and service EVER! 11 out of 10!

Horrible App. I have been reading the past reviews, that dates back to the year 2019. Still, they have the same issues. The same responses from the same people, stating to reach out to the administrator. How about , stop getting people to enroll in something that doesn't, nor ever, has worked. This is a total failure and would have been a great opportunity!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Latasha Jenkins, We sincerely apologize for the issues you've had with the app and appreciate you taking the time to provide your feedback. We continue to make modifications and updates to the app to improve the user experience. Please send a note to your administrator to report the issues your are experiencing. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Not functional thus far. Trying 3 days to generate download. Our comany IT's seem to think swapping ( training app) something already useful, functioning, friendly and helpful for these 'new' ways are ill infrmed. I see this site has been updated Again! Why? Shouldn't something be tried and proven, bugs worked out before putting on the market? Plus, some of these are harmful to some devices. Thanks.

You have to login every time with your full email address and your password it does not have remember me which is very hard when you're driving another of very bad issue is you cannot listen and reduce the screen size so you can have Maps up also you can't use any other apps at the same time argh..!!!

I've been having nothing but problems. I have an Android and it's been a pain in the butt to try and get all my stuff done. From not playing the videos from having to skip around and not being able to go in order. It's frustrating and taking me much longer then it should.

this is a useless app. login credentials are not in sync in app, on trying to reset password, it sends a link to open app. all in all total waste of time seeing that blueprism has a tie up with this makes bad name and experience for blueprism users also.

Everytime I try to re-log in, the screen goes blank and nothing shows up for a while. I thought it was my network but I had tried checking a couple of other apps and they went through perfectly. Kindly assist

scraped_reviews.content: I don't like this app! 'Adult Verification' requires a Korean phone number with a Korean mobile carrier, and this is a restriction! I can't listen to the comic I'm intending to in this case :(

At first I thought that I was going to get to listen to some good stuff but when I was trying to listen something it kept on telling me that I needed to sign in or login and that made me delete it which made me try again but it was all the same and now I basically hate this app to the point I might sue it to get the money I paid back for the good ones
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Sorry, We are very sorry for the inconvenience in using the service.
If you contact [webmaster@audiocomics.kr], we will take action as soon as possible.

No need to go to the gym, home workout allows you to exercise at home with your own body weight. Exercise at home with effective home workout now and see great changes in a few weeks!

Home Exercise
Looking for an effective home exercise app? We provide you short & effective exercises in this home exercise app. Workout at home to lose weight now!
summary: Weight loss tracker & app to Burn Belly Fat at home with workout in 30 days.

scraped_reviews.content: fantastic free resource for anybody looking to start their fitness journey. They also have some paid features if you would like the additional support. All in all, I think it's fantastic for people who are out of shape, looking to try an entry level way into fitness before hitting the gym, or maybe even a returning fitness enthusiast who wants to start things off slow. either way, I can't praise this app enough. only thing that they could improve on is maybe adding a few more stretches.

Great, easy, cheap app to give basic workouts to keep me engaged. Exercises can be changed if an area is hurting or I want to focus on something else. I forgot to add to the initial review that this app "calculates" how long it will take you to get to your target weight but gives zero guidance on dieting or other exercising required outside of app to reach goal. Maybe I'll get there someday, but not just using this app. I still like it for the small workouts provided though.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gregory, we understand that everyone has different fitness levels and recovery needs. Your suggestion is valid and something we will definitely consider. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we are continuously working to improve the app to meet the diverse needs of our users. Thank you for helping us become better.

scraped_reviews.content: Worked for me! But it takes more than 30 days to see result. You should keep a healthy diet too. I would've rated 5 stars if difficulty could be adjusted according to muscle groups. Some exercises are too difficult for an intermediate. Yes, you can adjust/choose exercises each day but one has to do it everyday to match their routine. Overall, good experience!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Vishnu, thanks for your valuable feedback. We attach great importance to user's needs and we have communicated your suggestions to our development team. Thanks for your support. We'll continue to improve our app to bring you a better experience. Best regards.

scraped_reviews.content: Really depends on your commitment to the app and the level you are on when it comes to it. But ultimately I've had results after two months where I've improved my strength and workouts seem easier. Probably on par with any paid apps in my opinion but like all apps, you need the commitment. Start with the easier 30 day training and work your way up, it's really not hard to give 10 minutes of your day. Just pass the mental block and follow through with the guides, you'll see results.

I've thought about getting healthy for over two years, and have been frustrated by all the conflicting research. I got this app a week ago, and decided I just need to DO something already. After 4 workouts that are 6 min, I am already seeing gains in my mobility! I don't pay for anything on this app. It tries really hard to get you to buy something after you enter your body info. Just X out of it all, close the app if you have to. Beginner workouts and more are instantly available for free.

Highly recommended. Easy to choose your level of fitness. Ads are not annoying like most apps. Look forward to sticking with it. Update! I'm starting my fourth month, at 91 sessions, and I've lost over 15lb. Noom is a huge help with mental dieting too. But I couldn't be anymore happier with what I've achieved with this app. I don't believe you can do it 30 days. But you can most definitely do it if you stick with it. *****Update**** 4 years deep and will never stop. Just Do It!

Editable and Straightforward It can always use more types of individual exercises, of course, but it already has quite a lot. Adding a note about how many extra calories each type of exercise (relatively) burns and degree of difficulty was a good improvement, which is what they did since my original review, showing that they actually listened to their reviews and improved the app.

First day and I'm out of breath. Totally awake up call on how out of shape I am. I'm glad that download this app to help me get started, on a healthier path, by excersizing at a novice level. ðŸ˜Š I'm sure it will get better with more exercises as I progress each day. Thank you guys for all your help for creating a wonderful app. Take care.

So far so good, been at it about a week. Each session is about 20 minutes if you include warm up, which I recommend. You set your goals and experience level and the app does the rest. It also gives you recommendations on things you can do to amp up exercises that seem too easy. It also lets you report if you have any injuries and it will shape the workout to avoid your injured parts I break a good sweat and feel like I've done a good workout . Will update if my opinion changes.

To be honest this is probably the best lose weight app. This app has so much options to choose from if you wants to go light you can go light if you want to go hard you can go hard. I was weighing in about 248 and I am now at 242 within 4 weeks with this app and a little bit of dieting. The app is very well made and it has the best workouts possible with stats to show how much calories burnt. Thank you leap fitness group and I will be continuing my journey.

This app builds a workout plan tailored to your needs and guides you through every workout. It has helped me get back into working out after a long hiatus (due to rasing small kids) and best of all I've done all it's been free. It has some paid features, which I've never used, but everything you really need to get back into your fitness journey is free of payment or advertising.

I've been using the app for about 2 months now supplementing my lifting workout with the app workout a few days a week. It's a really good core workout (intermediate) even though I haven't really played with the options much. Since I only use it a few times a week, I'm just now approaching the end of the 30-days and am not sure what I will do at the end as I haven't seen the options yet. Overall, I like the workouts and the options to do it at your own pace and have seen and felt results.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your kind feedback. Our team will continue striving to deliver an exceptional app experience for you. If you have any suggestions or need any assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out. A 5-star rating (ðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸ) would be appreciated!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is currently helping me drop a bit of weight tbh, its nice and simple for us guys, it has plenty of adjustable options, so if your in an apartment, there are quiet but effective exercise routines, and there are skip options if there are just exercises you don't think you can do, But you can! If you get this app all the exercises are so able just believe in yourself!

This app is great. You can adjust to your level at the start. And if you feel like it's too easy or difficult, you can adjust on the go. No annoying ads while you're doing the workout. If you're unsure how to do a certain exercise. It has youtube videos in the app to show you exactly how it's done. It keeps track of the duration of your workout, calories burned, weight, BMI, exercises during workout, and you can sync to google fit. And best of all, it's free.

EDITED AFTER MONTHS OF USE... Really good app for workouts without equipment. I need this due to biz travel and don't always have a gym. It customizes to your needs (like knee issues for me) and then slowly intensifies over time. You can adjust along the way to make harder or easier. The workouts are time sensitive too. Typically around 20-25 minutes which includes warmup. 3 reps of multiple targeted exercises, and a cool down. It also syncs with apps and trackers. Great workout tool!

Awesome! I'm 59 years old and have severe arthritis in my hands, wrists and shoulders, but I was still able to do most of the exercises with no problems. Finally got down to 170lbs. after years of yo-yoing. Lose 10 gain 20, etc...but by tweaking my diet and the 30 day challenge I saw immediate results that first week. I highly recommend this app. You can always substitute any exercises with easier options if they are too hard.

My workout was great. I could feel myself getting a good work out within the five to ten minutes. I wanted to stop, but I pushed through the 30-90 seconds different types of exercises and felt greatly satisfied. I was so happy with the option to modify my workout and ease into this. Everyone! Give this app a go. I feel empowered and I'm going to give it a go again, tomorrow. Use it anywhere. I excercised in my bedroom. In time I would like to do this outside. Even my 4 year tried to do it.

This app keeps you accountable. Everyday, it'll remind you not only to workout but hydrate. I've set goals and it shows my progress and tells the truth... that I got big as hell. But now I'm a month and a half in and down 13 pounds using this app and coupled with a strict diet. You can't come up with an excuse if you're able bodied, to dedicate 20-30 minutes a day. You just can't. Get out of your own way....ITS BIG DOG SEASON!

I didn't use this app as intended with customizable workouts. However, I used its graphing portion that shows you how much weight you've lost or gained in the month. Just putting daily inputs in and constantly looking at it pushed me to eat less junk and work out. So I can confidently say in the last year I have lost close to 75 pounds.

Excellent app for those trying to shave off those extra pounds. Especially in the midst of covid, a lot of us were house bound, and put on more pounds than we would like to talk about. This app gauges your fitness level from the get go, the tailors the level you need to be at. I have yet to be disappointed, I'm always working up a sweat everytime I finish a workout! You owe it to yourself to get in shape!! Plus you can't beat such an app that doesn't make you pay for it.

very good service, very intense workout; based upon what you can handle. you can buy "lifetime" no adds for 5.00$, but then again, the ads are nonexistent, and the ads don't interrupt your workout, which is a big 100% for me! I'd recommend this to anyone who wants a consistent workout routine with no gym gear. this App is A+ in my book, God bless in Jesus Christ's mighty name.

Have used for 5 days so far. Not really overweight, 26 bmi, just trying to build muscle. So far, its great. I have lost some weight, and my muscles already feel at least a little stronger. I do it everyday, dont take rest days, dont really feel like i need them. Currently taking beginner course, though i feel it is a little easy, so i might start customizing my workouts or switch to intermediate. Seems to be doing at least something for me though, so thanks. Will report back in a month or two.

At 58, 6'4" and 250lbs, started out at lower level 1st month. Just completed 2nd month at intermediate level. I haven't been able to stay on schedule as well as app calls for so it took me 3 months to do 2.5 months. Feels like my head is going to burst somedays, as some of these exercises are extremely difficult. Haven't really lost weight but most definitely feel better and have more sculpture.

Started out amazing! Kept me motivated, made it all seem possible. Definitely got me into wanting to work out every day, which is awesome! However, the fault comes in when it ramps you up WAY too fast.   There are exercises that just aren't feasible, especially after selecting beginner. On top of that, it's common knowledge that doing an exercise in bad form is even worse for you, so we shouldn't be attempting certain exercises until we're physically able.   I would love to keep using it, but the pacing is so far off it's painful. Needs a little more human curation.

It's been one day since I worked out. And I can see and notice changes. After the FIRST DAY, I could notice my biceps(I think that's what there called) growing and I could do push-ups way better in which before I could do like two and feel weak. Now I can do more than six! And remind you this is after One day of progress. This really is a amazing app and I think if your trying to lose weight/build those muscles fast, this is definitely the app.

This app is so good and free with few advertisements. I can adjust the plan at any time. Hopefully I can use it for long time like an year and see my results. I started with easy routine for 30 days. Once it workouts i will try more harder routines every month going forward. That way I can build my core strength and then move to body building. By the way I am in my mid 50s.

Good workout under an app that keeps you accountable. Yes, there's ad but that's how they generate $$ so don't act entitled and help them out a bit. Everytime I finish my workout I just click on the top right(lightning symbol) to open an ad, the rest of the time it doesn't bother me. I dont know about beginner or adv but I've been doing the intermediate 2x consecutively and it makes me sweat. I'm a 5'8 dood@180lb benching 235lbs (near PR), 160lbs benching 245lbs prior to bulk and breakup :D

Amazing! With the correct diet, I was able to lose over 3kg with this app in a month. Yes, it's slow progress but consistency is what matters the most. I stayed motivated by turning on notifications to remind me to exercise. Thank you so much to the developers of this app for making this free so I can really lose weight and others too. Really recommend trying for losing weight or even building muscle.

I'm using this app for about 2 months, I lost lot of my belly fat. Exercises on this apps are easy to medium level hard, after finishing those we get so sweat. It little bit gives are believe on those exercises. I'm stil doing it, it's really a good app. It's also counts steps and adding it on our workout history. That also felt little bit motivated. I just skipped some exercise on some hard days. If you also skip it, don't mind it. Just continue exercises at next day.

I like this app but there are a few issues: 1. when you adjust difficulty, it changes even the days you've already done, it's very confusing for tracking purposes 2. when you tap the SKIP button on workouts it still counts them as if you did them 3. there needs to be a breakdown of each workout and how many calories it burns, not just the total, again for tracking purposes 4. you can only change music when you're actively working out, for timed workouts you can't if you pause
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for your valuable feedback. We attach great importance to user's needs and we have communicated your suggestions to our development team. Thanks for your support. We'll continue to improve our app to bring you a better experience. Best regards.

scraped_reviews.content: I have already started a weight. Loss journey a long time ago I lost about 100 pounds. I weigh about 313 right now I have stopped, but I determined to lose more weight down to at least 250 so I downloaded the app and it's amazing.So far it tells you when to drink water and it keeps ahold of how many steps you have took and it gives you a exercise plan. It is amazing. I would recommend it.

Used for more than 20days, liked it as beginner. Not sure if it will give claimed result or not. Exercises were well constructed. Would request to add/sync with Fit so that, walking/running those also can be tracked in one window. Thanks!! is there any update regd the syncing option, without that we need to add that manually. can't see any update related to this
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Rajendra, thanks for your valuable feedback. We attach great importance to user's needs and we have communicated your suggestions to our development team. Thanks for your support. We'll continue to improve our app to bring you a better experience. Best regards.

scraped_reviews.content: The best free fitness app on the play store in my opinion, you can tailor exercises according to your needs, or you can follow the regimen suggested by application. Minimal ads, that too on completing a full exercise set not during the set. it's free ðŸ˜€, and convenient, and really helpful.

fantastic free resource for anybody looking to start their fitness journey. They also have some paid features if you would like the additional support. All in all, I think it's fantastic for people who are out of shape, looking to try an entry level way into fitness before hitting the gym, or maybe even a returning fitness enthusiast who wants to start things off slow. either way, I can't praise this app enough. only thing that they could improve on is maybe adding a few more stretches.

the only training app I'm using for daily exercise. I've tried many and many other apps , but always return back to this one. very easy to use, no overwhelming while choosing workout, enough fine tuning options . a solid app that's worth it.

best app for losing weight. ( the app is totally free ( no much amount if ads .the best commentary and the best thing i like is that they have videos for the excercise if we do not know how to do it . also it will be very good if they add a shorts video section on which we can see journey of people how they became fit from fat . also videos like gym diet etc in shorts format

cons: the app literally abuses you with ads giving you an ad almost each time you drink water and it felt like actual hell. what's also ironic is the fact that most of the ads shown in the app are fast food ads. Also, it may just be me; but the exercises are so extreme, that I had to complete day 1 part by part each day because my body gets tired. pros: I really like the calorie and weight loss counters and the water drinking reminders.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience we caused. You can start with a lower difficulty level first. Break them down into smaller, more manageable steps and work at your own pace. With consistent practice, you will see improvement. Ads are a means to support the free services and features. We are continually trying to keep them as unobtrusive as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Apparently I have a Fireboltt BGS smartwatch which is connected to Da Fit app .If you could somehow sync between smartwatch apps then I won't be needed to take my phone everywhere (it makes distraction) and Am a teenager and phones are banned in our schools . Please consider this feedback , it would be a great thing for students like me . By the way this app is super cool ðŸ˜ŽðŸ˜ŽðŸ˜Ž.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for your valuable feedback. We attach great importance to user's needs and we have communicated your suggestions to our development team. Thanks for your support. We'll continue to improve our app to bring you a better experience. Best regards.

scraped_reviews.content: Generally a really great app. Helps motivating and gives you a solid workout base to make it easier (for me, as a beginner) to do something for my body at all. Tho I'd love it, if a streak of workouts would not be stopped if you don't login on a "break day" where you're supposed to have a pause from workouts. That actually demotivated me to care for the streaks at all. Also I'd like an option to set "Monday" as the first day of the week - maybe bind this to the OS settings & not make it static?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Jonas, thanks for your valuable feedback. We attach great importance to user's needs and we have communicated your suggestions to our development team. Thanks for your support. We'll continue to improve our app to bring you a better experience. Best regards.

scraped_reviews.content: Use this app for 10 months long. Meanwhile I lose weights about 25 kg. I really enjoy to set up my injuries or discomfort breath and really change the workout plan. I recommend it! I started using from real begginer level.

The fact that this is a free app really surprises me. I have been on and off this since Covid and found that I always co e back to it. With a balanced diet, determination and this app, I have successfully got myself to a more comfortable weight and notice the difference.

withOUT ðŸ«· PushUpsðŸ«¸ I like the new feature to customise without push ups and number of reps which suit us. When I used this app many years ago, i would be discouraged by push ups. I would postpone workouts and eventually not use the app. Intensive exercises and increasing targets which were beyond one's motivation deter people.

Honestly, this app has been a total game-changer for my daily grind. It really helps stay fit. I used to dread getting started, but now it feels so much easier. It's like it was designed to make my workouts easier.

The adds make it very difficult to into the app to the extent I'm looking for an alternative. shame basically a good app ruined by the adds loading before you can start to exercise, wipe out in particular is difficult to get past.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Paul, sorry for the inconvenience we caused. The advertisements displayed within our app are a means to support the free services and features that we provide. We understand the potential annoyance ads may cause, and we are continually trying to keep them as unobtrusive as possible while maintaining our free app service. Best wishes.

scraped_reviews.content: Most workout app has pro upgrade which we can't even get access freely... What is a work-out app if we can't get access to it. But this app is different as it let us get access to what we need.. Worth downloading and checking it out. Thank-you.

best app for weight fat loss. I have been using this app for one month .and I lost 3.6 kilograms ( intermediate level ) . but For losing all of your saturated fat you have to do it more than 30 days . For better results I will suggest to do weight training ( body weight/ calisthenics/ dumbbells etc ) and add a calorie deficiet diet .overall this app is really good ðŸ˜ŠðŸ’¯

good app for losing weight I have only lost a few pounds I been using this app for 1 week but my food is kinda slowing it down if I better my food il lose more weight after 1 week I noticed that I been really more strong not really much on the outside I still look the same but am more stronger this is a good app use it

just started and it's a great app.see sometimes we don't want to go gym and we also don't know how to exercise with a proper way so this application will help a lot to weight loss and proper exercise also.so,u must try this applicationðŸ™‚ðŸ™

Great app for beginners for weight loss and basic excercise for any age group. Just started with first step and found it good will update you with my experience and results after one month One week completed and happy to continue with the suggested exercise. Moving closer to my goal

This app is the best weight loss app I've used in a while for me personally what I love most about it is that you can add your own workout music and there are different types of exercises that I've never even seen before which is really cool

summary: On Tubi, Movies, Shows, (and  Love) Don't Cost a Thing!

scraped_reviews.content: EDIT: changed from 5â­ to 4â­ because the amount of ads has increased substantially ðŸ˜• Great catalogue and awesome service not to mention it's free! I've never had technical or other issues with Tubi. The app is perfect on all platforms from the TV apps to mobile and tablets and it runs smooth, if anyone's having any issues it's probably with your device and not the app. The app, even after updates, takes up so little space. It's just perfect all around.

Tubi is fantastic. Movies and TV shows play seamlessly, albeit with occasional commercials, but that pays for the service, so no complaint. It is MUCH more enjoyable to watch a movie on Tubi rather than the satellite or cable stations, with their massive bundles of commercials so lengthy and numerous that you forget what you were watching or why. Tubi has a massive searchable categorized free library from which to choose, and runs smoothly on your phone or cast it from your phone to your TV.

Tubi currently has one of, if not the, best catalogs of streaming- paid and free! Genuinely. I ended up cancelling two of my paid streaming subscriptions because I was primarily watching Tubi and not using them. Tubi does have ads, but so did those services that I was paying for, and those were more frequent and longer breaks. The UI is great too. There's so many categories to explore, the recommendations algorithm is great, and everything is organized nicely and intuitively.

It isn't perfect, does have annoying ads that appear out of nowhere but thankfully they are short ads. Depending on your tastes there's a lot of selection, almost too much. It has a lot of older movies that are hard to find and for the most part I have no complaints. Sometimes there's skipping, and buffering, and the sound is low on a few. But I noticed those were pre 90's movies. It does use up data fast, so be mindful of that if that's an issue. Still nothing beats free! Love it!

I have an account now, and I can say that this is actually one of the best streaming apps out there. It seems like every streaming app is adding ads now, however they're unable to execute the ads as well as Tubi doesâ€”They're ACTUALLY quieter than the show from my experience. They also seem well-placed, and aren't very long! I just wish it would stop giving me LiftEX ads, I hate those ads and that company for their ads. Either way, this app has good shows and I like it. Recommended! :3

Tubi is literally the only streaming app that has most, if not all, of the titles that I am looking to watch. Some of these titles are from the '80s and '90s, some are animated and some not, some are fairly new. Some titles I never thought I would see on anything (Power Rangers Light speed Rescue ðŸ˜…) And that app's been flawless, I've never had an issue. Most of my r&r time goes to music, but when I'm feeling TV and movies, Tubi is my go to.

absolutely fantastic!! lots of totally free content and minimal ads .. it's better than the cable I paid for years ago!!! but it's free. anyone who give less stars is not comparing free to free app.. nothing beats tubi! I really appreciate it because the app maker is not greedy shoving commercials down your throat. they are minimum and not annoying, I have noticed this trend of commercials being games... I have yet to see this here but if I do then instantly delete but so far it's good,.

Love this app. Has all kinds of shows and movies you would want to watch. To be honest though, I don't like the new opening when you launch the app as much as I did the "rabbit hole" one. I found the rabbit popping in and out of the hole really cute. Lol. Edit: the live channels glitch a lot. you guys really need to fix the live channels. they buffer often, and the ads don't play properly. I have very good signal too, so it isn't that.

Love being able to watch so many shows, including many only found on subscription channels, completely free. You do have to put up with ads, but at least for now they're minimal. If the ads increase it might not be a good option compared to other services. The layout is very user friendly and set up much like Netflix. Truly love this channel!

It's free so the commercials don't bother me at all. That said, Tubi has an awesome selection of movies. On top of that I tried a little experiment. Three times now I have searched for movies that were not in their database. Each time, I searched for them a few times over the course of a couple weeks. Not saying that my searching was the direct cause, BUT every time that movie has showed up with 2 to 3 weeks. This has become my go to app for movies.

The new update signed me out of my account, and when I was able to log back in, all of the movies in my watchlist & watch again lists were gone. I contacted their help desk but they weren't able to solve the problem. This was very upsetting for me because I had so many movies that I was catching up on (and a lot of them were foreign films with names that I can't remember).

This is one of my everyday apps. Sometimes I don't like the commercials when they come in 4 at a time. if I had a way to skip the commercials I would give it a 5 star review. Other than that, the movie selections are good, and it's free. I was never pressure or tricked into any subscriptions like other apps. So I could recommend this to others because there's no risk to use this app and I love it.

Good quality on playback. doesn't lag like certain other networks. Some really great programs, not the fluff like so many others. I watch more on Tubi than anything else by far. I hate commercials, and if there was a reasonable option for commercial-free Tubi, I'd do it, but as it is, the commercials are not excessive, again, unlike others that feel like commercials with a TV show spliced in. Keep up the great work, Tubi.

Update 5 - they fixed it, this app is really great but not perfect, they have a lot of good movies/TV show you can watch they do have ads but its not as much than TV. It has issues but not most of the time. They should make the app like most of the streaming platforms where we can pay for it and let it be opinional like Hulu, Peacock, etc.

I love Tubi, I watch all the time movies and older sitcoms. But now when I open it, search, rewind, or resume watching, I keep getting "That didn't work, restart the app or close it." Also when I click on "my stuff" then click "view" nothing happens, just blank. Should see my list of movies and tv shows I am watching. Now, nothing is there. I have the latest version, recently updated.

This app shows so much more than what would be expected. You would expect "B-Rate" movies and series..but it's so much better than that! So many movies that I grew up with, but also many current box office movies. And the TV series selection is incredible! This app is great because it keeps up closely with what apps that you have to pay for are showing so that people who can't afford those apps still have the opportunity to enjoy their favorite movies and also to discover new ones

Great streaming service. I don't dislike that there's ads, but if I could make one small nitpick, ad placement is a bit awkward. There's times in the shows where it fades to black or displays an eyecatch, which is where a commercial break is MEANT to happen. But thats not where Tubi plays the ads. Instead, ad breaks are randomly placed throughout episodes, interrupting the story

Tubi is great for free movies. Sometimes the commercials are annoying but what can you do? â—~UPDATE HERE: Actually I have noticed the commercials are more frequent, as in popping up every 6 to 10 minutes! That is absolute interference with the enjoyment of a movie. I have submitted report after report about this issue to no avail!! The movies are ALL free! Can search my genre, actor, and movie name. Pause for any length of time. It's a decent app.

I really like the app, a large selection of movies that I really enjoy and ones that I've never heard of before that fall down my alley; also alot of movies that aren't really streaming anywhere else. My only problems are how there are quite a few ad breaks during movies, but its nothing ridiculous, and they dont last too long, and I mean, it makes sense. But there is also this glitch where my app language switches from English to Spanish, which only happens to this app. It's quite annoying.

Since the previous update, the ad breaks have become very frequent, and the length of the ad breaks are longer than before. The app crashes whenever I try to watch a movie. The caption now has background, and when I try to change it in settings, it does not work. And, the foreign films do not come with English subtitles anymore. This app has become so unbearable to use, and it has quite a few bugs.

I have discovered a few great movies on tubi. The 1st movie I ever viewed on Tubi was Sisu (about a gold miner during ww2).. i thought itd be really difficult to top that one...however I have found quite a few films that are equally just as great if not better in their own ways! The only thing I find that irks me is that when I save my liked movies, they disappear when the film is no longer availiable on Tubi. I wish that they could at least find a way to keep the thumbnail saved to the list.

so far, I like this app. I'm in a crisis center, cant sleep, can't use my laptop... so I was was watching on phone, tubi all night, movie after movie, saved me from bored, losing mind. so thank you. so far, each movie has ads, but not unpleasant forced, not buggy ads like a lot of phone apps... It was like viewing TV, only 1 minute commercials mostly. entire app, has worked seamlessly, not intrusive.

I love Tubi! It has some of the best movies! It is easy to use and navigate through. I could do without the frequent commercial breaks ( they are short though) but I guess that is something you have to brave through in order to enjoy the movies for free. Tubi has quite a selection. The pictures are extremely clear. They have recently added a lot of TV show classics and some of my favorite series, as well as documentaries and mainstream movies. Check it out, if you haven't already. ðŸ™‚ðŸ‘

This app punishes me for hitting the pause button. If I have to pause what I'm watching, even for just a couple seconds, I get an extra ad break thrown in where there wasn't meant to be one. If it wasn't for that I'd give it 5 stars but that's a huge bunch of bull so it gets only 1. Absolutely ridiculous way to run a streaming service. The ads aren't bad as long as you don't have to use the loo or anything in the middle of an episode because they apparently frown upon that. Shameful.

Tubi is actually pretty awesome. I find myself constantly looking for "what the catch" is cause whenever something is too good to be true, there's ALWAYS a catch!! However, not this time. Not with Tubi. Surprisingly, what you see is what you get. There are A LOT of ads that pop up out of nowhere at the most inconvenient times but at least they are short and usually just 2 or 3 at most!! It's really 100% free as well. I actually cancelled Netflix and Hulu cause we have Tubi.

I understand a free app needs ad revenue BUT: Ad interruptions are far more frequent now, and longer than when I first downloaded it. Maybe ads are infrequent and brief at first to "suck you in." They've crossed the line cuz if you try to go back before the ad break starts to get a smooth scene continuity transition; you get another ad. So you exit & restart and... surprise. More ads. Now every time I open to pick up where I left off: more ads. Fuggeddabouddit.

Awesome app. Can't find most of these shows anywhere. New review again. I have enjoyed Tubi for years on my phone and suddenly out of nowhere I was signed out of Tubi on Sept 7th 2025 and I can't sign back in. Why do you keep messing with me?! I want to watch my shows! figure this out now! You lost all stars!

Awful app. I'd recommend going through a better streaming site. This app is horrendous with ads. I was able to watch 4 seconds of a movie before being hit with 2 long ads. At least with a different streaming company there's not 100 ads in 5 minutes. In total today, I've tried to watch the same movie multiple times. I've gotten 35:19 into the movie, I've also been hit with close to 50 ads literally in those 35:19 that the movie played for. I gave up trying to watch it. I'll just buy the disc.

I HIGHLY Recommend!!! Surprising amount of variety in excellent new, old and classic movies. I was very impressed! As well as a great selection of live television options including amazing fights, car shows and live news coverage! Who needs to pay for tv when you can have Tubi for FREE??!!??!?

Really good app - been using it over a month now -found it when I was in hospital for 3 weeks so it was a godsend. Free to use, streams smoothly and not bloated out with excessive ads, just a 10-15 second advert every 20-30 minutes, but carefully placed so as to not ruin the film you're watching. Has both films and documentaries covering a variety of tastes and interests. My only reason for not giving this 5 stars is there are too many rubbish films on there which means you have be selective.

An awesome free app. There's literally thousands of movies and tv shows to stream. The content is high quality with only a few commercial interruptions. The same as watching Youtube or regular tv. The tv section is especially good with shows like Hell's Kitchen that I haven't seen anywhere else. There's a great selection of movies in different genres, even stand up comedy specials. A fantastic free alternative to Netflix or Hulu.

IMO, one the best free streaming services now available. Great selection of TV shows and movies. The website is easy to navigate with a huge variety of great entertainment. I've yet to have any issues with internet connectivity or buffering. Yes, there are commercials, but no more than you will find with the pay streaming services. I would highly recommended this streaming service.

Had to Uninstall app wanted to finish my movie and this is the fourth time the app has done this where you can't watch nothing on your account other than the movies they are displaying. My continue watching disappears, my stuff disappears, etc. And what it says is "My stuff is on a break not broken see you after the game" or " explorer is on a break not broken see you after the game" no explanation no nothing. I just don't get it.

It's been great for the last couple of weeks, but since the update on Android yesterday, I can no longer use the search feature as soon as you click it the app crashes. The search now doesn't work at all neither does "My Stuff' both say that they're "Currently Unavailable".

I been watching Tubi for a few years. The ads are so ridiculous now! Ads every 6-7 minutes now! Was never like this before! I stopped watching the movie because I am not going to watch all these ads every few minutes! That's not going to happen! Go back to less Ads Tubi or I will delete my account. This is worse then regular TV! Better go back to the good old Tubi and do it quickly!

Pretty decent selection . However it acts like it's loading but won't do nothing when opening the app and when the commercials come on. Then more than half those times the so just cancels and closes itself out. If that wouldn't be an issue then this app would be amazing.

Love tubi so much but I'm disappointed in the range of movies and tv shows. As much as there are some very good shows to watch, there isn't much of a variety and eventually you get tired of the shows that they provide. Other than that I will turn my rating into a 5 star when we get better shows like the vampire diaries, Heroes, And the Originals

I've been using Tubi exclusively for the past 2 months or so. At first I didn't expect much being that it's FREE... But now I can say that I am amazed at all the content available, and all the Tubi Originals!! On top of being the BEST streaming platform, the ads are very quick and very few which is absolutely amazing!! In a 2 hour movie I get about 3 or 4 ads that last 10-15 seconds each ðŸ˜³ðŸ˜²ðŸ¥°â¤ï¸ so yeah I do recommend to everyone who might be wondering to give it a try (at least one month)!

Iâ€™ve been using Tubi for a while now, and I have to say itâ€™s one of the best free streaming services out there. The first thing that impressed me is the huge library â€“ from classic movies and TV shows to hidden gems and even anime, thereâ€™s always something new to discover. Unlike other platforms where you have to pay for access, Tubi is completely free, which makes it really stand out.The ads are there, of course, but theyâ€™re nowhere near as annoying as I expected.

Thank You for not being Greedy & For not being like all those other So Called Free Apps that have 8 or more Commercials Every Commercial Break & for not having Hour long Commercials like all those other apps. Your Conciterate of the working man's free time we have to enjoy show's that we love & You have Great Selections for us to choose from. And Yes it's Truly Free. Tubi is a Blessing to have. You Rock Developer.

AbsolutelyðŸ‘Wonderful... A very wide variety of movies, sitcoms and more.The commercials are fine, but I just had to minus one star ðŸ˜ž because sometimes they can show up at the point of the most suspenseful moment in the movie, etc. and take a pause,...commercials time,so we'll get back to it a moment or so. Otherwise it's really good.

Suddenly doesn't work properly. I used Tubi on my phone all the time, but suddenly I can't hit the backup button because it just gives me a blank screen now and I have to close the app and reopen it. it used to work just fine, don't know if it's the latest update to cause the problem or not. I've uninstall the app and reinstalled it but that didn't help I cannot hit the backup button at all it just gives me a blank screen. if someone can tell me why this is happening I would appreciate it.

Tubi is my go-to app when I want to watch movies and TV shows. I love using it when I need to escape from real life for a little while. The best part is that itâ€™s free! There are so many shows and movies to choose from, and the videos play really well. Sometimes there are ads, but they donâ€™t bother me too much. I like that I can watch old favorites and also find new things I havenâ€™t seen before.

You can no longer search by collections and genres now you only get 12-15 options. Everyday I would select a movie or other from the next alphabetical search. Just updated the app, 5 min later, you can no longer search by collections, now you can only search what they thinks is good for you. You don't decide for me!! They also refuse to reply to my review

Just recently started using Tubi when a movie i wanted to watch was available there. The catalog is wonderful I've noticed so many other movies I want to watch eventually when I can. I've only used the PS5 app though so far so I'm just assuming the phone app will be as easy to use when the time comes. I only wish they would give you an idea when every break is scheduled when you start the movie instead of a small pop-up 5 seconds before each time. I like that it tells how many commercials though

It's great, especially as I currently have it installed on my PS5 and watch any movies they have on offer, and I believe it rotates with a variety of movies, films and anime and cartoons that are on showcase. It's actually good but the only issue is the looonng ADS. They really should add a total ad timer. Rather each advert showing 30 or 40 secs of clips, like 4 times in a row. that's nearly 2 mins of ADS every 10to15mins, just over 15mins of ADS in under 1hour of Film or Animes.

I was gonna give it four stars because it seems there could be a slightly better Movie Selection or have a slightly faster rotation maybe for movies to Rotate or change But then again I don't think there is another Movie App to even get movies 100% free?!! Very impressive for the sake of everyone! Doesn't get much better of a generous service ad that?!! Thanx!!!

the speed function hasn't worked in months. normally I love tjat we can watch content in 1.25 or 1.5 speed but for the last few months it won't stay. it doesn't even last until the commercial. I set it to 1.25 and it reverts immediately to 1 (normal) speed. i hate it and i want it to work again. i miss this function

limited commercials, variety to choose from. its free. I like some of the films made by semi amateur directors(i guess they could be partial pro) and some good older films you never heard of but are pretty good. I'm on the app more than hulu and netflix sometimes. i wish they would expand more classic stand up comedian performances. george carlin, lewis black, dennis miller ...etc are always good more than once. no real complaints except excessive commercials on some movies , otherwise all good.

Right now, my favorite app is Tubi because they have the best movies available. I love watching a lot of historical films; all the best ones I've ever seen are on their site, and I love that because while others charge a lot of money for movies and TV shows that were once popular but no one watches anymore, they offer them for free and much better. So, in my opinion, it's the best movie and series service available right now.

title: iHeart: Music, Radio, Podcasts
description:
Your Music, Your Stations & #1 For Podcasts. All Free.

Stream 1000s of live radio stations and unlimited free music playlists for any mood or activity. Play ad-free music, songs and playlists. Stream songs, podcasts and live sports for free on any device. Enjoy free music and podcasts on the go by pairing the iHeartRadio music and podcast app with Android Auto to listen to travel music playlists.

Stream podcasts on hot topics: On Purpose with Jay Shetty, The Breakfast Club, Dateline, Crime Junkie, Stuff You Should Know, Gimlet or the Bobby Bones Show. Listen to The Herd with Colin Cowherd or NPR and discuss topics with podcast hosts.

Play sports radio stations and local AM / FM radio stations to get your live sports play by play. Connect with radio hosts on our Talkback mic and catch up on your favorite NFL, NBA and MLB teams. Fox Sports Radio, ESPN Radio and more.

Discover new music and top hits on live radio stations. Songs on demand or curated playlists: find new artists and elevate your music listening experience with millions of tracks from every genre. Country, Pop, Hip Hop, R&B, Rock and more.

Songs, podcasts or radio: listen to your favorites from local and world radio at any time, any place. Download iHeartRadio for free today!

iHeartRadio: Music, Radio, Sports News & Podcasts App for Android Features

FREE RADIO APP: LIVE STREAMING & LOCAL RADIO STATIONS
â€¢ Live FM & AM radio app: discover 1000s of local & global live music favorites
â€¢ Free internet radio stations for sports news radio, world & local news news music
â€¢ Replace your radio tuner & satellite radio with the iHeart free music radio app
â€¢ Stream songs, listen offline & play music with national free radio stations & world radio with top hits
â€¢ Local radio stations: breaking local news radio

FREE SPORTS RADIO APP: LIVE SPORTS & FREE SPORTS STREAMING
â€¢ ESPN Radio, Fox Sports Radio, CBS Sports Radio & FNTSY Sports Radio: tune in to live sports & sports news radio
â€¢ Stream sports radio stations & sports news discussions from top radio personalities
â€¢ Sports news radio: listen to NFL radio, NBA, NHL, NCAA, MLB, Soccer, Golf, Tennis & more
â€¢ Talk to free sports FM & AM radio hosts on sports news, highlights & commentary

FREE PODCAST APP: SPORTS PODCASTS, NEWS PODCASTS & MORE 
â€¢ Play free podcasts & adjust podcast player speed
â€¢ Versatile podcasting library: free podcasts for sports news, free talk radio, true crime podcasts & more
â€¢ Top 100 Chart: refreshed Mondays
â€¢ Top podcasts: ESPN, How Stuff Works, Black Effect, TED, Wondery & Big Money Players Network, Morbid, The Dan Bongino Show & more

FREE MUSIC APP: LISTEN TO MUSIC, PLAYLISTS & RADIO
â€¢ Music playlists & free songs curated for you: mood, activity, decade & genre
â€¢ â€˜Your Weekly Mixtapeâ€™: curated playlist with new music Mondays
â€¢ Song charts to listen to ad-free music streaming from genres like Pop, Hip Hop, R&B, Rock, Easy Listening Music, Alternative, Folk, Gospel, Christian, Dance, Indie & Country music radio
â€¢ Personalized music stations: curated listening with your favorite artists

PODCAST APP, SPORTS APP & MUSIC APP FOR FREE, ALL ON THE GO
â€¢ Listen to free music & play podcasts anywhere
â€¢ Play free music online or music without WiFi wherever you go
â€¢ Pair with Android Auto & listen as you drive
â€¢ Enjoy travel music playlists with car tunes for your next road trip

PREMIUM FEATURES
â€¢ Listen to playlists & music ad-free
â€¢ Ad-free songs on demand & unlimited skips: song, album or playlist
â€¢ Offline music app: download playlists, save & replay any song from the radio
â€¢ Listen on your phone, tablet, Chromecast or Wear OS
â€¢ Unlock iHeartRadio Plusâ„¢ & iHeartRadio All Accessâ„¢

Join our community!

â€¢ Instagram: http://bit.ly/1e1AOUS
â€¢ Twitter: http://bit.ly/1HZk5KQ

Feedback and Help
