scraped_reviews.content: If you think I'm going to pay 40% more for the same thing then good luck! I'd like to show you where you can shove your subscription. Also, more generally, this app is absolutely horrendous! It's so full of bizarre quirks and inconsistent functionality between web and installed versions such as the cursor constantly jerking around with the absolute worst programmatic touch control I've ever seen. I want to pull my hair out every time I try to use this app.

I was in the middle of editing a document that was already saved. I have autosave on and I had been working on it for a couple of days. I opened the file and was editing, when I got a text from a friend. With the app and the document still open, I switched to my messenger app to text them back and then switched back to MS Word. It closed my file and brought me back to my list of files. My file was no longer there. In fact, any files from the whole week...gone. I can't trust this app now.

I simply wanted the same functionality as Word on my desktop, but this is much more like a note taking app for a phone. I am using a tablet. There are no options for outline spacing (it's auto), no options to see the paper laid out in segments at the top so that you can move the slider and rearrange things, copy and paste is weird, and if you try to transfer anything back and forth between a desktop with Word... you get a jumbled mess.

I have been using Microsoft Word for 2 years, and it has some really good features that Google doesn't have. To the people having struggles with the app, I'd recommend taking a course on Microsoft Office for two reasons. Firstly, you can become a MOS Specialist, which looks good on your resume. And secondly, once you learn how to use Microsoft Word fully, it is extremely useful and can automate specific tasks, unlike Google.

Don't purchase any of what this app claims to offer. Not worth it. This app has always been my go-to because it has so many great features. But a problem I cant ignore is that documents just disappear without a trace. This is a huge problem! There's no way to find them once theyre gone. Despite typing in the title of the document in the search bar, its just gone (even though that shouldn't be possible!). I don't know what to do now. I'm very disappointed. Not suitable for a college student.

Creating invoices, shipping labels, resumes, letters, lists, cettificates, etc is less time consuming with this app. The Auto-Save action has helped me more times than I care to admit. I used to forget to periodically save my work as I was creating a new document but with Auto Save working in the background that's no longer a problem...

I spent hours working on a document on my Android using word. Autosave was on, and I had to go out of the app for some reason, which should have been fine as it saved earlier just fine. When I came back my document was nowhere to be found despite autosave! All my work was lost! I absolutely will not trust this MICROSOFT again! There's no recovery option, or basic service like that which you'd would find on an ancient desktop, and this is supposed to be 2025 on a mobile device! I am so angry!

I usually enjoy using Microsoft. I started using the app since I pay for Microsoft & inspirations can come at any time. However, it did take a bit to figure out how to use & find my documents. It also sadly heats up my phone & I don't know why. Also I will go in to make edits or add to my writings & it will freak out & jump to the last word making it into gibberish & I will have to undo the issues press the check mark & then the x to leave the document then I can go back in & write.

its Voice to text does not work offline, and i have been unable to find a way around it. So if you're like me, someone who travels a lot and dictates, most of what they are trying to write(because of dyslexia in my case), this app becomes useless. while I was at home It was fantastic, but as soon as I lost Internet connection, I lost the ability to use the app. the worst part is my phone still can still use voice to text, but the app disables the button on my keyboard.

it can be confusing at times when I try to find the documents I am looking for through a browse option, like when uploading my resume. Sometimes it shows up in the location I am looking for it through and sometimes it doesn't. then other times, the same location that should pull up a certain set of files from my one drive, it has a different set. today, I found the Read Aloud opt Word app on my phone to read it back to me. worked for a 1 document, then only a paragraph on another and stopped.

I like this app, but its so buggy that I almost always end up just taking my laptop in the car. Im writing 200+ page docs, and Ive seen other apps struggle with that workload, but not as bad, so I wanted to list my biggest issues, in hopes they can be fixed; -Random deletion words while typing -Clearing both "recent" and pinned doc lists -Widgit shortcut stops working - Random jumping to the top of my doc/bookmark not working (that really just makes me miss the jump to page function on desktop)

You just can't go wrong with Microsoft word. Maybe it is because I've been using this since I was, like, 6 years old on my parents old-school desktop computer. But I've tried exploring a LOT of other word processors, trying other options, seeing if there is anything I just might like better, but time and time again I always turn back to this. And it is 10x better then Google Doc, hands down. You can't even compare the two, this one wins everyday, every time, no matter what.

Update. Android Mobile app is garbage. When typing, it changes my words into gibberish, making it grueling to go back and force correct them. Curser jumps, and when I go back to re-edit, it will try to change the last thing I edited and throw it on the next. If I backpedal to redo the whole word, then it changes the word before it, and sometimes the one before that one too. Making the editing process a nightmare. Docs don't sync well from laptop to mobile, say it's an old version and read only.

What do you call a word processor that chaotically erases your work? I'm going to just use Samsung Notes, then paste the text into a Word document, and save it. I'm only using this app because I need it for school. in the middle of typing, the app crashes and loses whatever 1 to 3 sentences I was working on. Then it opens again with the most recent 3 or 4 paragraphs missing. then I open the document again, and find that it was only 2 or 3 sentences that are gone forever.

For the most part the app worked decently except for the cursor jumping around and jumpling words which was annoying enough but within the last month or so I've had frequent issues with the app crashing suddenly and anything I had just been typing is gone. the last couple of days it has been crashing every few minutes making using it an absolute nightmare. Hurry up and fix your app or I'm finding an alternative. This is not acceptable.

It used to be good, just meh, now. It doesn't do well on mobile if you cross platforms to another app. The worst thing that forces me to find workarounds for is that it doesnâ€™t allow me to use my multiple-entry paste function. Instead, it has its own that - in 2025!- has one entry and it only allows one entry from your clipboard. ONE!! Cleary, they arenâ€™t interested in mobile users at all. All good features require Windows. Other vendors do as well or better and don't abuse personal data.

I've had to work on a long project and don't have time to sit by a computer. I've always had the app on my phone, but I've never used it. I've been using it for the past month and it has been a nightmare. The app crashes all the time: while I'm typing, while I'm editing, while I'm reading; you get the point. I have to have my document backed up on OneDrive, a copy on my device's storage that I constantly save, and I email the link to four different email addresses. Update the app, please!

usually my go-to word processor, but it's been so garbage lately. other reviews mentioned how it can sometimes merge words and jump the cursor to a completely different section of the doc while writing, and it's extremely annoying. now it's crashing constantly, and the auto-save isn't consistent enough to catch everything. very frustrating trying to do anything when I have to save just about every sentence or risk losing what I've written.

Its a decent app, but no much more use than a note writer other than the fact you can save your document in the widely used format of .docx. My main gripe with it is that when you go back to edit, it can randomly delete words, partially delete words and amalgamate them with another, or add an extra letter onto the beginning of words. It's incredibly frustrating when the action of editing a document on a phone is already a fairly laborious task. Also now randomly closes and crashes all the time

I've always used this program, never had issues. I'm using a tablet, a good quality tablet at that, and Word just wants to crash constantly. I'm trying to write a book, I type quite fast. Sometimes I misspell a word and I will backspace quickly to delete, but every time this happens it's like Word gets a belly ache and will crash on me, causing me to lose progress, thankfully only by a few sentences, but still really frustrating. Great app otherwise.

Copilot seems to have taken Word out completely. It had many minor but workable annoyances before, such as forgetting chunks of text between mobile and PC or deleting parts of what had been written for no apparently reason, which could not be undone. Ever since they added the AI assistant, it's buggier and crashes every other sentence. My phone recommends disabling the app entirely to improve function. It's that bad. Certainly not worth a subscription, much less one this expensive.

I like this app, but it glitches and will combine and remove words randomly when editing documents. Frustrating. It has done this on three separate android phones and continues to be an issue over several years. Also, so help me, God, put the smart lookup / dictionary feature back on the mobile version if we are not getting access to whatever AI "tool" that is being embedded. It sucks having to switch between apps when the feature was so useful.

I got a RCA tablet with attachable keyboard back in 2018, and have used this app on that device for years to write stories. It has always worked fairly well. However, sometime ago updates for this app were discontinued as my tablet was no longer considered "compatible". It now makes doing certain things pretty annoying, like picking a font to write in; for example, I choose Times New Roman, but instead of getting that font, I get Yu Mincho.

The word app on android works well but is obviously limited in comparison to the functionality you get with the desktop app. However, it is perfect for creating and editing documents on your phone. and in a pinch, you can share your documents over the teams app if you are away from your desk.

Words are jumbled, suggested words of my keyboard aren't filled in, random capitalisation of letters, the grammar and spell check don't work. Just a selection of things that have gone wrong on two different phones (A33 and pixel8). At the same time I'm paying more for AI I don't use and scraping of my data, and showing ads. At this point it is a worse notepad and I'm going to replace it all with something better. A serious contender is a notepad.

I've used Office Word for years on a Windows PC but this app is poor. Navigation is clumsy for a small screen. It doesn't function nearly as well as other similar apps. There's no way of deleting all files together (press and hold doesn't work despite reinstalling). It highlights the whole word when I'm trying to insert a letter and so deletes it which makes editing very difficult in a large quantity of text. I now have to use a different app for writing documents on Android.

I'm trying to create an account but it's saying it can't create my account cz it detected some unusual activity but there was nothing unusual. I gave all the correct info it wanted. Tried so many times, it even sent codes to my email. everything was okay but at the last step after putting my name it says it can't create the account. why not? what's the problem? There's no wrong info to correct. Now what should I do? This is really bad. btw recently Microsoft Word got many negative ratings

It is not the same as the old microsoft. 1. you need to pay a lot for you to use it. 2. they remove the options like creating text boxes for me to create a pathophysiology. whenever I click the shapes and text boxes, I get lost to how complicated it is than before. 3. The computer version is different from the tablet version. Tablet version has limited buttons and options.

Word on Android is very useful. I've written tens of thousands of words with it. I have three complaints that I would like the developers to fix: 1) I can search a word, but when I try to enter into the text at that point it goes crazy and jumps to somewhere else in the text, usually far away 2) As a variation of the above problem, fairly regularly I will be typing and the cursor will decide it would rather be somewhere else 3) I cannot see a word count for the file.

The app itself is good as it allows for quick access on any device whether it a mobile phone, laptop, or tablet but it is really quick and simple to use. It is also a really good app as it has this in app editor which does grammar and spell checks so you as an individual using the app don't have to worry about having to read over the work as it provides an editor score through which you'll make the changes to your work.

I'm a dedicated long-time mobile user and would give it five out of five, but their recent glitch hasn't gone away, and it's become annoying to use. The "recent" section just forgets basically everything, and I need to go into my Onedrive every single time. Microsoft word is easy, free on mobile, and holds a TON of words, but this adds a couple of extra steps every time.

very handy microsoft app. only of recent, the sign in process has .... changed. it keeps prompting â€œOne or more of (my) accounts require (me) to sign in againâ€ every time I load the app when I already done the signing in steps. it happens with the excel app as well. it all started after the outage on the Microsoft cloud play some weeks ago.

Very similar to the computer app. Compact in all the right areas so it is not overwhelming but all the features of the laptop app can be done on this app the only challenge may be to find it. when you get accustomed to the mobile app editing documents on the go is very convenient and it does not compromise the quality and features like switching between Google Word app and other mobile word apps. Four stars because finding the setting can be a task.

Why do my fonts disappear? Also my read aloud voice reverts to the robotic sounding voice until I clear the data and cache/ relaunch the app. I normally have around 100 fonts available to choose from. But lately the app seems bugged, like it only gives me 10-15 fonts to choose from and all my settings are unavailable. However, as soon as I clear the data for the application from my app settings and telaynch the app â€” its 100% fixed for 20 mins and then the same issue occurs again.

The app is cumbersome, requiring us to do the same things over and over again, like for example, lowering the menu bar constantly so we can access functionalities or lowering the in-built keyboard when using an external one... writing in it a chore. The free functionalities are laughable at best, not allowing to perform basic tasks. Microsoft should be ashamed to ask for money with the utter rubbish. Will never use it again.

Impossible to configure spellcheck; error only says English not checked. Not a particularly helpful or instructive error message. It's a mobile app; a functioning spellchecker is kind of important given the general lack of physical keyboards. No information online on how to fix this error - only AI responses and canned replies to other people with the problem. It's really the inability to diagnose or fix this that makes me give it one star. A "computer says no" message isn't good enough.

It lags a lot, it takes forever to highlight some words, it takes forever to see what is pasted in the document you want to work on, it zooms out and in unnecessarily whenever you click what you want to edit your work, it doesn't completely read the work on the document plus sometimes, it doesn't even read aloud at all, even if you highlight the part you want it to read aloud. It sucks so much and it makes working in the app very slow and sluggish. The third time I am coming to edit my review ðŸ¤¦

It's OK, but it doesn't have the level of controls that are present in the Windows version, such as Dark Mode, Rulers to control indent & margin parameters, ability to highlight & change multiple items... have to do them one at a time repeating the process over and over... you can get the task completed but it's a bit excruciating at times. The font Theme Color settings don't work in the tablet version... changing a color results in the highlighted area defaults to background color & disappears.

it's terrible on pixel devices. not sure if it's working well on Snapdragon and mediatek chips. the keyboard vanishes and the bottom part becomes dark. takes some second to respond afterwards. I really hope it can get as optimised and Google docs, very easy to use but not as compatible with office on Windows. please optimise please. 5 stars when I see it fixed.

I like using this app to read and edit WORD documents on my handphone. However, nowadays I no longer can find the "mobile view" which is essential to me so that I don't have to scroll left and right on my smartphone screen while reading a document.

I'm experiencing the same issues as many others. I was recently charged P489 even though I don't have an active subscription. I signed up for 3 days free trial and without any notice you automatically deducted from my account. I'm kindly asking for a refund, I badly needed the money, please give me some consideration, I was not aware of the auto deduct subscription. I badly need the money.

I am an indie author and have been using word for YEARS. The auto save feature is amazing and makes it easier for me to save work and pick back up where I left off on projects. I could do without the new AI functions that have been previously added but aside from that it will always be my #1 for writing my books.

Word is constantly signing all my accounts out. so I constantly have to sign back in. this is screwing up the app and my documents are disappearing. 365 has screwed it up. This is beyond irritating. I have no idea how to contact support to fix this. I have ALOT of important documents that I dont need deleted.

App sucks and it sucks that this is the industry standard. App randomly crashes and repeatedly crashes 5 seconds after opening, even when all you've ever opened are basic files with nothing special in them. Support seems to have no idea how their app works but I've found a solution, which is to clear your app data. Another issue I've found is that all features related to saving the file locally on your device, such as using the "save as" feature and the "share" feature corrupts your file.

Did not recognise the icon. I was thinking what was this app in my phone and why does it look so ugly, until I opened it to realise it's word. Googled and the icon with the alphabets on them look better. Please change the icon to the one with 'w' on it and so forth. It's gonna be confusing to see at one glance what app it is.

I give it 2 star because my documents just lost, idk where to find it I was editing around and i dont delete or do something just edit and I press the check when i return back my document just lost I hope they will fix this bug, I try to delete the app and install again hoping that my document is gonna show but it didnt 2 documents just lost.

Doesn't sync and any of my recent documents aren't the ones on the onedrive but my device. even when i pin what i need it disappears. it used to be really good now it slow and buggy update: Its so frustrating I have a document up on my laptop MADE SURE IT SAVED CURRENT CHANGES reopened the app and it's stuck loading my documents
It's basically functional, but it doesn't let you customize the default template at all, and it really needs to add some way to make your favorite fonts easier to access. Also, the new icon SUCKS.

I was using it to edit multiple documents. When I closed the file and went back in I found those files gone so I went to my downloads and files on my phone and tried to open then from there but it send there was something wrong in the app and I couldn't open it. So I un-installed the app planing to reinstall it. When I did I found that I could not reinstall the app. As you can see the word is useless on a phone. I am lucky I can still access my files on the computer. Some people didn't get that.

zooming in zooms in, but on a part out of the page? Why? Keyboard shortcuts are non existent, ctrl b doesnt make the text bold, and so on. At least there's no ads! If only the two most critical features worked in anything-Microsoft, it'd be a solid 5 stars, but no. Nothing MS touches works. Massacred Call of Duty. Onedrive for windows (ran out of storage but MS decided to back up my whole pc to onedrive even though i tried downloading the files to my pc, lost all files but whatever). +Sharepoint

title: Magic Earth Navigation & Maps
description: Find the best route to your destination even without an internet connection. Magic Earth uses OpenStreetMap data and a powerful search engine to offer you the optimal routes for driving, biking, hiking and public transportation. PRIVACY FIRST! â€¢ We do not track you. We do not profile you. We do not trade in your personal data; moreover, we do not have it. MAPS â€¢ Save big on mobile internet costs and navigate reliably with offline maps powered by OpenStreetMap. 233 countries and regions are ready to be downloaded. â€¢ Choose between 2D, 3D and Satellite map views. â€¢ Get ready for travel and know every detail of your route like surface, difficulty, distance and elevation profile. â€¢ Learn more about the points of interest near you from Wikipedia articles. â€¢ Spot nearby parking places to easily park your car. â€¢ Stay up-to-date and enjoy regular free map updates. AI DASHCAM â€¢ Improve safe driving and avoid accidents. Receive alerts to potential problems on the road and record your trip. â€¢ AI DashCam features Driver Assistance warnings and Dash Cam functionality. â€¢ Avoid collisions and accidents with Driver Assistance warnings: Headway Warning, Forward Collision Warning, Pedestrian Collision Warning, Lane Departure Warning, Leaving Lane Warning, Stop & Go Assist. â€¢ Record the road ahead during navigation to have an aid in the event of a collision or incident. â€¢ Driver Assistance warnings and Recordings are available when the device is on a car mount in landscape mode, with a clear view of the road ahead. * AI DashCam (with Driver Assistance warnings and Dash Cam functionality) requires Android 7 or later. NAVIGATION â€¢ Find the fastest or the shortest route to your destination when you travel by car, bike, on foot or with public transport. â€¢ Plan your route with multiple waypoints. â€¢ Stay safe with the free Head-up Display (HUD) feature which projects the most important navigation info onto the windshield of your car. â€¢ Know in advance which lane to take with precise turn-by-turn navigation and lane assistance. â€¢ Get notified about speed cameras and stay up to date with current speed limits. TRAFFIC INFO â€¢ Get real-time traffic info, updated every minute. â€¢ Discover alternative routes that avoid the traffic jams and save you time on the road. PUBLIC TRANSPORT â€¢ Get around town quickly and easily. Choose from public transit routes that combine all transportation modes: bus / metro / subway / light rail / train / ferry â€¢ Get walking directions, transfer times, departure times, number of stops. And when available, the cost. â€¢ Find wheelchair or bike friendly public transportation. WEATHER â€¢ View current temperature and local weather forecast for your favorite locations. â€¢ See what weather conditions to expect in the next hours and view the forecast for the next 10 days. NOTES: * Some features are not available in all countries. * Some features require internet connection.

summary: GPS Navigation, Offline Maps and Crowd-sourced Traffic. Entirely free.

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this app though I have only been using it for a few days. Since they are not collecting a lot of data from users, traffic and optimized routes may not be quite as current as the mainstream players. I'll take better privacy though! The interface and guidance are clear and simple which is needed for use while driving. The "advanced guidance" features didn't work for me but I'm not heartbroken about that
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. If there is something we can help you with, please contact us at support@magicearth.com

scraped_reviews.content: Quite happy with this app. I like the way it looks and route selections. In addition I also like that it shows the speed limit of the road and a speedometer and verbally announces when you are speeding. However, things that I feel need improving and are a must have: 1. Some shown speed limits in the app are not upto date and are incorrect 2. Speed cameras are not announced (at least whist using Android Auto) they are however displayed but are tiny! 3. There is no option for you to change route

great app! The offline navigation is great for people who are often without service. I wish I could disable non-OSM POI's - lots of inaccurate data. Besides that, only issue is results sometimes don't filter by distance - if I search for "10 Green St", it will show results hundreds of miles away, often across the ocean, when the "Green St" I'm looking for is only five minutes away. Sometimes it *only* shows far away results, and I have to type the city I'm in for that address to show up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for the 5-star review! For best results around you, please press the "find my position" button first

scraped_reviews.content: I don't know how such a god awful app can be highly rated. 9/10 it will not pull up a location I search with exact words. it's not like those locations don't exist in the app either, if you can find them on the map it will be there labeled but it doesn't populate searches. Most of the time it is pulling up locations hundreds of miles away. I would instead recommend OsmAnd. It is very particular about spelling but at least it will pull up stores. Personally I think the UI is a lot easier to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That doesn't sound right! Can you give us more information at support@magicearth.com so that we can investigate?

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy Magic Earth greatly - it's better than Google maps in many ways, such as actually showing street names on the map. Imagine that! But the inability to mute the voice during navigation mode is infuriating. I often only need navigation for the last .5 to 1 mile of a trip. I simply don't want or need constant interruptions during my entire route. I just want to use the display or be able to turn the voice on and off during times when I do or don't want it.

I've only been using the app for a couple days and I have to say it's good alternative to the other navigation apps that you're stuck paying for to get in order to get all the bells this app gives free. It's very easy to use but I wish it had more options to customize the experience, if I had a negative it would be that "it doesn't announce the street names for each upcoming turn", just a simple turn left or right and distance. Waze is full of ads but it's more thorough with giving direction.

I like this app, but there is one thing it needs before I commit to using it. My problem is that the voice doesn't say street or exit names which makes it extremely difficult to navigate in urban areas where there is often many exits close to together. A less important thing is that the voice says, if I'm hearing it right, "Bare Left" which is a bit confusing because typically the phrase used is "Keep Left"
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for using Magic Earth. At the moment we only announce road numbers.
As opposed to "keep left", "bare left" implies slightly turning to the left.

scraped_reviews.content: Wonderful alternative to creepy Google. No ads and I love that you can change the voice! Some suggestions would be to add a miniviewer or a notification that the app is running to quickly review the map on the road if you get out of it while navigating. Add some visible things in the map (stopped car, speed trap, etc.), and a clearer alert to traffic queues(the traffic delay is in 1.0 mile or similar) when you approach them and you have a Perfect GPS App. Thank you for making this!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions! You can contact us at support@magicearth.com. We will be happy to hear from you and improve the look and feel of our app together. Best wishes, Magic Earth Support

scraped_reviews.content: No trackers, limited permissions asked, no wifi scanning needed, no blue tooth scanning needed, no screwoogle location history needed. Several 2d and 3d map styles to choose (day and night specifically too). I'll be donating. Searching for specific business isn't as fast or nearly as accurate as Google... which hurts to admit. If you're in a panic or mid-drive this isn't a great app for super-fast place-finding. But it gets the job done.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for using Magic Earth, we're glad you're enjoying it! Thank you for your donation as well!

scraped_reviews.content: Works offline, no trackers, regular updates, choice of maps that can be stored on External storage to save space. Interactive traffic and other data. Routing choices and more. Look at it this way: compare it to W*ze or G**gle M*ps. Less frequent updates, less users to keep traffic updates real-time. But no ads, works off-line, can plan trips covering thousands of miles, no one keeping track of where you went. All other features are the same. Get it and get it now!

Going to give 3 stars because it's free and works offline. Needs alot of improvements. Microphone input doesn't work well, misinterpreted all the time. Have to type location and I had to input the address to find a restaurant. This was all offline. Get rid of the battery icon? That shows up next to speed icon. Add X to cancel navigation kinda like you know who. Would simplify things. Not many points of interest. Not good enough to replace pay to play apps.

Love this app and it's only gotten better with time. The heads up display is wonderful at night and the dash cam works as well as many stand alone products at any price, and this is free. Only minor quibbles are the overheating issue when trying to use driver assist ai, and difficulty in locating and managing recorded dashcam video (I've found it much easier to use a file explorer to manage vids than trying to do it in app).

So far so good and NO ADS! Yay! I need an offline Android Auto compatible nav app. A real user manual would be great. What's really missing is a non-workaround method to save, load and re-edit trips, ideally on a desktop. You can save and then import a GPX track, but the entire track becomes a single un-editable node. Unfortunately Support is non-responsive. Six weeks since I emailed them with no reply (despite an auto-response saying someone would get back to me).

Only just installed it and played around with it. So far so good. The elevation feature is awesome. Very important when driving an RV. An RV profile would be nice to avoid dead ends etc. Maybe even show alternate routes with lower elevations. The gas station feature would be better if you could specify fuel type. Showing only stations with diesel would be great.

Fantastic app. Speed and speed limits showing up clearly on Android Auto, nice, customizable speeding alerts, not just when navigating, but also when cruising. Also showing upcoming pedestrian crossings and traffic lights, and nearby parking. Offline use/maps, and no subscriptions. In short, it has all the features that Google Maps, GO, Waze, Navigation and a whole bunch of other GPS apps I tested so badly lack.

Thanks for the fully free, ad-free app but it's lacking very useful features so badly. For example, there is no way automatically dowoad all the medium location maps when you are starting building directions to the very remote place. It's very useful when you are in the plane, flying, and wanted to know where exactly are you now.

Seems like a good application. But i noticed that there no way to report that a name of a specific location is wrong are that you can help to enhance the map by adding location names and type to the map. If you add this feature, you will enhance the map further more. And i noticed that for the Caribbean Netherlands map the map is not completely updated.

I would give this a 5-star rating, but unfortunately there are some features missing that would take it all the way to the top. I think it has Apple Carplay, but no Android Auto. That's a big one. Where I live, it doesn't show the exit to take, only that I should exit in 'x' miles. The UX/UI could use some cleaning up. Other than these three, it's an awesome GPS that can one day replace Waze.

It seemed interesting because of the multitude of options. But the longer I use it, the more I see its shortcomings. First of all, there is no flat map display mode. There is always this quasi-3D view. You can't click on a place on the map and navigate to that place. And the saddest thing is that the application does not save GPS tracks in GPX files. It supposedly saves them, but after saving, these files are nowhere to be found in the smartphone's memory or on the SD card. It has a lot to fix.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Flat mode is activated if you drag down with 2 fingers and if Settings â†’ Navigation â†’ 2D/3D Map is set to 2D. You can click on a place, drag up the menu that appears below and press on a vehicle profile (car/truck etc). The route will be calculated and you can start navigation. You can share GPX tracks by tapping Search Bar â†’ GPX Tracks â†’ Share

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent alternative to Google Maps for navigation. As a suggestion, for users with older vehicles and most Android phone OSs, add an option to route the audio through the phone speaker instead of through Bluetooth. For example, on my car head unit, Bluetooth audio only comes through when choosing to listen to Bluetooth audio - it will not be heard while listening to radio. Also, while shown through Android Auto, the map display is too zoomed out, and while in navigation mode too zoomed out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: Decent navigation app but needs additional vehicle settings. With the option for fastest route selected it has a habit of using narrow local roads, which by calculation are faster, they are usually narrow local roads that use passing places as they are not wide enough for two vehicles. This makes them the slowest route. The option to select the route is there but, when using Android Auto, can be easily missed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. We will look into this further!

scraped_reviews.content: After the update (May 29, 2023) it became too slow to use. Tried it again in June 2024 and it improved a lot, however after the latest updates (June 2025) the recorded videos don't have sound even when copied to my personal photos folder. This to me is unacceptable: my privacy my choice, regardless of the reasons the company may invoke to restrict access to sound, it should be my choice to record with or without sound. I am sure the videos are recorded with sound and its access is restricted.

I'm using Magic Earth since many years, in many countries it's the best. I just have one wish: between the fastest and shortest route, I like to see one more option, most economical. When following the shortest route and there is a good route around town, avoiding downtown obstacles, churches, marketplace, one way streets and traffic jams, it is better to go around town. Often the shortest route will ask you to leave the major road just to re-enter the same major road after having crossed town
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for the 5-star review! Weâ€™re thrilled youâ€™re enjoying the app. An economical route is something to think about for the future versions.

scraped_reviews.content: ok, have used this now for a while. Did love it. Went away from it for a bit as the traffic avoidance was terrible. Came back to it, traffic avoidance still terrible, but even worse, it does not see roadworks. Took me through Bibury, got all the way through to find road closed, and not just closed, heras fencing closed. ie closed for a long time, not just popped up. Still love the interface,and it's free, but can't use confidentiality any longer for my job. Sadly back to Google maps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Weâ€™re working on finding better solutions for road closures.

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent. Detailed instructions and easy navigation. Especially the anouncement of when to turn is excellent. I used it during a road trip in the US. No problems in big cities like Chicago, Denver or Las Vegas. Some functions are a bit hidden (like "overview"), but once found they work fine. Works without problems with Android Auto. I have changed some colors, like the color of the route to follow: now green with a red border.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for the awesome feedback! We're happy you're having a great experience.

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE: Stopped using around 2022... Just too hard to read at night, and adding waypoint along route impossible while driving. Using again, but these are still issues. Want to support app, but usability for me while driving is still low Installed four top Navigation apps and so far this is my favorite! Had a problem with changing view from 3D to 2D and customer support helped me quickly resolve the problem! Great app... I think that this will be my go-to Navigator
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Yasha! Thanks for rating our app 5 stars. Whenever you have questions or suggestions for us, please send us an email at support@generalmagic.com. We will be happy to take a look at your proposals and see how we can implement them in Magic Earth. All the best and keep in touch!

scraped_reviews.content: It could use adjustable fonts for smaller head units for Android Auto. And the compass needle does not show on Android Auto ever though it shows on phone display. It certanly has potential though. For me I will pass for now but maybe try again later.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Weâ€™re constantly working on improving and adding new functionality to make the app better for all users.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best free navigation app of all time! It helps with any type of warning, for example, a road collision. When a user reports it, it will show on your map. And it works with Android Auto as well! Good app, recommended.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review! Safe drives!

scraped_reviews.content: I love the maps on Magic Earth, so nice and comfortable to look at when needed too, the only problems i find is the Audio, it is behind the actual turning point. Also i noticed in the Australia state of Victoria, my home address is right but the suburb says different, for instance i live in Craigieburn but the map. says Sunbury
scraped_reviews.replyContent: To assist with this issue, it would be helpful to have a little bit more information. Can you send any screenshots related to the issue along with your device details at support@magicearth.com? Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is so close to being great. PLEASE give us the ability to disable POIs from Foursquare and similar sites. It's very hard to see what restaurants or retail stores are in a populated area because the map is littered with icons for every single self-owned lawn mower or dog washing service run out of someone's garage. If anyone needs to use these smaller services they will look for them online, it's pointless and confusing to display them on a GPS app like this!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We are constantly trying to clean up outdated and useless POIs. We will also implement a system for users to report such errors.

scraped_reviews.content: Awesome. i use this app when i ride motorcycle. One suggestion for improvement - possibility to freely move and resize speedometer. on motocycle i need it bigger and well visible. edit : thank you for response, do you mean portrait orientation? i use landscape, this position took me a lot of fiddling, it fits best to customization of my chopper
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the great review! Weâ€™re glad the app is working well for you. Might we suggest using the Heads-up-Display feature, with the mirror function turned on? You would have to place the phone horizontally, facing up, though.

scraped_reviews.content: In terms of privacy, features and battery optimisation, this is by far the best navigation app and I tried many of them from google maps, to tom tom, igo, sygic, osmand, etc. One thing I'd like to see is google maps-like voice guide control always visible on the main screen. Many times, I need to turn guidance off quickly and temporarily and then turn it back on. Now it is impossible without going into settings.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for using Magic Earth, we're glad you're enjoying it! We will introduce an easier way to control vocal guidance soon.

scraped_reviews.content: This is by far through best gps I used. Was in north Italy for a week, first used RadarBot on it's own, was okish, the. next day I used Google Maps and was a nightmare due to the unfrequent updates, no camera warnings, no clear lane changes, no clear exit arrows, etc made me lose a couple of turns. Then ChatGPT suggested that I use Magic Earth and pair it with RadarBot - and it was perfect! I had RadarBot open in the background to alert me of all cameras, while I used MagicEarth as my main GPS!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the great review! Weâ€™re glad the app is working well for you.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the one for me. I've tried so many and this works perfectly for me. Maps are detailed, accurate, comprehensive and importantly optionally off line. Its On Street Maps implementation is far more detailed and reliable than other apps OSM apps I have tried. Screen is uncluttered, Navigation is easy and accurate. Usage is intuitive. I use it for cycling and bush walking as well where I find the simple GPX recording and sharing a real bonus.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for the awesome feedback! We're happy you're having a great experience.

scraped_reviews.content: THE BEST Google Maps alternative. I would even say it's better than Google Maps in a lot of areas. I just wish it also supports PiP. I use this in my car and PiP would really be helpful so that I can also open the 360 cam. If they can add PiP, then this would be a 5 out of 5 for me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: Prevously rated as 4 stars because overall it's a very good navigation app. The irritation for me is the huge size of the map updates. My wifi is high speed but after waiting an hour for only half the update for England mapping to download I gave up and cancelled the download. Another gripe is that when you have dowloaded maps but don't need them, you can't delete the maps and you have to delete the app and reinstall with .aps that you need.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi and thanks for your feedback. We're working on the implementation of incremental map updates and hopefully, we'll have weekly map updates in the close future. This means updates will come more often, the update process will take significantly less time and Internet. Stay tuned and accept all app and map updates to discover when this happens!

scraped_reviews.content: Some suggestions: 1- I live in Rio de janeiro Brasil and you don't have the subway schedule available i can find them but if I want to catch it I don't know the working hours or if there's any delays. 2- on the offline mode the street names doesn't appear as fast as it should I need to keep turning the screen to a certain position until I finally know which street I am if I could see it's name I would know which one I am straight away.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: loving it! To be honest the mythic name is what caught my eye ðŸ”®ðŸŒ, the privacy focus kept me ðŸ¥·. So far so good, pretty snappy & rather accurate. Sanctuary not surveillance âœ… Looking forward to non-google options, that's always a make or break for me in the long run.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for using Magic Earth, we're glad you're enjoying it.

scraped_reviews.content: Great looking app, has lots of features, privacy is a great thing, the problem is this.. The routing is just awful which makes it pretty useless. What's worse is that even though having fully downloaded maps, if I have no signal I can't search! What's that all about? Sack of junk, uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Weâ€™d like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Please send the details or screenshot to support@magicearth.com. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

scraped_reviews.content: I like the app look and feel but there are couple of issues. 1. App doesn't calculates on the route travel time in the beginning on basis of congestion on the roads real-time. Instead it continues to increase time to react at destination on the way which gives a wrong information of your arrival at the first place. 2. App switches to night mode automatically in the evening once and then after 30 mins or so it again switches back to day mode using Android Auto.

It is perfect to go with the wrong way to nowhere. I test it just to drive from my house to the main road. The navigation point me to go from a road that is so narrow only for one motorbike. No other navigation app made so far that tragic mistake.

Inaccurate placement of buildings on map Actually, some places of interest are wrongly positioned. I also saw one place of interest twice and at a distance from each other However, this has been my favourite navigation tool for years
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That doesn't sound right! Can you give us more information at support@magicearth.com so that we can investigate?

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty good, needs some streamlining, backup and restore of favorites is there, but most likely confusing for most users. Needs ability to control alerts/sounds and other things via Android auto
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We are working on such a feature.

scraped_reviews.content: Navigation is good but the maps are now 3 months out of date and the app claims they're up to date. I've also found errors which were corrected even longer ago on OSM which is strange if this app is using OSM data.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. A map update will be available soon. They are currently re-generated every 2-3 months.

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, it's a good app. Would like the option to display highway/freeway numbers instead of just highway names; the option to display I-163 instead of "cabrillo freeway".
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app as an alternative to gmaps. But I wonder when will android get the new update (UI and subscription) that is already available for the iphone, as the android auto deserves a little bit of polish.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for using Magic Earth, we're glad you're enjoying it! The new version will be launched as soon as we will implement alternative, privacy-minded payment methods.

scraped_reviews.content: Doing great so far. I like the clean interface. Update Oct 2025: Still using this and still very happy. One question: how do you subscribe. I just can't seem to figure it out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for the awesome feedback! We're happy you're having a great experience. On Android, there is no subscription needed yet.

scraped_reviews.content: I've not found any other navigation app that can be a proper replacement for Google maps. Great work!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the great review! Weâ€™re glad the app is working well for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Fantastic navigation application and I love their focus on privacy. This is an app done right by a great team! Keep up the great work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

scraped_reviews.content: Just downloaded it My office address location could not be found Temperature is in Celsius. Must be an app for countries other than America. App is too cumbersome. Find my position? Have to type in where I am before I can find out how to get to my next destination? Hell no
scraped_reviews.replyContent: For best search results around you, press the "Find my position" button first. In Settings â†’ General â†’ Distances if Miles/Feet is selected, the temperatures will appear in Fahrenheit

title: Debenhams
description:
Fashion. Beauty. Home.
Explore 16,000+ of your favourite brands across Fashion, Beauty & Home, anytime, anywhere, with the Debenhams app.
Be inspired by the latest trends in Fashion from British names you love, including Coast, Karen Millen, Warehouse, Oasis, Burton, DP and Misspap.
Elevate your Beauty routine with iconic names to covet, stocking up on skincare, makeup and signature fragrances youâ€™ll fall in love with. With names such as EstÃ©e Lauder, YSL, Hugo Boss and more, your beauty collection has never looked better.
Discover stylish options for every home. From a seasonal refresh to those everyday essentials, we've got you covered with tasteful touches through bedding, tableware and furniture updates, ready for family moments and entertaining with friends. Add a hint of SMEG, Slumberdown and Yankee Candle to your space and enjoy a haven that feels like home.
Opt in to receive our push notifications, so you can stay in the loop on exclusive offers and launches. Trust us, you donâ€™t want to miss them.
Enjoy a secure checkout, every time, meaning you can shop your favourites quickly and with ease. Thank us later.
Track your order from discovery to delivery and follow your parcelâ€™s journey to your door.
With every lifestyle in mind, Debenhams has something for everyone to discover, shop and love. Keep an eye out for some famous faces in collaboration with our renowned brands, so you can be inspired in this season and the next. Weâ€™re owning the everyday, and we canâ€™t wait for you to join us.

summary: Fashion. Beauty. Home.

scraped_reviews.content: If you are looking for an app that is slower than the first computer to exist, this is it! The promo codes don't work, and you are required to pay Â£8 extra if you want to ensure you get a replacement if it is damaged in transit. If it is damaged in transit, make the courier pay! When I order something, I expect it to arrive undamaged and I find it utterly ridiculous that the customer has to pay extra, or face receiving a damaged item with no replacement or refund.

I will never use debenhams app again. it's been so disappointing I've lost a lot of money. there is 3 items that I didn't like that I ordered. item 1: I returned it 2 weeks ago and still got no money back. item 2: The only way yo return it is by sending an email to the seller and then they give you the address where to return it and it cost me Â£10 to return it back. item 3: when I press "return item" it shows that the order number is not recognised so I can't even get a return label.
Pretty useless, if you zoom in to view any item you have to close the app because you can't get out of the zoomed image, basic basic programming errors probably developed by pre school children.

nice place to shop with different discounts. try it, you will definitely come back. l have been shopping in Debenham store for years, but it's a shame the closed down, l discovered they were online, making it a great joy for me to select all the best options. l fill in comfortably shopping with them.

Absolutely terrible after sales. There is no way of speaking to someone, just unhelpful AI responses. I ordered a fan, the base was twisted and broken by whoever packaged it (they must have realised, so why send it). Why should customers pay postage to return items that aren't fit for purpose? This is the 2nd time needing their terrible customer service. Spent Â£800+ with them during last 12 months. Might choose to shop elsewhere if I can't trust better service when things go wrong.

not a good service i have been messaging and emails about the broken product that i received , WhatsApp those pictures it keep on saying they are will contact ASAP but no response at all and i wanted to cancel there subscription still busyy, not happy with the service.

I like how you go into ads and see different clothes to see and buy if you want to do so. only thing I find difficult putting your date birth dont seem to have a Dropbox to tap the number in the correct way.

excellent service thank you Debenhams this fabulous hairdryer is a beautiful gift for my birthday treat from my two sons couldn't come at a better time as my one has just broken thankyou next up I'll be browsing for my lovely Christmas gifts from Debenham and for my family, grandson,godson, goddaughter, Happy days are coming as there are lots of different colourful pieces of clothing, toys, furniture, I'll browse and add them to my wishlist until next month then start ordering forever

Please note, this is the DBZ Marketplace, not the established Debenhams brand. It appears they've acquired the name without creating their own identity. My experience has been poor: no after-sales support, an incorrect item was dispatched, and I've been waiting for a resolution (refund or goods) for nearly a month. I strongly advise caution. Quick to take money but aftershaves very poor to non-existent.

cant get a return label for fot my items l have spent l day yesterday,there is problem?? can't contact them by phone??? the customer service is appaling, l will never use Debenhams again. veronicaferry

Really struggled at the delivery & payment stage using the app. Home delivery options would not appear, despite having a free delivery code & enough items in the basket. After half a dozen attempts it finally appeared.
Wonderful sales! But horrible to navigate app. Super slow to load up. Goes to the beginning and you have to start over. Not a great shopping experience. So I tend to browse less.
I am so happy there is an app for Debenhams as I can't get to the shops anymore and Debenhams has always been trusted by me.
I love how quick and easy it is to order online. In my opinion, the best thing for me is having the verification popping up and promping you to check all transactions. Fabulous ðŸ‘Œ ðŸ¤—
This shop is terrible . Ive had to.put in dispute for a refund they've said I had very poor customer service

The app itself is extremely slow. The "tracking" of orders is not accurate, stating the item has been "dispatched" when it has not (tracked via courier app). Basically no customer services; no phone number and seemingly do not reply to emails/ignore emails sent to customer services. Only got 3/5 of the last items I have ordered and cannot get in contact with anyone regarding this.

I was using this app for a long time. My experience was good every time, but last month, I ordered 3 items I received 2 of them but 1 is missing its been a month now that missing item never delivered and there is no way to contact them. I tried several times their contact us option,but it goes on an error page. There is no contact number or anything where I can complain about it. I'm so pissed off now ðŸ˜¡

I used to use this app fine, but upon reinstalling it, it's unusable. When clicking on the search function, the filters are unresponsive. I'll click one, it will take minutes to highlight, I'll do the same on another filter and the first one drops off. Debenhams, you are an on line business, getting your app to do the basics is the most important thing and you fall at the first hurdle. Right, Where's that John Lewis app.
They never refund you have to claim through paypal no matter how many times you contact them on WhatsApp
all good! always use Debenhams online, great service and great prices.
very easy site to use and sale prices are very good!
Easy to order and pay. Will definitely choose goods from here again
simple to navigate and spend, nice layout

This app is so frustrating to use. I get an email notification of an offer with a "Shop Offer" button. Click on it and it just takes you to the main page. If it was for gifts or mens boots or menswear offers, it just goes to the main page. One offer was for Regatta coats and the link took me to womens wear each time. Not directly to the offer selected. Just frustrating. The actual service received on items ordered was excellent as was the returns process. Just a shame the app is so poor.
fantastic bargains and selection. ordered a rechargeable strimmer and storage boxes that collapsed for easy storage. can't wait for the items to arrive.
Amazed at the huge range of shoes, the sizing & colour choices. Prices are affordable & less expensive than most shops.
Everything you could possibly need, be it home, garden furniture or the fashion for the family. Competitive pricing easy to use APP. Highly recommend ðŸ‘Œ

title: Tile Story: Match Puzzle Game
description: Tile Story is a fun and challenging classic tile-matching game inspired by Mahjong. Best of all â€” itâ€™s free to play and works offline! Designed to help you relax while giving your brain a workout, Tile Story blends logic, strategy, and calm moments into a visually satisfying puzzle experience. Play at your own pace â€” no timers, no pressure. With hundreds of levels to explore, youâ€™ll sharpen your focus and observation skills with every match. If you love tile-matching or Mahjong-style puzzles, Tile Story is for you! How to Play? â–  Begin with a board featuring diverse tiles. â–  Match 3 identical tiles, like in Mahjong. â–  Clear the entire board for victory. â–  Beware! A full tray marks the end of the game. Game Highlights * Easy to pick up, fun to master * Over 10,000+ unique tile levels * Follow dramatic storylines * Experience creative rescue gameplay * Fruits, animals, candies, Mahjong tiles & more * Sharpen your brain while finding joy * Play offline, no Wi-Fi needed * Regular tile game updates * Free to download and play Relax, think, and enjoy every move. Have fun while casually keeping your mind sharp. Download Tile Story now and start your journey through hundreds of colorful, brain-boosting levels. Your next puzzle adventure awaits!
descriptionHTML:
Tile Story is a fun and challenging classic tile-matching game inspired by Mahjong. Best of all â€” itâ€™s free to play and works offline!

Designed to help you relax while giving your brain a workout, Tile Story blends logic, strategy, and calm moments into a visually satisfying puzzle experience.

Play at your own pace â€” no timers, no pressure. With hundreds of levels to explore, youâ€™ll sharpen your focus and observation skills with every match. If you love tile-matching or Mahjong-style puzzles, Tile Story is for you!

How to Play?

â–  Begin with a board featuring diverse tiles.
â–  Match 3 identical tiles, like in Mahjong.
â–  Clear the entire board for victory.
â–  Beware! A full tray marks the end of the game.

Game Highlights

* Easy to pick up, fun to master
* Over 10,000+ unique tile levels
* Follow dramatic storylines
* Experience creative rescue gameplay
* Fruits, animals, candies, Mahjong tiles & more
* Sharpen your brain while finding joy
* Play offline, no Wi-Fi needed
* Regular tile game updates
* Free to download and play

Relax, think, and enjoy every move. Have fun while casually keeping your mind sharp.

Download Tile Story now and start your journey through hundreds of colorful, brain-boosting levels. Your next puzzle adventure awaits!
summary: Enjoy tile matching puzzles and unlock fun stories!

title: SiriusXM: Music, Sports & News

Listen to seasonal soundtracks, festive mixes, and celebrity-hosted countdowns featuring big names and bright stars. Whether you're driving home for the holidays, hosting celebrations, or simply getting into the spirit of the season, celebrate with SiriusXM.

Stream live pro and college play-by-play, including NFL, NBA, & NHLÂ®. Catch the latest college football matchups with broadcasts from the countryâ€™s top conferences. From live games to in-depth analysis, SiriusXM is the ultimate destination for sports fans.
