descriptionHTML:
Expand your listening universe with SiriusXM. Explore live radio, ad-free music, podcasts, news, sports, comedy, and more. Get closer to your favorite stars with music and entertainment tailored just for you.

Turn on the holidays and soundtrack your season. Stream your favorite festive tunes with over two dozen holiday music channels, exclusively on SiriusXM. Enjoy Holiday Traditions, Radio Hanukkah, Country Christmas, Jimmy Fallonâ€™s Holiday Seasoning Radio, and more.

Listen to seasonal soundtracks, festive mixes, and celebrity-hosted countdowns featuring big names and bright stars. Whether you're driving home for the holidays, hosting celebrations, or simply getting into the spirit of the season, celebrate with SiriusXM.

Stream live pro and college play-by-play, including NFL, NBA, & NHLÂ®. Catch the latest college football matchups with broadcasts from the countryâ€™s top conferences. From live games to in-depth analysis, SiriusXM is the ultimate destination for sports fans.

Explore expertly curated entertainment with SiriusXM â€” the ultimate ad-free music, podcast, and radio app.

SiriusXM Features*

Online Music Streaming
- Unlock exclusive artist stations â€” The Beatles, Bruce Springsteen, Carrie Underwood, Dave Matthews Band, Diplo, Disney Hits, Eminem, Eric Church, John Mayer, Kenny Chesney, LL COOL J, Metallica, Pearl Jam, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Shaggy, Smokey Robinson, Steve Aoki, U2, & more
- Listen to Christmas music stations and holiday radio all season long

Live Sports Radio & Analysis
- Stream play-by-play of every major professional sport PLUS expert talk & analysis â€” NFL, MLBÂ®, NBA, NHLÂ®, the PGA TOURÂ®, & NASCARÂ®. Stay up-to-date with live scores in the app.
- Tune in to top NCAAÂ® conferences â€” ACC, SEC, Big 12, Big Ten, & more
- ESPN Radio, NBC Sports Radio, FOX Sports, & Infinity Sports Network in just a few taps
- Listen to sports talk radio for news, fantasy sports analysis, & more

News, Podcasts, Talk Shows, & Comedy
- Hear live news radio & political talk from all angles â€” FOX News, CNN, MSNBC, BBC World Service, FOX Business, CNBC, Bloomberg Radio, C-SPAN, NPR Now, & more
- Listen to Howard Stern on two exclusive channels*
- Stream unscripted talk radio with A-list hosts â€” Andy Cohen, Conan Oâ€™Brien, & TODAY Show Radio
- Laugh along to exclusive comedy â€” Kevin Hartâ€™s LOL Radio, Netflix Is A Joke Radio, & Comedy Central Radio

Discover & Save More of What You Love
- Expand your listening with personalized recommendations
- Explore dedicated pages for teams, genres, bands, channels, & more
- Save & organize your favorite radio stations, artists, & content in Your Library
- Get alerts when your shows or game-day programs go live
- Browse SiriusXM music and audio on our channel guide

Streaming Made For You
- Stay connected to the SiriusXM app on the road via Android Auto
- Listen everywhere on your favorite smart speaker or app-enabled device
- Cast from your phone or tablet for seamless listening on your TV, soundbar, or speaker

*Some programming includes explicit language.
All features and content vary by plan and are subject to change.

SUBSCRIPTION OFFER DETAILS: Upon purchase of any plan, your subscription will AUTOMATICALLY RENEW and you will be charged (after any free trial) the rate + applicable tax on a recurring monthly basis until you cancel. Cancel at least 24-hours before any renewal date in your account to avoid future charges. No refunds or credits, unless permitted by your billing platform. Promotional offers are for new subscribers only. All fees, content, and features may change. The SiriusXM app is made available to you by Sirius XM Radio Inc. Use of the SiriusXM app is limited to the United States and certain U.S. territories and is subject to the SiriusXM Customer Agreement at siriusxm.com/customeragreement. Some restrictions apply. Data charges may apply.

Privacy Policy: siriusxm.com/privacy
Your Privacy Choices: siriusxm.com/yourprivacychoices
summary: Tune in to sports radio, podcasts, and music curated by your favorite stars.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: much better! I can now pick and choose the channels I want. The only thing I would change is that the app is sensitive when you scroll through your channels, and it REALLY wants to delete a channel you've picked if you swipe a little too hard. If there was a way to lock them so they don't get deleted so easily, that would be perfect. I also wish the special channels would show what was playing (instead of just like, "Happy Oldies"), but its a small thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there. We've received your message regarding the app.

Please use the "Send us feedback" form, available in the app's Settings or web player, to share your thoughts directly with our team.

We also recommend checking the sensitivity of your device.

If you need assistance, please reach out at http://x.com/siriusxmcare.

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible app. Even once you get past the login issues (can't use a VPN), the app only sporadically works. It takes long to open and for songs to load. Songs will stop mid-stream and then the app won't let you start a new song or channel. Channels don't update to current live feed. These issues are only amplified with Android Auto, where the app will launch but not play. New issue: Entire library doesn't show up on AA. Favorited channels just aren't there.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there, Randall. We're sorry to hear that you're having trouble with the app. We'd love to help you with the issues you're experiencing. Please verify that you have the latest operating system for your phone, then reach out to us directly through this link so we can assist you: https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: We're back in business. App has been reinstalled for about 3 months now and no more random music. Happy to have full use of my subscription and all the extras available through the app! 03/2025: I recently uninstalled the app because it was causing my phone to play music randomly at night. I've reinstalled now hoping this will resolve the problem. I'll wait a few days and update this review again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello there, Larry! We're sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused. Rest assured, our team is aware of it and is working on a solution. Please keep an eye out for future updates containing app improvements and bug fixes.

Thank you for being a valued SiriusXM listener!

scraped_reviews.content: the app will not close on my tablet after recent update. also, there is a stutter in the voice while listening to talk shows. uninstalled, reinstalled but to no avail. when trying to notify you and explain the problem, your AI program is terrible. the choices we're forced to pick don't apply to many issues. frustration is high with what I think is incompetence. please prove me wrong. tech support called me to help but I managed to fix the problem myself before they called.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Weâ€™re sorry youâ€™re experiencing these issues, Jd. Please make sure your tabletâ€™s OS is up-to-date, clear the app cache, and check your background app settings.

If the problem continues, please DM us at https://x.com/SiriusXMCare so we can take a closer look.

scraped_reviews.content: always says "getting selection" after selecting a channel on android auto car screen, but it never plays. i have to go back and keep selecting the channel until it plays, usually 3 times. and the android auto menu format is terrible and distracting when driving. I'd like to see all my library favorites as soon as I open the app. sadly it only shows a few favorites, making me have to search for any other channel I want to listen to. and please sync library favorites across devices.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there, weâ€™re sorry to hear about this. Please try:

â€¢ Unlinking and re-pairing your phone with Android Auto
â€¢ Clearing the app cache (Settings > Apps > SiriusXM > Storage > Clear Cache)
â€¢ Force-closing and reopening the app

If the issue persists, please DM us at x.com/SiriusXMCare so we can investigate further. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: 4 yrs later & this app still doesn't allow time shifting. As horrible my Rand McNally OD8Pro with SXM is. I can at least rewind 45 min or so. Which allows me to skip bad songs & commercials. There's no reason this app couldn't also. OLD: Streaming sucks. Programs stop when signal is lost. Little if any buffering. With other apps I can download the whole podcast & play uninterrupted. Buffering should work with live shows too. Since I can go back in time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey Robert, we appreciate you taking the time to share this feedback. We've passed along your comments to the appropriate teams for review.

Please feel free to share more of your experience here: siriusxm.com/feedback.

If you need a hand with anything, please DM us at https://x.com/SiriusXMCare. We're here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: This has been ridiculous. It would not let me log in with my old login that I've used for years. It put me through a circle of logging in and then relogging in. Finally, I created a new account with a new email and signed up for the year. Now it says I only have the subscription on the app, and I can't add my vehicle, which is where I wanted it in the first place. I'm frustrated that I've wasted almost an hour on it now, and now I have to try to get a refund.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We're sorry to hear about your experience with logging in, Austin.

If you subscribed via Google Play, you will only receive an app-only plan. You would need to subscribe elsewhere to receive a plan for both vehicles and the app.

If you'd like to look into what we can offer, reach out to us at siriusxm.com/contact-us, and our agents can assist.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is always closing, randomly throughout the day. Sometimes 10 to 15 times a day. It's getting hard to pay for a service that randomly quits working. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app numerous times. I have made sure to have a strong internet connection, and that nothing else would interfere with it, but it does not matter. I have tried on multiple devices but have the same results on all them. It's sad that we would rather listen to hours of commercials. still not working right!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi David,

We are sorry to hear that the crashing continues. As you've tried multiple devices, it would be best for our team to investigate your case and address the issue directly.

Please contact us via DM http://x.com/siriusxmcare or use 'Chat Now' at http://siriusxm.com/contact for personalized assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for several years, over the last six months or so the app randomly closes. gets annoying when your in the middle of a run and the music quits. in addition, there seems to be a significant increase in the amount of talking from DJ's and random product placement. I pay for XM so I don't have to hear people talk, I just want music.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi James, weâ€™re sorry to hear youâ€™ve been having trouble with the app closing unexpectedly. Please try clearing the cache and ensuring your OS is up to date.

For a more music-only experience, we recommend checking out our Xtra channels.

If the issue persists, please DM us at https://x.com/SiriusXMCare so we can take a closer look.

scraped_reviews.content: **edit** 10-8-2025 the skip feature has been restored. thank you ...... ...I dont know what you people did to this app, but if there was an update, you should fire everyone involved because i cannot skip forward or back when i listen to the news through the commercials. i pay for this and i cant stand using the app anymore and i dont have any other options!!!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We're glad to hear you're able to skip once more, Matt.

Should you re-encounter this issue, you can change your steering wheel and on-screen controls by navigating to Settings > App Settings > Playback > Android Auto controls.

We hope this helps. If you encounter any other issues, please don't hesitate to reach out at http://x.com/siriusxmcare.

scraped_reviews.content: Way to make the new version put us in danger! I thought there was a problem with my phone until I read the reviews that the new version does not allow you to skip through news commercials. I listen primarily while I'm driving. so now instead of pushing a button and my eyes never leaving the road I have to fumble with my phone and turn it on and get to the app and then continuously keep looking down at my phone to keep forwarding 15 seconds at a time through the commercials. just plain stupi
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your feedback regarding our skip function. Ensuring our app is easy to use is very important to us.

We've passed your thoughts on to our team, who can keep this in mind as we improve the app.

If you have any other suggestions, please don't hesitate to use the following link: https://siriusxm.com/feedback. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the only app that I can honestly say is junk. First problem I had was it would start playing at random times for no reason. Night, day, any hour, it didn't matter, it would just start playing. Uninstalled it, cleared cache and reinstalled it. Now it won't play a song for maybe 5 or 10 seconds and just shuts off. You will be disappointed if you get this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Sorry about the playback issues you have experienced, Ron.

Try disabling 'Autoplay' in the app's Settings > Playback. Ensuring your device OS is updated and clearing the cache helps. Check your phoneâ€™s background app settings to ensure the app isnâ€™t set to Auto-launch.

If the issue persists, please contact us via DM http://x.com/siriusxmcare.

scraped_reviews.content: Getting better but still lagging other straming music apps. I'm liking the additional content provided on the "Extras" app-exclusive channels and it's a move in the right direction. Just still got some steps to take. My biggest point of contention would be the app UI. It's not pretty. It's not very intuitive. Like I said, though, things do seem to be moving in the right direction. I would have rated this 2 stars 6 mos ago. 2025 edit: 2 stars. Android Auto experience is awful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for the feedback, Nathan. We appreciate your thoughts and have shared them with the teams for review. Try clearing the app's cache to help with the lagging.

If you need help navigating the app or with Android Auto, feel free to DM us at https://x.com/SiriusXMCare or connect with our support team at https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us.

scraped_reviews.content: If you're looking to purchase constant frustration, this app is for you. Apparently, there are satellites up there that relay broadcasts of programming like old timey radio still does. But unlike old timey radio, when you turn it on, it doesn't work. Old timey radio is free. This is not. When the app works, it's great. The constant "we're having trouble playing this" is not worth my membership, which began in April 2007.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Byron. We're sorry to hear you're having these issues. Please try the following troubleshooting steps:

- Update the app to the latest version
- Update your AndroidOS to the latest version
- Ensure you have a stable internet connection
- Disconnect your VPN if you're using one

If the issue persists, reach out at x.com/siriusxmcare.

Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is worthless using Android Auto. It never opens without using your phone - everything else just opens from the screen. There is no way to pull up your saved programs or stations without using your phone. Why even bother with the app if it doesn't work on the screen.? Past versions were much better - thinking of canceling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Bob, weâ€™re sorry to hear about the issues experienced with Android Auto. The app launches typically from your phone for safety. Please try updating the SiriusXM & Android Auto apps, clearing both caches, and reinstalling them.

If the issue persists, please reach out at http://x.com/siriusxmcare or http://siriusxm.com/contact for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: downgrade to single star due to continuous issues with speed, still constantly get the "we're having trouble playing this" message. Worst app on my phone. App is so terribly bad in terms of being able to playback stations. I constantly receive the "We're having trouble playing this" message. I switch over to Spotify and no problem. This is my only media app that struggles to play content. Also they could much better in making Favorites easier to get to - refer to Spotify again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We're sorry to hear you're having issues with our app, William. We'd love to help.

Please try the following:

-If you are connected to a VPN, disconnect from it.
-Clear the app's cache, restart, then try again.
-Review the app's permissions and data usage.

If the issue persists, please get in touch with us at http://x.com/siriusxmcare for help.

scraped_reviews.content: I gave this a â­ because I can't give it a zero. Recently, to my dismay I inadvertently installed version. 7.19.1. previously, I was using a much older version that worked well. I despise this version. Give me function over glitz any day of the week. Until about a year ago, I kept all of my old old app versions on the network drive. unfortunately, that drive crashed a year ago leaving me with no backups. Now I can't go back to my old version because I don't know what the version number was.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Weâ€™re sorry to hear the app isn't meeting your expectations, Gerald. We are continually working on app improvements, bug fixes, and exciting new features. We recommend you update to the latest SiriusXM app version for the best experience.

If you'd like to share thoughts about specific features, let us know at siriusxm.com/feedback.

Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be a good app. Used to be able to binge a show, and the app would play all episodes in succession. Now, it just repeats the same episode over and over. 5 minutes after I start listening, the app stops playback and gives a "something went wrong" message. I have to close the app, reopen, and restart what I'm listening to. Normally, that wouldn't be an issue, but I am a truck driver,and I listen while I'm at work. Having to pull over every time this happens is inconvenient.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello there, Anthony.

Please try the following:

-Update your operating system to a newer version.
-If you are connected to a VPN, disconnect from it.
-Clear the app's cache, restart, then try again.

If the issue persists, please get in touch with us at http://x.com/siriusxmcare or at https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us for further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Takes up the whole notifications bar. But if you block notifications. It doesn't work anymore. At least connected to car. I shouldn't have to periodically swipe down on my phone while driving to make sure I haven't missed a text or something. I should still be able to see my other 4 or 5 recent notifications. You can't control app from notification bar anyway so no reason to take up the entire notifications bar.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Jeffrey,

Thank you for your feedback on this issue. Please try updating the app to the latest version (7.20.0). You can also try customizing notification appearance in your phone's Android settings.

If the issue persists, please contact us at http://x.com/siriusxmcare or http://siriusxm.com/contact for personalized assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: 1 star!! This app has had the same problem for years...PLEASE FIX IT! If you open the app in your vehicle, close the app and exit the vehicle, when you re-renter later it auto-connects and starts back up...even if it's closed and you don't want it to! And most of the time you need to go to your Apps folder and do a 'Force Stop'. I check for updates often...again, been going on for years!! 5 stars if this ever gets fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi George, we're sorry to hear about this issue. Please try these steps:

â€¢ Ensure you have our latest app and OS version installed.
â€¢ Removing the Bluetooth connection from your phone and car and re-pairing them can also help.

If the issue persists, please DM us at x.com/SiriusXMCare so we can investigate further. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: "We are having trouble playing this" must really be a popular song because they play it on every extra station. Oh wait no that's just what I get every time I try to play music. Regardless of location, at home on the computer or 30 miles away at work on my cell. Since the latest update the app is basically garbage. I've reinstalled, cleared cache but nothing helps. Regular stations suck and I don't want to hear DJs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sky, we're sorry to hear you're having trouble with the app. Given that you have tried the standard troubleshooting steps, please reach out to one of our agents at siriusxm.com/contact-us or via social media at https://www.facebook.com/siriusxm/, and they'll be happy to help you go through some troubleshooting steps.

scraped_reviews.content: This long-time and long-known service was pathetic. I subscribed to use the service for low service areas, but it also did not work in low service areas. Further, it must be set up for a particular car. Well, I travel. Ultimately I did set it up on my phone, and could connect by Bluetooth, but I have lots of time wasted trying to get connectivity. In total, a super underperforming service. Also, the content was not impressive. A bunch of "B" level talent. and a lot of it was outdated.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We're sorry to hear you ran into some issues. To ensure you're getting the best service, please refresh your car radio at care.siriusxm.com/subscribe/refresh-signal.

Our goal is to provide the best possible listening experience, so we'd love to hear more about what content you'd love to see. Share your thoughts at siriusxm.com/feedback.

Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: App has gotten better than when I last used it, but Chromecasting channels to my Youtube TV remains busted. The music will play for a little while, but then it starts pausing for very long periods of time. Seems you need to use the Youtube TV app itself to play SiriusXM on YoutubeTV, but I prefer to use my phone to control it. Would be nice if this could be fixed. I am having this issue when using the app both from my Pixel phone(s) and Pixel tablet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Roberto, we appreciate the feedback. For Casting issues, you can try the following:

- Ensure both devices are on the same Wi-Fi
- Update the SiriusXM and Google Home apps
- Restart your Chromecast

If the issue persists, please reach out at http://x.com/siriusxmcare or http://siriusxm.com/contact for further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: EDIT: In further communication: The UI on my phone doesn't have the "easy" option mentioned, but I did find the 4-step process to add them to my Library. That doesn't resolve the horrible "OR" based non-filterable search, having no "light" mode, a convoluted and cluttered interface, "Stern?", the constant pauses "for Safety" on the UI, "Just for you" items that make zero sense and poor categorization. It is an app designed to never take the place of their expensive in-car plans.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Weâ€™re sorry to hear the app hasnâ€™t met your expectations, Rich. We appreciate you taking the time to share such detailed feedback and have submitted it to the appropriate teams.

If youâ€™d like help navigating the app, feel free to send us a DM at https://x.com/SiriusXMCare or connect with support through here: https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to be able to listen to Fox News on my S24 and skip through the commercial breaks or segments I didn't want to hear. I could go forward and backward. Very nice. Now I can only skip around in 15 second increments. Frustrating. The software update is likely designed to optimize commercials. I am switching to other products.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! Thanks for hanging in while we worked on the skip issue. A fix was included in our latest update (7.20). Please update your app and let us know if you still notice any problems. If you have more questions, you can always reach us here: https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us.

scraped_reviews.content: This new version takes some getting used to. After finding how to play previous shows (148-classic radio) from earlier in the day it was nice to see granularity of the lists such as commercials, announcements, shows, etc. Now the Not so good. That same list doesn't list the show by name it lists the star of that one episode. You have to start it to find out what show it is. The app also Keeps stopping and freezing up sometimes requiring a force close. Sometimes it stops and u just

Maybe the app itself is OK, when it works, but the company itself is a problem. Channels you want to listen to are taken over by stuff you don't want to hear. Programming is preempted on certain channels during sporting events. Many channels have been dropped from the lineup. SiriusXM has also made the same mistake as cable companies by jacking up the cost of a subscription. Depending on what you like to listen to, there are plenty of free apps with no subscription that are better alternatives.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for your review, Kenneth. We appreciate your insights about the channel changes and pricing. We'll share all your feedback with the relevant teams. Feel free to visit. https://www.siriusxm.com/channels to stay up to date with all of our content.

Please don't hesitate to contact us directly if you need assistance; we're here to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Sad day, I begrudgingly updated to the new app (the one without Favorites but with Library) Like many, I simply hate it. Hate it enough to cancel service instead of trying to get use to the new app. Who needs the aggregation when there are so many other options. App now is more unstable and crashes more requently, the replay doesn't seem to work as robustly. The song start feature needs an option to play the end of the previous song, like before, because it doesn't start at the beginning
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the updated review. We appreciate you taking the time to give a detailed account of your experience and are sorry it hasn't been ideal. A few troubleshooting steps you can try are clearing the app cache, freeing up storage space and ensuring there is stable Wi-fi. If the issues persist please reach out on social media and we can help.

scraped_reviews.content: The main stations are pretty good and pretty reliable. The "extra" stations and artist stations can get repetitive and also sometimes have trouble playing for no apparent reason. Sometimes they will play a track or two before throwing an error. It wouldn't even be that big of a deal except when this happens you have to open the app back up and hit "try again" until it decides to work, which is annoying most of the time and downright dangerous while driving.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Christopher, we're sorry to hear about your experiences with our app.

Please try the following:

â€¢ Ensure you're using the latest app version
â€¢ Clear your app cache
â€¢ Force close other apps running in the background that might be consuming bandwidth

If the issue persist, please DM us at https://x.com/SiriusXMCare

Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Use to work fine after several latest updates music halts and pops an error saying it's offline to try again later. I've cleared cache, nothing! I thought it was just the 1 station. Also thought it was my WIFI connectivity. It ain't, still randomly happening, particularly when I'm in the shower and can't react! At this point I'm considering cancellation of the service all together. It's expensive to be putting up with all these issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Weâ€™re sorry to hear that youâ€™re experiencing issues with our App, Carlos. Your feedback is very important to us, and we want to improve your experience. Please reach out to our support team here: https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us, or contact us through social media. Weâ€™d be happy to help you, and weâ€™ll get you back to enjoying the app in no time.

scraped_reviews.content: Always the same problem. They never fix it. I download programs for later. The app will frequently fail to pick up in the same place after a pause. I have to waste time searching for where I left off. EDITED PART: OK, so the size of the "now playing notification" in the status bar is not the fault of this app. It's the fault of One UI 7.0
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the update, Chris â€” and weâ€™re sorry to hear youâ€™re still running into playback issues with downloaded programs. Weâ€™d like to learn more. Please reach out to us via DM on social media and connect with our support team for troubleshooting assistance here: https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us. We're here to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolute garbage. When I'm using the app with Android Auto I can barely access my library. Only a few library selections will show and I can't even scroll through them without it bouncing right back to the top every time. Most of the time I have to resort to Google voice commands to change the channel. I've been with SiriusXM for years. But I'm tired of the high prices, glitchy reception, app issues and sketchy customer service. I'm going to let my subscription expire.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience. We're sorry to hear about the Android Auto issues. Weâ€™re aware of them and looking into it. Your feedback is important, and weâ€™ve passed it to the appropriate teams. While we regret youâ€™re considering letting your subscription expire, we respect your decision and want you to know your voice has been heard.

scraped_reviews.content: Like several others have commented, the app starts on its own. Power my phone up, the music starts with it without fail. Clearing the cache & data works only until I use the app again, at which point it starts running on startup once again. I rolled back to v6.7 for the time being, which stopped this from happening. I'm seriously considering cancelling my subscription. Also, I sent feedback through the app, so don't bother telling me to do so again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Perry. We're committed to making things better. Please reach out directly via this link: https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us. Let's work together to ensure you're back to enjoying your SiriusXM experience to the fullest.

Check the Google Play regularly to ensure you've got the most up-to-date version of the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Easy to use, almost always works unless I switch from wifi to cellular. No ads is great. Update: Hate the new app. I want the tiles back, and to be able to sort my library. They tried to fix this, but only 3 options, no way for me to order my stations. And the list is way too small for me to see and manipulate when running. Not user friendly at all, and might be the final straw for me keeping sirius.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Beth. Good news! Youâ€™ll be able to organize your Library in the order you want! Weâ€™re making enhancements to the Library, and you can expect manual sorting to arrive in the coming months. Thanks for your patience as we continue to evolve the SiriusXM app."

scraped_reviews.content: New app version is terrible! Can't put your favorite channels in your preferred order or see what is playing on them so you can decide if you want to change channels. Also can't simply skip around back and forwards to get to a song I like. Can't stand seeing all these celebrities promoted, I don't want to see their names or faces, bunch of jerks that don't interest me. Interface busy and clunky. Fortunately, I mostly only listen in the car to the onboard sxm radio, which still works great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Catherine. Good news: we addressed this in a recent update. Check the Google Play to get the most up-to-date version of the SiriusXM app. Kindly also try to uninstall and reinstall the app.

Send us feedback by opening the app or web player, then going to "Settings" and clicking on "Send Us Feedback."

scraped_reviews.content: Over priced! They make it easy to sign up, get you hooked, then renew you at a real high rate without letting you know that your renewal is coming. And it takes days to get someone on the line. When you do, the "advisors" make it hard to cancel! If you add a card only keep the amount you need to pay on it, so when they charge you the amount you were not aware of, they won't get the money, and they will try to get ahold of YOU. Its easier to do this way and you get a better price.

When I use the app with Android Auto, I cannot go back to any other station other than the one that I'm listening to. To change to another station I have to go to my phone. When I hit the back button it just brings up a page that just lists Discover, Music, Sports, Talk but if you hit any of them they don't do anything. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling both apps. Very disappointing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about the difficulties you're experiencing. We appreciate your efforts to resolve this by reinstalling the apps. Your feedback is important, and weâ€™ll pass it along to our technical team for investigation. In the meantime, please reach out to our support team for troubleshooting assistance: https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us.

scraped_reviews.content: The old app was way better. I can't save my favorite stations. They should make good extra stations regular 1s so they can be programed into a car radio. Most of the stations repeat the same 40 song over&over, when there's so many good songs in the Catagory. Wish they'd catch up with the times. Bollywood great, but they only play it for a specialty show. Wish they had electronic music with stupid words. Why does chill instrumental have words? Really need to overhaul and freshen up the Playlist.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there. We know how much you like how the old app works. Send us feedback by opening the app or web player, then going to "Settings" and clicking on "Send Us Feedback." Check out the Library in the bottom nav to see your faves.

Also, check the Google Play regularly to ensure you've got the most up-to-date version of the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Some of the updates promoted are good, like the new layout, and searching is easier with better results. But you continue to promote pause, rewind, and listen to previous clips, but it's inconsistent, and regularly it doesn't stay paused. Additionally, when switching to another device, headphones to BT speaker, it doesn't resume in the same spot. Then the selector to go back sometimes works. When it does work, you can't select a location only a general area.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We're sorry to hear the app isn't meeting your expectations. To ensure the best compatibility, please update your phone to the latest version of Android.

If the problems persist, please reach out to us at www.siriusxm.com/contact-us, and one of our agents will be happy to assist you further.

Thanks for being a valued SiriusXM listener!

scraped_reviews.content: Edited to add This still happens despite asking support for assistance. Now it even will play, but not allow me to skip or rate any songs. All of a sudden, mid-song, the app stopped working. All the content is "not available at this time. Tried force close. Tried installing and re-installing. This streaming is part of a paid for subscription and now I can't access it. Bad enough that before this I had to frequently restart the app due to glitches.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Rebecca, weâ€™re so sorry youâ€™re still experiencing these issues. Thanks for letting us know about the steps youâ€™ve already taken. Please reach out to us via social media so we can gather more details and escalate this to get it resolved quickly. We appreciate your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is going downhill. I like the programming for the most part, but their attempts to make it easier to use is making it more complicated. I've sent multiple reports for the app stopping when my phone locks with no response from them. I've updated, removed, and reinstalled the app multiple times with no change. Update. Latest update makes the app useless through Android Auto. And no... clearing the cache or reinstalling still doesn't make it work. Shame I paid for a full year.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Bill, we're sorry to hear you're having problems and thank you for attempting to troubleshoot the issue! Please contact us directly at https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us so we can investigate this and get you listening problem-free in no time.
If you have any questions in the meantime, please reach out!

scraped_reviews.content: I think I solved the reason for the app pausing every 2 minutes or so. The last update caused high battery/memory usage. Thus, android puts the app to sleep after you initiate device maintenance (a setting feature in the OS). After that, the app will pause activity until you "wake it up." To fix, go into "settings." In the search bar at the top, type "sleep." Then you'll see a list of apps that are put to sleep. Long press the Siriusxm spp, then press "remove." Now, it'll play uninterruped.

This app is becoming annoying. It's so frustrating when you're listening to a podcast or music and it stops and says trying to connect. Especially when it's connected to WiFi. So what is it trying to connect to? I will not pay for this if it's not going to work. Update: App still doing the same thing. I force stopped it, I uninstalled it and reinstalled. Nothing is working, so I'm uninstalling for good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Erin. We're sorry to hear that you're still experiencing the issue. We'd love dive into your service with you and see what's going on.

For personal assistance, you may reach us at: https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us

scraped_reviews.content: App is OK. I guess better than the previous version, but still not great. Still randomly starts playing the most recent station (almost always at night when phone is charging) for a few seconds and stops, but the phone doesn't indicate anything should be playing. This has happened to me 3 times, twice it woke me up at 2AM and then last night it happened again right as I was getting ready for bed, but not yet asleep. That's a bug that really needs to be fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, Darin. We're sorry to hear about the issues you're experiencing with the app. To help us better understand and address the problem, please reach out to us via our social channels or contact us directly at https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us. Your input is invaluable as we strive to improve the app experience.

scraped_reviews.content: Hands down the worst streaming app I've ever used. This used to be my favorite app for music and I gave it 5 stars previously, but now I rarely open it. Each time I do it randomly stops in the middle of songs, skips to another song, stops altogether, and today there was the same song playing over itself with about a 5 second difference?!?! I cleared all the cache and tried using it again, and same issues. I run into similar issues on my laptop browser, and Chromecast.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Jim. Your feedback is important to us; we want to ensure it gets to the right place. The best way to share it with our team is to use the Send us feedback form. Open the app or web player, then go to Settings and select Send us feedback.

Please send us a private message on Facebook or Twitter for us to further investigate this.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the worst app I have ever used. I have an S20+ phone and plenty of WiFi Bandwidth to support. But yet even if I properly sign out, I still can't reconnect without Uninstalling and reinstalling multiple times a day. Please don't give the 90 minute excuse. I never make it an hour before the app locks up. either tell me what I'm doing wrong or fix the issues or I will cancel my 2 subscription forever!!!

When I first got Sirius and this app it worked great. Now, I'm about to cancel my subscription and be done with it. It will be playing music then all of a sudden just stop. I open the app and press play and it says "no connection" even though i have 5g and 5 bars. I've deleted all of my cache and even reinstalled the app. Frustrating when I'm trying to drive and this happens. I'm not one to fiddle with my phone when I drive!

The app is great. access to all of my favorite stations. My only complaint has nothing to do with the app...you would think for the cost you would be allowed more than one device listening at the same time. Im not paying for 2 subscriptions so my wife can listen to a different station in the house while I listen to one in the garage. !!Update!! I was able to get my subscription set up to be able to listen from 2 devices for a price I could stand to pay. I wish stations didn't repeat so much.

1/26/2024 No better even after a month of hit/miss. 12/2023 I didn't think they could make this app worse but they have surprised me. The last version was worse than the previous one and this new one of 12/23 is far worse. No timer that I can easily find, unable to find my favorites on Radio Classics trying to play programs absolutely stinks. I may have to cancel as this is mostly worthless now. Scroll to earlier times difficult to determine time frame. Not labeled. New version about the same.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, David. This is not how we want you to feel about the app. We value your opinions greatly and want to make sure that our app team hears you clearly.

Send us feedback by opening the app or web player, then going to "Settings" and clicking on "Send Us Feedback."

Also, check out the Library in the bottom nav to see your faves.

scraped_reviews.content: The new update is horrible!!! I've been using the app for years and I can't find any of my stations. They are trying so hard to push all there alternative content BS they lost completely the actual reason I have the app to begin with which is the channels. Also it's impossible and unsafe to use in the car where I did until today use it every day. Lost a customer congrats.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, David. We are committed to providing excellent service, so your feedback is much appreciated. Feel free to drop your feedback by opening the app or web player, then going to "Settings" and clicking on "Send Us Feedback."

If you need further assistance, you may reach us at:
https://www.siriusxm.com/contact-us

title: MAPS.ME: Offline maps GPS Nav
description: Fast, detailed and entirely offline maps with turn-by-turn navigation â€“ trusted by over 140 million travelers worldwide. OFFLINE MAPS Save mobile data, no internet is required. NAVIGATION Use driving, walking and cycle navigation anywhere in the world. TRAVEL GUIDES Save you time planning the trip and never miss an interesting place with our ready-made travel guides. Whether you prefer city travel, car trips or outdoor activities you will find a great choice of guides for a perfect journey. INCREDIBLY DETAILED Directions to points of interest (POI), hiking trails and places missing from other maps. UP-TO-DATE Maps are updated by millions of OpenStreetMap contributors daily. OSM is an open-source alternative to popular map services. FAST AND RELIABLE Offline search, GPS navigation along with optimized maps to effectively save memory space. BOOKMARKS Save locations you love and share them with your friends. AVAILABLE WORLDWIDE Essential for home and travel. Paris, France? Check. Amsterdam, Netherlands? Check. Barcelona, Spain? Check. New York, Chicago, Florida, Las Vegas, Nevada, Seattle, San Francisco, California, USA? Check! Rome, Italy? Check. London, UK? Check. AND MORE! â€“ Search through different categories e.g. restaurants, cafes, tourist attractions, hotels, ATMs and public transport (metro, busâ€¦) â€“ Make hotel bookings via Booking.com directly from the app â€“ Share your location via text message or social media â€“ When cycling or walking, the app shows whether the way is uphill or downhill Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. If you have any questions, visit our Help Center: support.maps.me. If you are unable to find the answer to your question, contact us at: feedback@maps.me. Follow us on FB: http://www.facebook.com/mapswithme | Twitter: @MAPS_ME
descriptionHTML:
Fast, detailed and entirely offline maps with turn-by-turn navigation â€“ trusted by over 140 million travelers worldwide.

OFFLINE MAPS
Save mobile data, no internet is required.

NAVIGATION
Use driving, walking and cycle navigation anywhere in the world.

TRAVEL GUIDES
Save you time planning the trip and never miss an interesting place with our ready-made travel guides. Whether you prefer city travel, car trips or outdoor activities you will find a great choice of guides for a perfect journey.

INCREDIBLY DETAILED
Directions to points of interest (POI), hiking trails and places missing from other maps.

UP-TO-DATE
Maps are updated by millions of OpenStreetMap contributors daily. OSM is an open-source alternative to popular map services.

FAST AND RELIABLE
Offline search, GPS navigation along with optimized maps to effectively save memory space.

BOOKMARKS
Save locations you love and share them with your friends.

AVAILABLE WORLDWIDE
Essential for home and travel. Paris, France? Check. Amsterdam, Netherlands? Check. Barcelona, Spain? Check. New York, Chicago, Florida, Las Vegas, Nevada, Seattle, San Francisco, California, USA? Check! Rome, Italy? Check. London, UK? Check.

AND MORE!
â€“ Search through different categories e.g. restaurants, cafes, tourist attractions, hotels, ATMs and public transport (metro, busâ€¦)
â€“ Make hotel bookings via Booking.com directly from the app
â€“ Share your location via text message or social media
â€“ When cycling or walking, the app shows whether the way is uphill or downhill

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

If you have any questions, visit our Help Center: support.maps.me.
If you are unable to find the answer to your question, contact us at: feedback@maps.me.
Follow us on FB: http://www.facebook.com/mapswithme | Twitter: @MAPS_ME
summary: Worldwide offline navigation with maps and driving directions

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app even at its unpaid level. Maps are very user friendly and have a better appearance than Google. Bookmark feature is awesome. I am giving 4 stars instead of 5 only because I would like to try paid subscription but no provisions to sign up for Maps.me account and if I enter phone number, I get a server error. If I go to help link and click on it, I get a server error. I need to make sure paid subscription can be used across multiple devices but no way to communicate with them.

Trying to use this app for upcoming trip. I had used in 2015 with no issues as all. But now I can't get it to function on my Android phone. It is pestering me to go "Pro" - and I'm OK with that, I'll do it. But how? When I click the button for that all I get is the marketing appeal and a spinning circle. No UI that allows me to actually do it. And when I go to the web site on my desktop PC there is no option or help there either.

Completely worthless. I downloaded the map for my state and when I clicked on "Where to eat" it only shows places within 0.2 miles from me. One of the 4 places it lists has been closed for over 2 years. I can't set my Home location because it only allows street names, and not street numbers. You can't even drop a pin and set your Home location that way. It failed at the 2 simplest things I tried when I first installed it. It's free and barely worth it.

This app got me through many journeys around the world. Simple, effective and thorough offline maps and directions with no frills. Not always up to date with businesses or transit, but they are very detailed when it comes to navigation, and available when you have no SIM card or cell signal. Unfortunately, they've decided to heavily limit offline map storage and availability, locking it behind a pay wall. I'm sure it still functions fine but it's not the reliable free tool it was for years.

This app was my favorite, and one of the few that I valued enough to pay for, even at the somewhat steep price (I thought) -- but it was worth it. Only now it's time to renew, and it won't renew; it continually declines my transaction. So I'm stuck with just a tiny number of maps, and all my saved info is gone. I'll be looking for something else to replace it. :-(

Had this on my device for about 3 minutes and I'm already going to delete it, but I wanted to leave a review first. Downloading a "local" map was easy, even if the "local" area didn't make any sense, and included far too much ocean and not enough nearby area. I scrolled outside of the downloaded area just to see what would happen and was gifted with a popup telling me I needed to download the local area map and that I only had a few FREE downloads left. Not worth it for me.

What just happened? This used to be a great app, now there's a limit on number of maps and number of bookmark folders? I'm supposed to pay over $50 PER YEAR to "unlock" what used to be included? I'd pay a reasonable subscription model (or ideally one time fee) if it's the only way to keep the app going, but all the map data is free, open source, and user contributed so what am I paying for?? Goodbye, moving to Organic Maps like everyone else

Totally ruined, do not use. This app has gone from the best free map out there to a demo of a cashgrab app. It used to have unlimited maps now it's reduced to 10, unlimited bookmarks now its reduced to 10, some features are now locked behind pro verion... Who knows what else they will disable in the future. This is a potential scam: letting you use some of the app for free then in future versions make your bookmarks, traveling data, travel logs that you've put in unaccessible unless you pay.

I'm looking for a Google Maps replacement, and while this one is definitely not there yet, it's "pretty good" and I'm planning to stick with it for a while & hope that it improves. Routes do not consider traffic so time-estimates are usually wrong, but I can deal with that. More of a problem is that search is very bad; sometimes it won't find addresses even if you give it the FULL address; I've had to just look online for a nearby building and navigate to that instead. Nearly there tho!

good app that could be even better. You need to allow the hwy and road names to be visible while focused on a small area instead of having to constantly zone in and out to get the name of the street. Also, I payed for this app many years ago, but now I am limited to just 20 maps because of a glitch in their system that says I didn't pay, but when I try to pay now, many years later it tells me I already paid! Yet I still cannot download new maps.

Update: was 5 stars in 2017, it now has too many ads and trackers, I've switched over to osmand and dropped this to 3 stars. Old: Works great, keep up the good work! Point-to-point routing would be great. It would also be nice if I could pre-load recorded tracks and show them in the app - I sometimes use the app while mountain biking and hiking, and it would be nice to see previous hiker/biker tracks as a point of reference.

I've used this app for many years. It was perfect for what I used it for, backpacking in the back country, and flying between countries. After many years I decided to update it, and oh what a what a disaster! Now they want a monthly subscription, to use an offline map I use 3 or 4x per year? And the price! No thanks. It's SAD to see another great product destroyed by greed. Now if only i can figure out how to backtrack versions.

Used to be the best, now the worst. I paid for the app when it was mapswithme. The amount of bloat and now they limit downloads to ten maps unless you buy an expensive pro version. BEWARE DO NOT UPDATE! They also don't tell you on the update notes that it's a version that is going to limit you unless you pay a lot every month. Very not honest. Now found that "Organic Maps" is like the old versions. Just a map without all the bloat around. So uninstalling this app after so many years. Do it too

Change their business model to a subscription. I purchased this app for all my devices Android and iOS. At the time there where no additional fees, ads or subscriptions. Now this app has ads and to get rid of them you have to pay a monthly subscription. They changed the rules in the middle of the game, I'm deleting it from all my devices. This app works offline after you download maps. Searching for an address is not good. You can import KMZ files, such as places you've mark in Goolge Maps.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: The app became free more than 4 years ago. We used all earned money for the app development. However, adding of new features and maintenance of existing ones require resources on a constant basis. Ads help us to stay afloat and make the app available for every user. We'll be thankful if you share your experience regarding search to android@maps.me

scraped_reviews.content: Subscription spoiled it. For more than 10 years, this was my favorite app. I have regularly donated. I have contributed a lot to the source of data - edited trails, added objects, and was happy to see my updates in the app. I am not happy with navigation mode: ETA for unpaved roads some times 3x more than it takes, each crossroad it says to turn even if strait. With 10 free downloaded maps only, it makes no sense anymore. For $50+ premium access there are better apps with the same source used.

They've killed it. I tried to open a pre-downloaded map today and was greeted by a sign stating that I have to download it, that I have 10 free maps left, and that I just switch to premium if I needed more. However, after tapping to (re-)download it and waiting for it to finish, nothing happens, the app hangs. After restarting it, the counter is back to 10 maps left and I still can't see any of the maps I had. So, regardless of the change in business model, all functionality is gone.

CONS: - I paid for the app way back when you had to purchase it. Some time later they made the app free but filled with ads, and now you have to buy subscription to remove the ads. This is the primary reason for 1 star rating. - Car navigation is so bad it's practically useless  PROS: - Good offline map support for when you visit countries where you have no service so long as you do not need navigation - Maps include hiking trails which is very useful if you're hiking national parks and you want to check where you are on the trail. The hiking trail maps are actually better than Google's.

Old version was better. Version 9.3.1 was the best version until they made unnecessary changes. The primary use of this app is for offline maps and navigation. Great when traveling to another country, you can download the map of the city/region ahead of time so you can navigate as soon as you land and your cellphone has no service in the other country. I wish they brought back the old version, it seems like every other reviewer also agrees that the new version is not great.

This is a very excellent map app. I use this when I need walking directions in a foreign country. The best is that it works offline, if you download the area map first (I don't have data roaming). This app can find hotels, ATMs, bus stops, and other vital locations offline. When I use other maps offline, I get lost very quickly, especially in an old European town full of crazy little streets and alleys, but this map is easier to read and I haven't had any trouble yet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback, thanks for leaving a review and for your continued support.

scraped_reviews.content: Maybe the best option if you need offline navigation, but very clunky and bloated, and the maps aren't styled well either. Keeps nagging me to use online features that I don't want, and last I checked was taking forever to open if I was online but had slow internet, which is absurd for an app that's supposed to be primarily for offline use. If you just want to look at offline maps (not get directions), use Mapy.cz or OsmAnd instead. You're welcome.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your feedback and for bringing this issue to our attention. To raise this issue with our development team, Could you please provide further information (including screenshots and videos where possible) to mapsmereviews@n2.org? It will help us investigate it further.

scraped_reviews.content: Nice offline maps app. Has been improving and adding more information to the maps consistently over the years. Good app to have when cell signal is bad. The trick is to download the maps of areas you will need, ahead of time, when you do have good data signal. I wish the border lines were thicker. And the fonts larger. Adding a Topo layer would be excellent.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your feedback. We are constantly working on the app and making it the best we can and we are listening carefully to our users for any feedback possible to help us improve. We hope your user experience keeps being positive and we look forward to hearing new feedback from you

scraped_reviews.content: great, free offline map app. If you're on wifi you can search locations and easily add them to your maps (I've struggled with this using only cellular data in foreign countries). I don't know if it's a feature yet, but I haven't been able to enter in coordinates and add pins for them -- this feature would bump it up to 5 stars! User friendly, good app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we appreciate your feedback and suggestions. Please contact our Support Team at mapsmereviews@n2.org and we can investigate it further. If you can please provide screenshots and ideally videos, it will make the process smoother. Thank you for your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: Can't look up location by business name. I had to put in the street name and hunt for the business. No business names unless it Starbucks or maybe McDonalds. The layout is nice and the streets have names and look good. However, we should be able to look a business by name and get navigation to it. I didn't find any settings to change for that option. Even further the initial box to tap for a location even asks the business name but you can't search that way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. Please contact our Support Team at mapsmereviews@n2.org and we can investigate it further. If you can please provide screenshots and ideally videos, it will make the process smoother. Thank you for your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: I used Map.Me for my Iceland trip, it worked great and I like it a lot. It even gives me all trials which i was looking for, much much better than Google maps. It guided me from place to place. For those searching results, for instance, a gas station or a restaurant, over 2000 km away, are probably meaningless. **** 08/19/23, I have to drop the rate to 1 star, because of the latest update making the app useless offline. Without the web service, the app could not even start the map.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! There are two formats available in the app: decimal (53.899366 27.543801) and DMS (53Â°53â€™57.72â€N 27Â°32â€™37.68â€E). Type coordinates in one of these formats in the search field to find or bookmark a necessary place.

scraped_reviews.content: JUMPED THE SHARK. I've been a HUGE fan of this app for well more than a decade, back when it was a start-up and they charged for the app, and I paid. How do I know it was more than a decade? It made our Gear of the Year list on our Travel Blog in 2013. Subsequently it was purchased, made free and improved greatly since that time. However, now they want $32/year for a subscription that allows more than 10 maps downloaded. Sure a developer is entitled to make money, but $32 per year???

When I reviewed this originally in 2017 there were no limitations and it was excellent. The 10 map limit seemed to be introduced last year and I managed with that. Now I come to use it again, I had the same experience as reviewer Enzo [23 December]. I can't access the maps I had already downloaded. I deleted a couple but the counter stayed at 10 and it wouldn't let me download any more. Yes, they've ruined it. I can't seem to give no stars so the one star indicates a useless app.

I want to love this app, but can't. Searching has too many problems: locations don't return results, and switching between map/list view makes some entries disappear. I love the spirit of this app, but without reliable search, I cant use it. UPDATE: I worked with support for 3 separate bugs. They were pleasant and prompt, but 2 of the issues remain, and they are deal-breakers for me. I genuinely look forward to using this app in a year or two when its more reliable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,

Thank you for the review.

Please contact us at android@maps.me and share more info about the issues, provide the examples of your search requests. We're happy to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to love this app after purchasing it a few years back. I found it very useful when I travelled overseas. That purchase isn't credited anymore so if I want to continue to use it with all the maps I had on my old phone, I'll have to now pay a monthly subscription. I don't like how that change was managed, and it's now more expensive than it's useful to me (especially since I already paid for it once) so I'm uninstalling.

I used this app daily as a pocket atlas, and it was a great offline map, just about the only app on my phone. Now I can't even type in a street name and get the street I'm looking for, it's honestly worse than a paper map. I really did love this app as I like to wander and explore new places I wouldn't find otherwise and this was perfect! I tried to use it for a while since the update, but it's useless to me now. I guess all companies ultimately aim to make money, not useful products.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for the feedback. Please could you update to the latest version of the app as we have fixed the search function amongst other features. We hope that you find it more user friendly and convenient!

scraped_reviews.content: Was the only app that works! Sadly "improved". Recently blocked by pay wall. When touring all over the world, I tried many other options, maps.me was the only one, when out in the wilderness, no signal required, no xtra charge, that actually shows a detailed map and pinpoint location! I get that they want to make some dough, I would too... Just sad to see it go. What's a cheapskate to do?

I really loved this app for navigating overseas via downloading the area map while on wifi and exploring the region just using the GPS function to get routes to destinations. But as of late, the app seems to avoid bridges by directing me to take exit then get back on the freeway again and has tricked me a few times into taking the exit which cost time and fuel to get back up to speed. I am currently looking for a replacement to this app, seems I have paid a few dollars to skip adds which is no big deal. I will probably keep the app just for the waypoints I have saved. I love the fact that I can save Costco fuel locations as a yellow pin for fuel and hotels as blue, parks as green, etc. The other bug is the voice prompt tells me to take a left turn when the map shows I need to take a right turn.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Good afternoon! Thanks for your feedback. Please update to the latest version of the app and this should resolve the issue. Let us know if you have any further issues and we'll be happy to help. Thanks so much for your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: This app has totally failed for me. Even given a specific location in New Brunswick, Canada (yes, I triple checked that I had downloaded the map for NB) all I could get was a long list of locations in NB and MAINE (wrong country, even) that shared any of the single search terms EXCEPT for the one I very specifically searched for. I'm starting to think that there simply isn't a reliable offline navigation app for Android (or maybe for anything). PLEASE prove me wrong.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for bringing this issue to our attention. Please contact our Support Team at mapsmereviews@n2.org and we can investigate it further. If you can please provide screenshots and ideally videos, it will make the process smoother. Thank you for your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app but a few bugs. Sometimes compass and distance bar don't show up. But the biggest annoyance is the wholly inaccurate elevation profile. While the highest and lowest elevations are likely to be correct, the distance between peaks and troughs is not to scale at all. Also the favourite pins sometimes block letters of the place names.

I've of the better OpenStreetMap options, it is still missing major feature takeover to Google Maps. The maps all have to be downloaded, and the download doesn't really function. It can only accept address destinations from maps it had already downloaded, otherwise the closest you can get is the city name. It has almost no businesses that can be populated on the overlay, just a few restaurants and a couple major chain stores in some areas. Not suitable for normal usage yet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! Weâ€™re sorry to hear about your experience. We have heard suggestions from other loyal users and we are addressing them in our next update. Please DM us or email us at contact@maps.me with details - we want to make this right for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Weird. I live in Colorado, it doesn't let to download new places even though they exist. If the place you want to go to is not recognized, the app shows you a cartoon fox... With a shoe... Probably, it means something deep, but it would be easier to say 'sorry, can't find it'. And again, why not? Even with an internet it's impossible to create a route. Also, all fancy features 'photo spots', 'nightlife' etc. work only for a very limited list of random cities. Didn't find it helpful or reliable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, 

Thanks for the feedback.

We take all map data form OSM.org. If a place is not in OSM, you should see the 'not found' notice under the fox picture. Please provide us a screenshot to android@maps.me and coordinates of the waypoints or screenshot of the route so that we could check the error.

scraped_reviews.content: Frustrated that Google Maps only shows restaurants nearby. This appears to have the same distance limit in restaurant searches- it only shows restaurants as far out as a mile or so. There was also a text box advertising it's subscription service that loaded on open. Google maps has offline maps and a Share feature. This is, as far as I can tell, the exact same material I get using the free app that I wanted this to replace.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,

Thank you for your feedback.

Please, tell us more about the issue, attach screenshots where we can see the situation and specify your MAPS.ME version. Contact us at android@maps.me.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app until they changed it to the Pro subscription. Even though I paid for pro, every time I'm offline for an extended period, I lose my extra bookmarks and maps. And of course, this is right when I need it most. I will be moving to Organic Maps instead. Don't waste your money on the pro subscription!!

Best App I've downloaded in the past couple of years and I've only scratched the surface. Terrific for navigating trails. I will have to do some research into the paid version to see whether it's worth upgrading but the free version is great. The 10 free maps you can download is more than generous. For perspective, the entire state of NY is covered by 4 maps, so each map covers a significant area. The 4 I've downloaded so far (parts of NY, MA, all of CT and RI) cover where I am 99% of the time.

This is the best free app of its' type that I have found. It is wonderful that you can download entire regions, and are not required to have full-time internet access (impossible where I travel). Certainly it is not perfect. Dirt roads are not differentiated from other secondary roads, and some of the on/off ramps are not always reliable, but it typically routes onto decent roads. I use it more as a general-purpose map for exploring regions anyway. Data can be directed to SD card.

The advertisement for upgrading to Pro clearly indicates an additional elevation layer for the maps. Upon upgrading to Pro, the elevation layer option was no where to be found. I contacted the company who told me to update the app to the latest version. There are no additional updates available for the app in my region. I requested a refund for blatant false advertising. I was directed to Google Play who proceeded to reject my refund request. The whole experience has been unbelievable, frankly.

Is a great overall app. I love being able to contribute places to it so I can feel like I'm part of the improvement of it, however small. My only gripe so far is that, for navigation, your destination MUST be a searchable place - it will not accept just a bare address (such as for a place that isn't yet in there, a residence, etc). With this kind of limitation, it can never be a true replacement for Google maps. Maybe they never meant it to be.

[2019-06 reduced to 3 stars due to obnoxious ad that pops up payment dialogue when I try to hide it.] This app worked ok offline for me and I was also able to load .kml & .kmz files (although polygons were not visible, only points). But it does use a small amount of CPU & RAM even if you don't use the app at all. Not acceptable with my LG Sunrise so I will uninstall until I need it again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,

Please reply to this email notification and provide us a screenshot with the ad so we could verify whether it from the app or not.

scraped_reviews.content: July 2023 Way too much has been added to Maps.Me. It was fantastic, but now they want money to download more than 10 maps. They have officially ruined a great map program. Why pay them when I can use Google Maps free! August 2023 they added more totally unnecessary things and want more subscriptions. It went from a fantastic App to being useless. I am deleting it now.

Used this thing in remote parts of italy (I am from the US) and was able to not get lost when traveling alone. I also didnt have to pay for cell service when I got there because I did not need it. You just need wifi every once in a while to download your next location. Sometimes detailed areas with small turns (naples) are hard to navigate, but eventually you can get where you were going

An offline map shouldn't waste half your time in the app asking for money. I should have an option for adding a map file I have. I'm not going to stay long enough to find out. I suspect after a certain time a paywall to use the app will appear. I do know for a fact after 10 maps you will find a paywall. I understand wanting to make money off of a service. Just like heated seats in cars being behind a paywall, companies need to be held accountable for using useless paywalls. It's great otherwise.

Unusable: used to be an amazing offline map. A few times when travelling to less popular spots where Google Map was completely wrong and got me lost, I was saved by maps.me. Have used it in 35+ countries & the driving directions are also great. However, the current version simply does not work. I keep getting a "no available space" error when trying to add new maps (two different devices, both with plenty of space in system and SD card). Tried to reinstall: now the downloaded maps have no roads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi!

Thank you for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear that you're having this issue. Don't worry we are aware of this and our relevant team is working to resolve it as soon as possible.

We appreciate your feedback, thanks for leaving a review and for your continued support.

scraped_reviews.content: I have used this app for many years but only then and now for having an offline map with me in new areas. In this szenario it makes no sense to pay for it, so I'm looking at the free version. The app has developed in many ways and offers more features. For users like me it is very pity that there is a limitation of the number of maps. So with a move to another area one needs to delete maps and download new ones. And I'm not clear, if I can still navigate, or if this has become Pro too.

Well, I gave this app 5 stars in the past, but am now going down to 1 star and uninstalling it. The reason: Itâ€™s been sold and no longer free for unlimited maps. But luckily the original founders of maps.me released an open source version called Organic Maps, which is just as good and absolutely free, and at the time of this writing even ad and tracker free. I got that one instead and am as happy as I was in the past with maps.me. I rather donate to Organic Maps than giving money to maps.me
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your review, we really appreciate it!

scraped_reviews.content: Ummm...just updated the app, and suddenly it says I can no longer add any more bookmark categories without paying a recurring fee? Implementing new features & charging for them = fine. But clawing back the fundamental basics & suddenly shoving them behind a paywall? Yeah, no thanks. Tip: use Organic Maps instead, it's a fork of the *original* open-source maps.me that everyone loved, before it got bought out & bloated with profit-driven garbage.

This app was a 10 star app for many years. Idk what is going on, but in the past 6 months, I've gotten locked out of my pro membership and lost all waypoints. The reason they get 2 stars and not 1 right now is because their support is responsive and was able to get my pro membership back with an app update and provide my lost way points in a file. Please just make it the way it used to be and I'll edit this review and give 5 stars again.

title: Free Fire MAX
description:
Welcome to Flame Arena, where thrilling survival challenges await. As the fires of battle ignite once more, will your squad outlast the rest and claim the trophy of glory?

[Flame Arena]
Each team enters with a banner. Fallen teams see their banners reduced to ashes, while victors keep theirs flying high. Stay alert as the exclusive arena commentary delivers real-time callouts on eliminations and special events.

[Flame Zone]
As the match heats up, the Safe Zone transforms into a blazing ring of fire, with a fiery trophy burning bright in the sky. Special flame weapons will drop during battles. They come with boosted stats and fiery area damage, making them true game changers in the Flame Arena.

[Player Card]
Every fight matters. Your performance builds your Player Value. During the Flame Arena event, create your own player card, unlock vibrant designs, and make sure your name is remembered.

Free Fire MAX is designed exclusively to deliver premium gameplay experience in a Battle Royale. Enjoy a variety of exciting game modes with all Free Fire players via exclusive Firelink technology. Experience combat like never before with Ultra HD resolutions and breathtaking effects. Ambush, snipe, and survive; There is only one goal: to survive and be the last one standing.

Free Fire Max, Battle In Style!

[Fast-paced, deeply immersive gameplay]
50 players parachute onto a deserted island but only one will leave. Over ten minutes, players will compete for weapons and supplies and take down any survivors that stand in their way. Hide, scavenge, fight and survive - with reworked and upgraded graphics, players will be richly immersed in the Battle Royale world from start to finish. 

[Same game, better experience]
With HD graphics, enhanced special effects and smoother gameplay, Free Fire MAX provides a realistic and immersive survival experience for all Battle Royale fans.

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad right from the start. Lead your friends to victory and be the last team standing victorious at the apex!

[Firelink technology]
With Firelink, you can login your existing Free Fire account to play Free Fire MAX without any hassle. Your progress and items are maintained across both applications in real-time. You can play all game modes with both Free Fire and Free Fire MAX  players together, no matter which application they use.

Privacy Policy: https://sso.garena.com/html/pp_en.html
Terms of Service:  https://sso.garena.com/html/tos_en.html

[Contact us]
Customer Service: https://ffsupport.garena.com/hc/en-us

Controls are easy to handle, and there's a variety of characters, skins, and weapons to keep things exciting. Even though my old account got deleted, starting fresh was fun and rewarding. Overall, it's one of the best mobile shooters for quick, action-packed gaming sessions!

And if that wasn't enough, the game is crawling with hackers. People flying around, one-shot kills, unlimited health you name it, it's there. Clearly, no anti-cheat system in place. The overall game experience is garbage. Constant crashes, long loading times, and the worst matchmaking I've seen.
