scraped_reviews.content: the worst game in the play storeðŸ‘Ž they only want money. don't put effort to make the game good. it is not free fire its bug fireðŸ‘. on every upate they bring new characters and some worst ebility which make the game more worse. in the earlier the game was good all players can show their skill.. etc but now we don't want skill just put cheracter ability you won! insted of improving the game they only focus on money!.ðŸ˜®â€ðŸ’¨

A fantastic battle royale experience perfectly optimized for mobile! The short, intense 10-minute matches are ideal for gaming on the go, making it easy to pick up and play anytime. Even on lower-end devices, the game runs incredibly smoothly, proving that you don't need an expensive phone to have a high-quality gaming experience. The controls are intuitive and feel great, putting the focus squarely on skill and strategy. Itâ€™s the ultimate mobile shooter for a quick burst of adrenaline

It's undoubtedly the worst game I've played. The ping just starts going above 500, even when my network can run a video on YouTube at 4k60fps without any buffering. mostly when I play with WiFi. Uninstalling this, the old freefire was the best. now It's just loaded woth hackers panels users and ping issues are just unbearable. I don't think you'll even read the reviews or do something about it but please solve this ASAP.

This is hands down one of the worst apps I've ever used. The lag is unbearable every time I try to play, the screen freezes, inputs get delayed, and it's just a complete mess. And if that wasn't enough, the game is crawling with hackers. People flying around, one-shot kills, unlimited health you name it, it's there. Clearly, no anti-cheat system in place. The overall game experience is garbage. Constant crashes, long loading times, and the worst matchmaking I've seen. But the absolute deal-

game used to be amazing untill recently it doesn't allow me to go onto the game saying that there's a network error but my network is fine with every other app not sure why this is happening and it's really frustrating knowing I've spent money on the game now I cannot even play due to some big... please sort this out

I love freefire and it is one of the most exciting and action-packed battle royale games out there! The gameplay is fast, the graphics are impressive for its size, and every match feels intense and unpredictable. Itâ€™s the perfect mix of fun, strategy, and survival. I really enjoy playing Free Fire the controls are smooth, the weapons feel great, and the short match time keeps things thrilling. Each characterâ€™s special ability adds a unique twist that makes every match different.

Playing for the last 5 years, you can call me FF Legend. The game has a super user base because of its lightweight engine and easy compatibility on every phone. It has decent graphics, but it is lovely, which can run on every device. In this way, low-end users benefit legit gaming along with manageable graphics. So far, I have had a great experience with Garena FreeFire and giving my honest review. You should not go anywhere when you have this masterpiece.

Free Fire, huh? You picked a classic. Let me break it down for you in a chill, simple way. Free Fire is a fast battle-royale game made by Garena. You jump onto an island with 49 other players, loot guns, fight, and try to be the last one standing. Matches are short, like 10 minutes, so it feels super quick and intense. Perfect for mobile. A few things people love about it: â€¢ Characters have special abilities, so you can choose a style that fits you. â€¢ Guns feel fun and easy to ðŸ«µ

Yeah ! Free Fire is Absolute Banger ! . I'm a 6 Years Old player . Recently i played it after a long Gap. The graphics are at the Peak but the Updates are boring, they dont give that Vibe like Nostalgic feels. So Developers can fix it. And the Game's camera is too much far from the Character.

This is a really nice game. I enjoy it a lot. But maybe because I play it on a tablet, it sometimes glitches and the enemy will eliminate u in the mean time. If this glitch and bugs are fixed then this is a perfect shooting game. There are even many mods to try, new events come up frequently so that players don't get bored. Overall I would recommend this shooting game.Also I know that it is important to update the game, but sometimes they give major updates which require a lot of space The game'

i have been playing this game around 7 years.The game was fun around 2019 but it's getting more unbalanced every update. the game doesn't have fair system for characters and gun skins.The gunskins and characters should be for just fashion but they are putting them in the combat is the worst decision they ever made. This game is not more competitive but it's all about money.

Hi Garena, I am your regular player but when I am in the lobby of the game then everything is fine but when I play the game then the ping is normal but it seems that everything is happening late for example glue wall is late, I am able to take medicine late, it takes time to pick up the gun etc. as if it is happening in high ping, please solve this problem otherwise I will not be able to play this game, thanks.

*FreeFireâ€¯Max* feels like a solid upgrade from the original, especially if youâ€™re after a visual treat on your phone. The graphics have gone from cartoonish to nearâ€‘realistic, with lush foliage, dynamic lighting and detailed character models that make every firefight feel more immersiveâ€¯Â¹. The audio cues are also revamped â€“ gunshots and footsteps now have positional accuracy, giving you that extra edge when youâ€™re sneaking around. *Gameplay* ðŸ¥°

game is good ,I been playing last 6 years and everything is fine but problem is ping. I have good network connection but still I can't open the game , when ever try to join a match ping getting higher. i reported multiple time but they can't fix the issue they can't even send reply, overall this game has lot of glitches and network issues
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we are sorry to hear the game is not working on your end. May we inquire about what you've experienced? Please contact our customer support at https://ffsupport.garena.com to resolve it as soon as possible. Thank you!

title: Tinyview Comics
description:
Love comics but short on time? Tinyview brings you bite-sized, mobile-friendly comics from world-class artists, most of them exclusive to our app! Whether youâ€™re into humor, politics, science, or slice-of-life, weâ€™ve got something for everyoneâ€”kids, grown-ups, casual readers, and busy professionals alike.

Why Tinyview?
1. Quick, Snackable Comics â€“ Perfect for your coffee break!
2. Exclusive Content â€“ Read comics you wonâ€™t find anywhere else.
3. Support Creators â€“ Send virtual gifts (like coffee) to your favorite artists!
4. Join the Conversation â€“ Discuss comics and connect with fellow fans.
5. Free & Premium Plans â€“ Enjoy comics your way!

Upgrade to Premium for unlimited comics and the ability to gift comics to friends! Ready for a fresh way to enjoy comics? Download Tinyview now!

Tinyview, IN SCIENCE WE TRUST, and Product Plug are trademarks of Newput Inc dba Tinyview in the USA and other countries. Visit us online at tinyview.com. Contact us by sending an email to support@tinyview.zendesk.com.

Privacy Policy: https://tinyview.com/privacy-policy
Terms & Conditions: https://tinyview.com/terms-conditions

summary: Bite-sized comics, daily!

scraped_reviews.content: It's a nice idea. I liked the comics. I also liked the new improvements to the app. But the reason for the two stars? I signed up, and I subscribed. I went away for a couple of weeks, got on again, and the app didn't recognize that I had subscribed to it. Even though my subscription was in Google Play! And the link to contact somebody didn't work. So no way to "tell" anyone that I was subscribed. I said "the hell with it", "unsubscribed" and uninstalled the app. I'll try again later.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Ruth, can you please try going to the main menu > Account > Restore Purchases?

scraped_reviews.content: This app is painfully slow and difficult to use. I subscribed last month, but still couldn't get access to some comics and got messages asking me to subscribe. I tried for a few days before taking my credit card info out , but then there was no place to cancel the subscription. I got charged again this month anyway. Tried going through support and they're giving me the same useless message about cancelling my membership. Have to go through my CC company. Too bad, I like the concept.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Kat, if you bought the subscription from the app, just go to the menu and Account > Restore Purchases. Or go to the menu and click on Contact Us.

scraped_reviews.content: Deleting this app because I can't turn off push notifications. The only thing in the settings menu is to clear the cache. There's just not enough content on here to make me want to put up with the bugs yet. I want to follow the comics I like to make them easy to find in the app, but I want zero push notifications. Not allowing me to manage notifications is unacceptable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Zane, you can unfollow all series or any series you don't want to get notifications for.

scraped_reviews.content: It seems quite beta still. If there is a function to search for comics and artists I can't find it. And if I am following a comic I'd rather just be able to see it in my feed not have to click to open it then sometimes lose my place in my feed. I will continue to use and hope it gets better tho because several of my favorite comic artists get paid better for me viewing their work here.

I follow a few comic creators here, but honestly, there are better webcomic apps available that are easier to navigate and entirely free to use where you can see the full content of a comic eventually. Edit: You must now subscribe if you'd like to read more than 10 short comics or choose to constantly share and invite friends for points. Ads aren't fun, but it would at least give those of us who can't commit to subscribing a choice if you would allow that as an option to view more comics.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: KT, point well taken. By subscribing, you help ensure artists can earn a living and continue producing content you love. Any suggestions for us - how to make it work for both artists and users who can't afford the subscription?

scraped_reviews.content: The app is slow and laggy, it keeps telling me I am not a subscriber, then when I redo my subscription tells me I am. The comics I follow are not always easily accessible from my home screen and when I click on a push notifications most of the time it either doesnt take me to the comic it notified me about, or the comic won't load. I would use a different app if my favorites weren't on this one!

It's OK, but slow. I'm especially baffled why it's sooooo slow to load single panel comics. I also find that sometimes I have to tap more than once to get the individual comic to load. One aspect that I understand, but despise: there are "bonus panels" that you can't access without allowing push notifications.

The app is basically identical to using the web page, but slower. The only difference seems to be the availability of push notifications. UI is terrible, when going from one page to the next, the whole UI including navigation and headers reloads, you have to scroll to get back to the comic as the headers are more than a screen full, you can't easily go to the first comic of a series, and the navigation bar hides when you scroll down, so you have to scroll back up a bit to go to the next page
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Alexander, thanks for your feedback. We do not load the navigation and headers when you go back. You should be where you were. Also, because of your comment, we don't hide the nav bar anymore when you scroll. Make sure you have the latest version of the app - v10.1 or later.

scraped_reviews.content: Many of my favorite comic artists are on this app, and I am grateful that I can see and easily support them all on one wonderful platform that is easy to use (unlike others *ahem patreon* that are overwhelming). I love Tinyview! â¤ï¸
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Tawnya Marble, thank you so much!

scraped_reviews.content: Despite what other reviews say, I am okay with the subscription if it supports the creators. The low rating is for the app itself - the UI. As a first time user I found it extremely unintuitive. Like, why is there no search bar, why can't you easily go to the next comic of the creator. You only get this weird navigation panel thing that seems like a hint, but it's actually the navigation itself. It just feels like I'm in a maze and have to go through a puzzle to get to the comics I want...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Ina, we have a "Content Navigator" at the bottom of each comic which allows you to see the previous or next comic of the creator (series). But we are taking your comments seriously and will improve the UI to the best of our abilities in next few weeks.

scraped_reviews.content: A great place to view and comment upon your favorite cartoonists' works.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you, radavis333! Most cartoonists read comments and even reply occasionally.

scraped_reviews.content: Tho I don't have a very much interest in comics and anime type things but I saw your advertisement on instagram and decided to give your app a try. After using it for few hours and reading few pages. As I myself a UX/UI designer, can say you did a really great job. The colors and the cards placement is good. Also I didn't encounter any bug yet so I can say you guys did a pretty decent work. Keep on the good work and I wish you all a great journey ahead :)

I get there was improvement needed for reading comics on phones, but why must this be at the expense of people using larger screens? When you read your comics on a tablet, like I do, it looks very clunky and anything but tiny and makes reading them quite unpleasant. Because of this, I have almost stopped reading some of my favorite comics that moved to Tinyview. (29/8/2021) Edited (10/5/2023) to add this has not improved at all. The awfulness of the app is the only reason I'm not subscribing.

I would be fine with ads here and there, but only 10 comics before you have to pay? Or else constantly spam your friends with comics they might not be interested in? Nah, I don't want to be obnoxious. I know you say 'it's just a cup of coffee' but some of us can't even swing that. I had to uninstall because it makes me feel kinda bad when I get notifications for comics I can't access. I only follow 2 comics and I hit the limit in 9 days....ðŸ˜”

I love the idea of the app and I've been meaning to move off Instagram to something where I'll see my favorite creators but there are two things I find very odd about this app: 1. You can't search series. You seem to have to scroll through recommended series until you find the one you want. 2. You can't follow series unless you receive emails or push notifications. I just want to have those series added to a bookmarked list so I can quickly navigate to my favorites on my own time.

Good Work Most of us will read your free comics and uninstall the app and never remember it. You can provide free comics with little of ads. The comics are really overpriced and we can get physical copy of other comics with a very less price. When the app says it's a comic reader and has <10 comics is bad. You should contact other comic writers and provide them here.... Like tinyview version ofavengers comics.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: In the next version, we are going to allow users to get any comics for free using their influence. You earn influence when you share any comics with friends and they install the app using your link. We are also going to have two simple subscription plans soon - monthly and yearly. We plan to work with other creators for more content. Thanks :)

scraped_reviews.content: Concept and execution good. Pricing is off. I can see maybe a dollar but 5? Yikes. How did the pricing come about? It's not a well known print comic by well known creators. I did enjoy the Tesla story but not enough to continue. Also clarification on how others can submit their comics for the app would be great. Will check it again in a week. If same pricing I have to delete it. Sorry.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: In the next version, we are going to allow users to get any comics for free using their influence. You earn influence when you share any comics with friends and they install the app using your link. We are also going to have two simple subscription plans soon - monthly and yearly. Hope that helps.

scraped_reviews.content: No pinch zoom or pop-out view for panels, which means ones with small enough text remain illegible. No easy listing of followed strips. No way to sign in without exposing your phone number. Boo! [UPDATE] They've added comments and "friends" which clutters the interface and causes slower loading. Currently there is no loading, only the header, footer, and a spinny load indicator in the middle. I want to feel good about paying for indie content, but this is garbage.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Kevin, we have improved the UI (easy to see only followed series) and performance significantly in the latest version (6.5.397) of the app. Can you please try and let us know?

scraped_reviews.content: 5 stars for all the content on this app. The artists are great. But.. the app.. I know if is fairly new, so anything can happen. But the UI really needs some improvements and there are some key-features that are lacking; - 'continu to read' option. So you can see which releases you have read, and see the ones you still have to read. - SPEED!! That app is really slow, it takes a long time to just open a comic. - The mysterious (x) button? There is a x/close button all the time. Why? - And ...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Michel, thank you for your feedback. I have shared your feedback with the team and we are working to improve the app in coming weeks and months. We really want to make it easy to "continue to read". As you read more comics, each comic takes up more resources (memory) on your device, so it is a good idea to keep closing comics by clicking on x.

scraped_reviews.content: Good app i am a science nerd and i like to know about people, inventions and discoveries . But one suggestion i may give please do add the resources from where you are collecting these literature . Because there should never be a wrong message . Comics are best version to understand anything and they will spread easily. Last but not least while pricing the comic keep an average cost so that it can reach many people.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the suggestion to add references. We did Bibliography in the Nikola Tesla comics but we will start doing in all the comics. In the next version, we are going to allow users to get any comics for free using their influence. You earn influence when you share any comics with friends and they install the app using your link.

scraped_reviews.content: EDITED: Tried to send a cookie and got a pop-up saying "The sku was not found. Please fetch products first by calling getItems" Closed and reopened the app and now it works. Cookie sent! Need some way to enlarge the images, because sometimes the text is too small to read. Usually I rotate the app so that it scales the width to the height of the screen, but tiny view blocks rotation.

Edit: After developer response and the issue being resolved, changed from 3 to 5 stars. I love supporting some of my favorite comics, but am having an issue where any payment I put in is declined, including google play balance and the card I've had on auto pay for the last year. Not having an issue with this card anywhere else- seems to be an issue with the app. Ive emailed customer support but haven't received a reply.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Corinne, sorry about that. Trying to resolve this issue with Google Play. Hopefully it should get resolved today or in next 1-2 days. Thank you for supporting the artists but you should continue to enjoy all their content including bonus panels without a valid subscription. All you have to do is use the app and follow them with alerts enabled.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be a great little app. Now you have to subscribe to view nearly any of the comics. It's the 3rd of the month and I've already maxed out on the comics I can view without using points (from sharing with friends) or paying. This limitation was recently added and it's not a good one.

It was difficult to decide how many stars to rate this app. The reason is that while I really enjoy the content, and the work of many talanted comic artists, I find the user experience of the app suboptimal. The UI is a bit laggy, the load time of the comics is too long for the content (playing 4k video on my connection starts faster than loading one comic). Like button is not responsive as well. I know it's a young app and hope more attention is paid to engineering and user experience.

Really wonderful comic app for STEM education. One issue is that the shared app link doesn't take you to play store, instead a message pops saying," There is no appropriate app to open this". The other user has to install the app from play store and then click on the link . If this works smoothly then it will be easy to share with my students.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Shamsher, we tried to reproduce the problem but couldn't. It always takes the other user to Google Play to install the app. Can you try it with one other friend and if it still doesn't work, contact us from the app (sidebar, Contact Us)? Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: The comics are no longer free, you only get 10 free ones a month, with some influence points scheme to earn more. I understand that financing is an issue, but in a subscription saturated and bombarded world of today, adding another subscription is likely not a good way forward. You've taken away much more happiness from people that truly cannot afford to pay than whatever money you think you'll manage with subscriptions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Quirky Custodian, we are trying to support creators so they can make money doing what they are good at without having to take on other jobs. Tinyview is an experiment - if enough readers don't support us, it will have to end and then we will all miss our fun daily comics. The price is only about a cup of coffee a month.

scraped_reviews.content: The app still needs work. Any page change take 3-5+ seconds to load, and often does not show a loading animation, so it feels like it's doing nothing. The next button goes to the previous day's comic, and the previous button goes to the next comic!?!? Plus, the next/previous buttons don't even work in certain views. Finally, there is a very small amount of content overall that it doesn't feel worth the trouble. I would like to support the creators, but this app is too frustrating to use.

Edited to update: The issues were addressed and I'm now able to use it again without problems. Thank you to both the team working on updates and for reaching out here. And I've upgraded my membership level! Old review: I was very happy until a recent update. I am no longer able to log in on my profile.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Debra, we have fixed many bugs during Sign In and improved the performance significantly in the latest version (6.5.397) of the app. Can you please try and let us know?

scraped_reviews.content: Good idea! Very nice to see Itchy Feet here. Cons: 1) need more content (other webcomics like Gilbert, etc.) 2) UX is really lacking: a very cluttered list of comics releases I've subscribed to (need simply a sleek view of new posts in calendar order) and navigation (esp. back action handling is not intuitive in many places - like taking me back to the comics' own page instead of the page I've come from) Would have been 5 stars otherwise...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dmitry, thanks for your feedback. We have improved the UX quite a bit since your comments. E.g. the homepage now shows new posts in calendar order. You can even choose (follow) which comic series should show up on your homepage! Now we have separate < Back button (kind of like .. on Unix/Linux) and Home button which goes to the app homepage.

scraped_reviews.content: Very very good. Though as the app has just started on its venture, it should start by making free content first. Because the audience might just read the given free comics , delete the app and never look back at it. Since I liked the application very nice , I would like it if the developers took the above mentioned matter seriously. Thank you for the amazing app. Keep working.ðŸ˜‰ðŸ˜—...... . . . Edit.. better
scraped_reviews.replyContent: In the next version, we are going to allow users to get any comics for free using their influence. You earn influence when you share any comics with friends and they install the app using your link. We are also going to have two simple subscription plans soon - monthly and yearly. Hope that helps.

scraped_reviews.content: Great concept and value for the money. The app is clunky though. Keeps asking me to log in and then verify my account. Sometimes it gets stuck in a "create your profile" loop and I give up on reading the comic because I'm frustrated. I'm sticking with it because I believe in the concept of paying artists and content creators directly.

Edit 2: developers have bad QA and customer service. The UI is confusing even when it's working. I had to edit this review twice for them to acknowledge that maybe their app doesn't work correctly. what an incredibly condescending way to recognize a bug. I get that you're small but that doesn't make you invincible. Wish you would have features that work. Their original comics are not good either. I'll likely uninstall and go back to following cartoonists on instagram
scraped_reviews.replyContent: redacted redaction, I am sure no one is lying :-) Maybe you are running into some bug. We apologize about that but we are a tiny startup with only one person responsible for all the QA on all platforms. Wish you could be a little supportive. If you contact us from the app with some screenshots, we could see what's going on.

scraped_reviews.content: I believe in supporting comic strip artists. Joined the app, subscribed, etc. When I tried to log in on my phone, it just created a new account and then asked me to subscribe. I see why it's going under. Please let us know when the app actually works; I'll gladly try again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Das, if you bought the subscription from the app, just go to the menu and Account > Restore Purchases. Or go to the menu and click on Contact Us.

scraped_reviews.content: There are a few artists I would want to follow on this app. But it's not worth being bombarded by commenters who want to fight me when I dare make a comment on a comic that made me think. This is not the kind of discourse I want to have and no amount of entertaining comics is worth the abuse that stands to go unmoderated. This app is not currently a safe, positive space and I don't want it until it is.

Extremely slow app and confusing layout. Should've have to dig to find the comics I'm subscribed too, and wait for them to load. Its also a tad glitchy at times. I'll be honest, if they wasn't artists I follow posting exclusive comics to this app, I'd have uninstalled it 5 minutes after I first installed it

When I tap a subscription notification, the app opens somewhere I still have to navigate in order to read the comic, making the app no better than using a browser bookmark. Also I often receive notifications unrelated to my subscriptions, and there is no way to disable it, making the app worse than a browser bookmark.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Ekevoo Pointyhorse, we send notifications to all app users only when there is a new series because obviously that new series has no followers yet. If you follow two series, we show all of their new comics on the homepage itself. You click on the first one, and then just click on the down arrow icon to go to the next comic from the homepage.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the comics, especially Fowl Language. The latest version of the app has definitely improved the comic loading speed, but there are still times it feels like I have to tap things in the UI multiple times before anything happens.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: John, we have improved the performance significantly in the latest version (6.5.397) of the app. Can you please try and let us know?

scraped_reviews.content: I dropped a star due to them now forcing you to buy a monthly subscription to have to view more than 10 comics in a month. Thankfully, I like the comics enough to pay the fee, but forcing me to buy a subscription to look at more than 10 comics a month is a little bit rough, in my opinion. Suggestion: Maybe you should give some kind of tangible incentive to get people to people to buy a subscription instead of forcing them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Tyson, thanks for your feedback. Any thoughts on what that tangible incentive may look like?

scraped_reviews.content: The Platform: runs smoothly, no issues,easy to use. The content: it's a matter of personal taste I suppose. I think they have great creators and cartoon artists. I joined for Fowl Language and Lunarbaboon. I discovered They Can Talk and The Other End.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you Benoit!

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy following several comics and knowing that I'm supporting the creators with a small monthly fee. The app itself works well and has a decent design that has been improving consistently since I first installed it. Update: I will go back to 5 stars when there is an ability to HIDE the comments so I don't have to see them. I hate having comments visible, I just want to see the comics and nothing else. The comments add no value for me, they just stress me out, so I want to turn them off.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Meredith, thanks! Can you try the latest release? We have thoroughly changed the user interface and now you can share comments publicly and privately with your friends. Hope you like it.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: I followed the developers advice after my original review, and it has improved my experience on the app. Added an extra star. Thanks. (End update.) Not user friendly. Home doesn't display the comics I follow, menu words are all jumbled up, navigation is glitchy. I really want to support the artists I follow on IG, but this app needs improvement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Patricia, We are an early stage startup (a few guys in their garage). To see only the comics you follow, just turn the switch "Show all comics series" on the homepage to OFF. Will continue to improve the navigation. Thanks for the feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: App crashes often, runs super slow (after loading a few comics), and uses a ton of battery. Guessing a memory leak? Love the content, love the idea, love that the artists are getting paid, but this app needs a lot of work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Andrew, we will see if we can catch and fix these issues.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app to navigate your favourite comic strips and show some love to the creators. I also discovered some new ones. It's very convenient to have them all in one place, it has now become part of my routine before starting my working day to read newly posted comics.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Paola, thank you for your kind words!

scraped_reviews.content: THE APP IS SO SLOW!! I did a test and it took like 10 whole seconds to go from one chapter to the next and load ONE panel! My internet is fine btw, oh my gosh, SO DANG SLOW! Fix this already, developers, certain comic apps that aren't even on the PlayStore are better regulated than THIS!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Annewende, we have improved the performance significantly in the latest version (6.5.397) of the app. Can you please try and let us know?

scraped_reviews.content: It's so slow. Content is fun but it's just so dang slow. Edit: I'm removing a star because it's not gotten any better. Tinyview, please get your basics in order. If you're gonna force people to use your app then at least have a decent app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Isaac, we have improved the performance significantly in the latest version (6.5.397) of the app. Can you please try and let us know?

scraped_reviews.content: I find it really hard to navigate my favorite comic strip series. And it is really slow. While I absolutely do want to support that comic artist with my subscription to this app, I don't get why I'm having such a poor user experience for that.

I'm updating my rating again, back to my original 5 stars! I had knocked it down to 2.stars due to major lag issues, but they have been fixed with a recent update. I appreciate the team reaching out to see if my experience has changed. It definitely has! I subscribe because I'm happy to support artists & read good comics!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Bethany, we have improved the performance significantly in the latest version (6.5.397) of the app. Can you please try and let us know?

scraped_reviews.content: I'm not sure why so many comic artists migrated from Webtoons to Tinyview. I find this app much slower to load and more cumbersome to navigate than Webtoons. It's not very user friendly and it's hard to find your favourites.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: pentamerous5, we are an early stage startup (a few guys in their garage). We are trying to create a platform for artists to not only publish their comics but also make money. Will continue to improve performance. Thanks for the feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: It could be good. The content is great, but the UX is so bad that it makes little sense and I need to force myself to use it because it's so off-putting. If my favorite artists were anywhere else I would uninstall Tinyview immediately.

App updated yesterday and now my homepage won't load the new comics. It's stuck on showings comics from a week ago. I keep refreshing and nothing new loads even though I got a notification saying new comics have been posted. For an app that I pay for, this happens way too often.

title: Weather app
description:
This weather app is one of best free weather apps with full features: Local weather, weather map (weather map service) and weather widgets.
Forecastle: Forecast now, hourly forecast and daily forecast app
Widgets for Android: The weather radar widget free and clock widget weather with beautiful style.
Weather map, weather radar map: Local weather radar app free with a lot of radar scope: Rain/snow, temperature, pressure, windy, clouds, humidity, waves, â€¦ and storm radar.

Its so easy to receive the weather conditions in your current location.
Weather forecast app provides detailed local forecast & weather forecast world wide, the app provides the current temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit, sunrise and sunset time according to city time zone.
The weather app also provides atmospheric pressure, weather conditions, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction, in addition to ten days in future and hourly weather forecast.
Realtime temperature, humidity, pressure and wind direction are all in the weather app based.

Great features:
- The weather channel: temperature, wind, air sunshine, humidity, dew point, precipitation, visibility, atmosphere pressure, water, sunrise sunset, storm, stormshield, rain alert in one wetter app
- Hourly or daily prediction: we offer 7 days info, the weather now, hourly weather free in each hour, todayâ€™s weather, tomorrowâ€™s weather
- Animated weather conditions with live background images
- Hourly and weekly forecastle, especially hourly weather item for next 7 days.
- World weather report: we provide worldwide weather forecast
- Weather alerts: provide local weather alerts 3 times a day.
- No GPS: not a problem, app can detect network location, not so accurate but its ok for some cases
- Storm warning & notification: Storm radar, storm tracker, tornado warning and rain alarm - rain radar
- Reporting: the weather news can show up everyday if you enable it.
- Sunrise time, sunset time & water time
- Temperature converter: Temperature free switching between Celsius and Fahrenheit, auto-detect your country should use Celsius or Fahrenheit for default settings.
- Wind speed and wind direction in different units
- Wind guru tool: wind forecast by wind speed meter, wind finder
- 1 day, 7 days future prediction with accurate el tiempo, plus tempo data for future hourly weather
- Weather widget (weather on homescreen) and ongoing notification with forecast bar, multiple place on widgets.
- Auto reload data for notification even app is in underground
- Weather notification bar: Keeps weather running underground for realtime, you can see the temperature on android system bar without opening app
- Lock screen with info: temps, rain, clouds & clock widget weather
- Track the whether in multiple locations
- Chance of rain, moon phrase, moon cycle
- Great wether radar with animated maps

Download accurate weather app right now to plan your trips, work & your life!

scraped_reviews.content: Dropping down to one star. Developers have added full screen ads just to open the app. In addition, they have programmed the app in such a way that your navigation bar hides itself, like a mobile game. This makes it so that when you try to close/exit the app, you must slide the nav bar back up, or be taken to the advertisement. Malicious behavior.

I like all the weather information this app provides, its the best I've seen and tried so far. But the ads are a bsr across the bottom of the screen and you cannot use the less than icon to exit the app. All 3 navigation icons are lost. If hold on the middle of the ad bar you get a partial screen to install that app and the navigation icons appear and you can leave the app. Very poor design.

Jesus! This app is riddled with ads, so much so that I oppted to buy the damned thing. Well after my transaction went through, nothing changed. I couldn't get the ads to go away. I wrote the developer, and never heard back. Lots of these ads are for other weather programs, which is confusing as hell. I finally decided, to hell with it, I'll eat the purchase price, so I deleted the program. If you download this alien egg-pod, good luck.

I started to down load the app and a beautiful highly informative control panel came up and it was near perfect. I was then invited to download additional weather related apps and that's when it all fell apart. I never could relaunch the original control panel. I am now left with a clunky app that is a struggle to interpret. I am just going to delete everything and start.over but this time refuse all extras. That original control panel is what I wanted.

Great weather info - easy to read. I also like how i can customize the view (dark/light). Ads present but not that bad. They seem to pop up more intially then trail off. I dont like how it is always pushing itself open even if I kill it to save battery life. 2 suggestions after using this for a bit. 1. It would be nice to have the day of the month listed with the extended forecast. 2. It would be nice if the extended forecast also gave a total accumulation of snow for the whole day

Lots of good weather data in an easy to use format. Great app with with two exceptions. It would be nice if the fonts were a little easier to read at a glance instead of having to put on reading glasses. I wish it had a different opening photo, the modern windmill reminds me of all the migrating birds being killed by those giant spinning blades (sadly too many), please replace it with something beautiful. I left the weather channel because I was over all their hyped up fear mongering news.

Couple problems but overall what I was looking for. First problem is the status bar notification disappears... Just stops displaying and I have to reopen the app to get it to return. Second is that when the notification*does* display, if I pull down the notification tray, the weather notification often has only the application name, no details at all... Just the word "Weather". Sometimes it will display details but most of the time it doesn't.

Too many ads. When you open the free version TO SEE THE FORECAST you can't. You have to wait for an ad to load then figure out how to close the ad and sometimes get redirected to somewhere else you don't want to be. When I need to see a forecast, I need it now not in five minutes. I am trying to plan my day and have absolutely NO interest in seeing any ad. BE A USEFUL WEATHER APP, not a billboard. Nor should anyone have to pay for weather information. IE your Pro version. .

It is 2 days away from a full moon today but your weather app says it is a new moon. Hope the forecast is not as far off track as your moon phase. Still I like it, especially the home screen widget. Fix that moon phase, and I'd give it 5 stars for an ad-supported app. The ads are small and don't cover anything up. The current location shows an incorrect street address (don't know why it even shows any street address) but at least it shows the right city. ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜„ðŸ˜ðŸ¤ª Thanks!

What I absolutely love about this app that I have yet to find any other weather app is that all apps allow you to change between Fahrenheit & Celsius, but you have to click menu, settings & change it in a drawn-out tedious way. This app has a toggle switch right on the main page allowing you to switch instantly from Fahrenheit to Celsius! This comes in handy when discussing the weather with my friends overseas! It's loaded with every bit of data you could possibly hope for too!!!

So much better than the other app that I was using. Very accurate, as I have the setting set to my location. I live higher than the rest of my town, and this app takes that into consideration by about 2-3Â°. Well done! I do have a suggestion, being in the high desert, we are prone to popup thunderstorms. It would be nice to an alert system set up within the app.

App starts with a noisy ad, unless you pay to upgrade to Pro. The weather radar option has stopped loading details (11/16/2022). I will see if a reinstall will work.No.12/16/22 Thank you for quieting the ad. The interactive map seems to be set for summer. It shows 70-80F throughout the US, and we all know that can't be right with blizzards outside. Your radar doesn't even show it. This could be life-threatening for anyone depending on the app to make Christmas travel plans.

Great job at making this app. Makes viewing weather and sunrise, sunset times easy to access(which is what I look for). Details are very accurate and app very simple to navigate. You can add any city in why country around the world and it shows you weather of that place too (in case you have family or friends living else where and want to add those places ). Doesn't bombard you with ads(only 1 pops up in the start i think which you have a choice to close). Thank you

The app is pretty, but the full screen ad everytime I click in to it is too much for me. Weather data is provided for free by weather[dot]org, so all these apps are doing is scraping that site and formatting the information into an easier/cooler looking format. Therefor I can't understand why you would need to have such aggressive advertising to get paid, can only assume greed.

This is the most accurate weather app I've used!! Especially for 10 day forecasts. If it's significantly different than other apps, I assume this one is the one to trust and it has always proved to be right. I've seen heatwaves and cold snaps coming early thanks to weather app! My only annoyance is that a (non video) ad always shows up when you open it, which didn't used to happen. But it's a small thing and if it keeps the app online, it's worth it!

I mainly use it for the weather widget. I like how it gives me the hourly forecast in the widget. Seems pretty accurate so far. Dont really care for the ads. Wish i can just have them removed. But i understand that the ads help with the cost to keep the app running. Overall it is a good app and i like it way better than all the other ones ive found.

Great weather app! Includes so much detail. I fish a lot so I like elements like wind speed and direction, moon phases, and of course rain (which I know all apps have ðŸ˜„) All in all, I'd give 4.5 stars. I'd make it a 5 if they had a general, not so detailed forecast when you want something quick for the day.

I'll give this app 5 stars but my only complaint is that there's an icon in my notification bar at all times for the use of the weather widget and I HATE THAT! Of course it's not that big of an issue, hence my 5 stars, but it annoys the hell outta me and I'd appreciate it if that could be fixed. Thanks! I would like to say, I seen someone post about "being riddled with ads", and that's not my experience. I actually have no ads and I didn't pay so good on you guys for that!

I like the layout. It is as good as AccuWeather _used to be_. My only problem is that I am interested in paying to remove ads but the app never takes me anywhere when I select "Get Pro version" from the menu. It just goes off into limbo with no error message. I'm shocked that a developer is this uninterested in getting my money. If there's anything that usually works when nothing else does, it's taking money.

This app works very well. It is much better than all the others. Other than minimal ads, it does not demand your location and allows you to enter the location you desire or allow you to leave your location active for automatic updates when you travel. It also has all the weather info a person could want. Nice job to the app writer! Thanks for a great app!

I like the app. It's pretty accurate. What I don't like is how I have to scroll left or right to reach the city I want to see since I keep track of a couple cities. Sometimes the swipe isn't easy and I will have to keep trying to get it to swipe. Maybe there's an easier way and I just don't know it yet. Who knows but other thsn that, it's pretty cool.

So far its been very accurate with the tempertures. I just got the app so I'm still checking it out. I'll see if its accurate with the rain supposedly next weekend here in Texas. We have the bouncingest weather there is. It could be 70 to 80 degrees in the winter time. Then turn freezing within a day or two after that. So far again it does as it says. Giving 10 day weather reports which is what I like. Keep up the great work. Thanks y'all.

I love the weather app! it's easy to use and has all the info I need at a glance. I especially appreciate having the dew point listed, since this is a much better indicator of humidity. I also like the bar graphs with the daily highs and lows.

I spent hours checking out all the weather app options, I was so glad when I finally found this one because it allowed me everything I was looking for. I especially like all the options of having weather and time locations around the world.

It's the only weather app I've ever seen that gives hourly forecasts for future days. I have been using different weather apps for decades, and this one is the best. This app is important to me for planning my long bicycle day trips.

I like it, I just don't like how it opens every time I restart my phone and I have to dismiss it. I just want the widget on my home screen, thats it. That said, I love how many options there are for the widget. I want it to be clear so I can see the picture on my screen but still visible. It fits that bill perfectly.

Really thoughtful data display. General temps hourly, quick scroll to RH, Baro pressure, winds, etc. Beautiful interactive translucent graphics makes this visually satisfying. This is not your typical free weather app.

I've always loved the features on this app! I love how straight forward it is and the Ads are not a hassle in any way. I also really appreciate how many widget styles and options there are! thank you for making a wonderful app â¤ï¸ your doing great! ðŸ‘ðŸ»

it is amazing. get this app and no other one( all the one-star ratings are not true they just want to lie in your faceðŸ¤”). This app has like no ads. AND it is very clear to see the low and the higher not just for that day,but for the whole week:). Also, you can see the humidity and the % chance of rain.GET THIS APP OR ELSE YOU WILL NOT FIND A BETTER WEATHER APPðŸ«¡!!!!!!and YES!!!! I see you scrolling, don't, just click that " get the app" button ðŸ™„:)

This is a great app except for ONE thing. The ads that appear at the bottom cover over the location that I must touch to re-show the controls to close the app. So in trying to close it it ALWAYS goes to the ad site which I have to close before I can do anything else. This probably earns ad hits for the developer (in a somewhat sneaky manner) for ads of no real interest to the user but you must click on it and open it in order to ultimately close the app! Fix that and it will be 5 stars.

It was always a decent app, supported by ads which is fine enough. But they recently started putting an ad directly under the soft keys at the bottom and then hiding the soft keys, so it's extremely easy to click that instead of hitting a key. Super annoying and unscrupulous behavior.
The app works very well indeed. The only party messing up the app is Google which blanks out the real app and trying to divert the user to some other app. That is very annoying.

There is no mistake found, however I am so much interested in the way how the app works. my request is that please developers continue keeping eyes on the creativity of the app that it doesn't go wrong.thanks.
I'm only able to go back to the home screen by opening an ad and closing it. Sneaky way of adding ads for clicks.

Very nice app. with best and accurate information. Thanks. Again I have started this app. Looking very best result and accurste.Very nice and perfact news and result. Thanks.now again I start your app. very nice accurate details. many thanks.very nice that is why it was restarted.Very nice equrate result. like it very much. Thank. very nice, accurate app.
This app is amazing! It is accurate, and it is so easy to toggle through different cities with the tabs. My favorite weather app.
Works well without a bunch of ads and pop-ups, lets you save and lookup multiple locations really
It's awesome! I love that I can check the weather for different places, like other countries! It's super helpful to stay updated on weather conditions wherever I'm interested in.

it is great to use but when I first opened it,it didn't show the correct address.There were almost no ads I think there 2 only or less ads shown when I am using the app.It is an easy app to use it is human-friendly
Lots of settings, yet easy to use. Have multiple locations saved. Temp up in status bar option is great.
After the latest update (September 8), the app will not take my actual location's data and will instead show a totally incorrect time and temperature.
Liked the previous version much better. The navigation on this new version is not easy.I also do not like the GUI either. It has no class
A nice and accurate application for the weather (so far). I do recommend it to all who want the weather and related information on their mobile
I sure wished that pop-up telling me to turn of my battery optimizer would not appear. Because that option will never happen. UPDATE: pop up gone. app works great
Excellent app, stable and with good features and interface. I don't love the ads but there aren't many, only when you open the app
I'm new to this app but love to glance at my phone and get all the correct Time, Date AND Weather updates in one clear compact, place. I can recommend it *****
Great reliable app. However, another app is targeting this one in the ads, pretending to be an update. It's not, it's a competitor.

It isn't very accurate. In the morning it often predicts rain at 3:00. I don't know why 3:00, but 3:00 comes and goes. But the worst thing is all the adds strategically placed so that you will click on them if you aren't careful. They are definitely trying to trick you into clicking on the adds.
Great Weather App, easy to install, nice design layouts, multiple widget options, easy to add locations. Visually aesthetic and simple to read. Highly recommended.
Just downloaded it. I like it so far. One can asily change from FÂ° - CÂ°. A very clean and clear interface. Nice!

title: Threads
description:
Say more with Threads â€” Instagramâ€™s text-based conversation app.

Threads is where communities come together to discuss everything from the topics you care about today to whatâ€™ll be trending tomorrow. Whatever it is youâ€™re interested in, you can follow and connect directly with your favorite creators and others who love the same things â€” or build a loyal following of your own to share your ideas, opinions and creativity with the world.

A few things you can do on Threadsâ€¦

â–  Access your Instagram followers
Your Instagram username and verification badge are reserved for you. Automatically follow the same accounts you follow on Instagram in a few taps, and discover new accounts too.

â–  Share your point of view
Spin up a new thread to express what's on your mind. This is your space to be yourself, and you control who can reply.

â–  Connect with friends and your favorite creators
Jump to the replies to get in on the action and react to commentary, humor and insight from the creators you know and love. Find your community and connect with people who care about whatever it is youâ€™re interested in.

â–  Control the conversation
Customize your settings and use controls to manage who can see your content, reply to your threads, or mention you. Accounts youâ€™ve blocked will carry over from Instagram, and weâ€™re enforcing the same Community Guidelines to help ensure everyone interacts safely and authentically. 

â–  Find ideas and inspiration
From TV recommendations to career advice, get answers to your questions or learn something new from crowd-sourced conversations, thought leaders and industry experts.

â–  Never miss a moment
Stay on top of the latest trends and live events. Whether itâ€™s about new music, movie premieres, sports, games, TV shows, fashion, or the latest product releases, find discussions and receive notifications any time your favorite profiles start a new thread.

â–  Leap into the fediverse
Threads is part of the fediverse, a global, open, social network of independent servers operated by third parties around the world. Servers share information with each other to enable people to connect and discover new things across the fediverse.

summary: Connect and share ideas

scraped_reviews.content: Why is this a separate app instead of a tab in Instagram? I do like being able to save pictures, which you can't usually do in Instagram, except in chats. I could always save instagram pics screenshots, but those are saved in PNG format, which takes up five times as much space as a JPEG, so picture downloads are a welcome feature, but I don't know what else to use Threads for.

Overall good, but has some issues it needs to work out. For instance, if you click on a post to read it, sometimes when you back out it will refresh automatically and you'll lose the post forever. I constantly have issues where the page refreshes automatically while I'm mid-reading and the whole thing is gone. It's very irritating. I still consider this to be a good app for social networking, and better than Twitter. It just has some issues to fix.

Could be great if all pages loaded when you clicked on them. Sometimes they just don't. Posts usually don't load at all. And my biggest thing: if you follow someone on Threads, you automatically follow them on Instagram as well. Either they're two separate apps or they're not. I would really like to be able to have a different list of people I follow on each app.

An unsung treasure, this app is great as an artist to let loose and build community in a way that's as engaging as old Tumblr and Twitter. It's definitely more for text posts, but it's really fun to ask questions and get feedback and see other people's art. It's a perfect companion to Insta, and the algorithm really is tailored to the way I use the app.

I edited this review: The typing bug makes it almosy unusable. In Threads, and only Threads, I will suddenly randomly have chunks of text repeated with every letter I type, huge sections will be deleted, and my cursor will just decide to start wherever it wants. Again, this is ONLY in Threads. Every other app I have is fine. Typing (which is basically one of maybe two ways to interact with Threads) simply doesn't work well.

initially I wasn't to keen on this app. However if you use Instagram, threads is a must. Since I got the app I haven't regretted it as one does nowadays with so many nonsense apps that don't work properly. Threads has kinda been an extension of Instagram and I have read and enjoyed some really intelligent posts and opinions of thread users. a welcome surprise. Not at all what I was expecting having read tons of reviews as I always due prior to deciding. Get it.

Overall, it's good. Fun app. But the only problem is the voice recorder that suddenly went missing and then I looked it up online and saw that it happened to all android phones. I hope y'all can fix this issue because especially for youngsters who are interested in singing, it's a great platform and I believe that voice thing has been a great help to many people, including me.

You really need to fix this bug where the microphone suddenly disappears (the direct messaging option too btw, but I don't care since I didn't really like the idea.). I have absolutely no interest in using the app without it, and besides, I thought I'd finally found MY app. I'm really disappointed. the application is simply taking the form of Instagram 2.0

They disabled my account after ONE "are u a bot?" verification without any details and no possibility of making an appeal ðŸ˜­ They said you can download details but you can't have a details of the posts you've made I almost deleted that app for good. it's so annoying cause the new one I created with the same selfy went okay ??? just said you let a bot made the verification and that's all !! it's infuriating cause it wasn't a "professional page" but I wish I could at least have the post I've made

This app is horrible and it has some terrible bugs that the developers are too complacent to fix. A couple of days ago, I deactivated my threads profile. Now, everytime, I want to log in to it, it keeps saying that an unexpected error has occurred. I don't know what to do. If someone has any solution regarding it, please let me know it.

initially I wasn't to keen on this app. However if you use Instagram, threads is a must. Since I got the app I haven't regretted it as one does nowadays with so many nonsense apps that don't work properly. Threads has kinda ðŸ been an extension of Instagram and I have read and enjoyed some really intelligent posts and opinions of thread users. a welcome surprise. Not at all what I was expecting having read tons of reviews as I always due prior to deciding. Get it.

The app didn't let me finish the sign up process and kept throwing an error. And when I restarted it, it tells me my account was suspended and I have to make an appeal??!? How can you suspend an account that you didn't let me finish creating???! Very shady practices

This is probably my favorite social media app. It's just a great app. Simple to use and navigate, while being fun. I like being able to comment and share as needed. It's easy to find threads that match your interests. Kinda wish you could add more than one hashtag per thread. That's the only downside and not enough to downgrade the 5 stars I'm giving it.

The app needs stability. I'll be in the middle of writing a response and the whole page will refresh on me while I'm writing, losing everything I started, especially if I'm just double checking the spelling of a word in my second or third language. It is so frustrating to be on part 2 or 3 of a thread and everything is gone! Can't find it again FAIL

Alright as long as you're not interested in actually using the app, at least if you're on Android (latest version of both app and OS). Keeps telling me I have notifications, but when I click it, I can't see any notifications at all. Neither can I see all the people I follow, only the three people I followed when I first made the account. Terrible experience for the time being. Typical Meta quality.

Threads is one of the best social media apps out there! Itâ€™s a great platform to connect and communicate with strangers in a wholesome and genuine way. Iâ€™ve met new friends and had amazing conversations here. However, the inconsistent updates can be a bit frustrating at times. Sometimes, there's messages/dm and at times it disappear.

Would give zero stars if I can. app is unreliable and one of the best features (voice notes) randomly disappeared so some people can use them and some cant. I can no longer post any myself. Moderation is AI based, often flagging content incorrectly. shutting accounts down with no human appeal option or labeling people's posts as terrorism for posts not even remotely out of the box. This app is just turning into instagram 2.0 and its awful. The feed auto refreshes most of the time as well.

Edit 08/25: they fixed it. 08/23: You broke the app recently with one of the updates. Try to click on a Thread shown in Instagram, and the app in Google Play store appears, asking me to open the app. Then it does NOT open to the correct Thread I just clicked, but a completely different one. It previously opened to the correct Thread I clicked immediately. No need to re-open the app from the Google Play store. I'm stopping using Threads because of this broken software.

Not too bad when it comes to uncensoring politics. The only issue is sometimes the veiw count just doesn't appear. I'm a small account, so veiws are sometimes the only way I know my posts are even being seen. For the same reason it would be better if at least author could see the unavailable comments. But the edit feature, even being timed, is far better than having to delete a post just to add a comma or something. I can't believe apps like tiktok and instagram still don't have edit buttons.

For some reason If I open a thread and then go back to the feed, the screen jumps to the next thread. Also, if I am watching a video and I like it, it immediately starts over even If I'm mid watching the video. Both things are annoying.

I would've given 0 stars but the app wouldn't let me. I've been capped at 552 followers, yet everyday I'm forced to follow more and more accounts I didn't agree to follow! I had 552 followers the day I started the account and a year later it's still at 552 followers. But the accounts I involuntarily follow go up continually.

I like the idea, but the design and execution just isn't there. It's such a buggy app. I've been getting multiple notifications that I have pending follow requests, yet when I go to view the requests and approve them, they are nowhere to be found. As an app that's based on followers and following, this issue shouldn't be so prevalent. Get it together Threads, do better.

Quit shadow banning people especially established users. New accounts get thrown into the feed, while chronic users with bigger followings get 30 views wit 5,000 flwrs. Show content in the feed of a person's fllwrs. Also seen ðŸª¡ðŸ§µ take followers, watched it happen on my account recently after hearing bout it, & know it's happened by at least 50 at a time, bout 100 1 day. especially if getting close to a milestone. it's not unfollowers, it's threads. other than that It's perfect, all but the bots

I'll change my review of this app if somebody can explain to me why every single time I leave the app (while it is still active in the background), and then return to it seconds later, my feed refreshes itself all the way back to the top, forcing me to lose the post I was just looking at. This happens MORE than 75% of the time. Extremely frustrating.

I actually like it. wanted to give at least 3 stars but it's not consistent the constant updates help it. but finally some people u can message within the app without ig. but u have to follow them, then again some u don't have to follow but your allowed to inbox them. then replying back to people sometimes glitches u cant see on post exactly where it left off.

not bad but there really isn't much of a difference between the feed of posts and your notifications when it fills it with "suggested posts" and no way to turn that off! I realise I won't get many notifications if I don't post or comment too much but that doesn't mean you get to clogg up the notifications tray with more posts!

It's full of bots and people trying to sell themselves but they don't give up trying to get your payment details even when you clearly say no. I haven't met 1 normal nice person,only chose 1 star as I can't rate with zero or a minus number

Best, but needs more improvement. it's a place for having conversations on similar topics or maybe about something interesting. but people are using it like Instagram that's what bothers me the most. for those Instagram like post can't find any topics to talk about and users like me don't get reach at all.

Great app! I dropped the other similar app as soon as it was purchased by Mr. musty. Threads is easier for me and has a better flow. I spend a lot more time on Threads than I ever did on the other one! Mainly because it's easier to navigate and type entries. I'm also using it on my iPhone and on my Android phone. Great job designers!
Cannot login after upgrade to S25 ultra. I have no problem logging in Instragram, but it keeps saying unexpected error when I try to login using the same login+password. Will give it a zero if I can.

Instagram, and the app in Google Play store appears, asking me to open the app. Then it does NOT open to the correct Thread I just clicked, but a completely different one. It previously opened to the correct Thread I clicked immediately. No need to re-open the app from the Google Play store. I'm stopping using Threads because of this broken softvware.

Iâ€™ve been exploring Threads lately â€” itâ€™s simple, smooth, and feels like a chill corner of social media. Love how easy it is to connect with my Instagram audience and share thoughts that donâ€™t need a photo every time. Still new, but definitely growing on me.

It forces you to see what Meta wants you to see and not those you are following. In order to see what you're interested in, you have to change to that page every time and there's no way to change the setting. Bots, p0rn, racists and trans are accountable for 99% of the "recommended" posts. No access to AI for fact checking.

for the last week or so gifs will not load no matter what I do. I've uninstalled, restarted the phone, uninstalled both threads and Instagram, emptied chaches.... Nothing has helped. it's still one of my favorite apps, I just wish it was fully functional again. It also would be helpful to have things in chronological order instead of totally random

Love threads, it's much more about people that aren't celebrities connecting. That's the best part for me. Also love that its largely a text based app. However meta is gonna kill the vibe with them trying to create more infinte scroll. Used to be able to view top and recent posts on a thread in separate columns which was very user friendly. They've now changed it so it's all on one long scroll ðŸ™„. Would have rated 5 starts prior to this change.

I really like Threads bc I learn more about current events on there, then on my local news. recently there has been a problem, my follower count is wrong, and I've submitted help requests and asked for help repeatedly, and they don't respond or fix it for me.

Threads faces a bit of a technical problem when it comes to TalkBack: The screen reader doesn't respond whenever I move my finger around the screen and only vibrates. In fact, a large part (almost the entire app) of Threads doesn't work when in TalkBack mode. So instead of touch exploration, what I do is just swipe the screen left or right. But touch exploration is also really necessary. It's just that because the app has a problem with TalkBack, I can't use it much either. Please, fix these iss

you need to introduce being able to edit posts after you post them until then I'm leaving this as a two star review. (goes for instagram too) because you won't actually do anything about it until we start making you look bad, and it's not a difficult thing to introduce. I think it's something really small but beneficial that you've put on the backburner. I guess one star looks better

Throws out what you're looking at in the middle of reading almost every post. Explicitly hides perfectly benign comments, then either makes interacting with them or even reading them at all impossible. Overall, a broken app at best and an intentionally painful one at worst.

Horrible & out of touch! I posted for the first time on Threads. It was not hate speech but the reply I immediately received back was. I tried to respond to explain where I was coming from but I couldn't because that person obviously had reported me and created their own personal verbal attack over my original post. Again. my post had nothing to cause a stir like that. Their reply was extremely disrespectful. Thank you for letting me try this app but I won't be coming back.

Last review was in August, but the issue still exists. you cant directly share from Threads to Facebook. You either get a blank post or just a link. considering the prevalent nature of Meta and it's holdings, I expect better. Again, I really wish I could give partial stars. This app would get 1/5 stars.

Extremely Jank and unstable, not sure what notifications get stuck on it and everytime you reinstall it cuts you from your messages.. so who knows who dumb idea that was. Barely worth it why it only gets one star
people's here are friendly nature, i like this app, makes new friends, in real life it's difficult to find friend with same thought but here it's easy to have friends with good nature.

I'm not uploading a selfie for "identity verification" just to join this platform. F off. Uploading a selfie does not verify anyone's identity, and I'm sure not going to upload a government issued ID or anything else, either. Less social media traffic and ad revenue for you.

I don't know why I pressed this button it just looks cool it's just another button that at once pressed get your pictures of cool looking people and others and more typed words. genuinely I'm not looking for more typing I'm more talking touching kissing along with more activities to do together I don't know if they developed that app yet. when I wrote above is the type of app I'm looking for also the type of people who want the same are the ones that I am trying to attract. WISH ME LUCK â¤ï¸ðŸ¤ž

Lie, why is threads playing roulette with the UI? I deleted and reinstalled yesterday and my messaging icon is gone. Search is back to the base tab but for some reason I can search my content now? I can't message anybody. Which is weird because when I logged back in, first thing it asked me was if I wanted only those that followed me to message me or everybody...what's going on??

Aye been on this app for a couple of days now. There's some genuine good people on it but there is also lots of bot accounts of girls wanting to connect on telegram. You also seem to get a shadow ban for saying certain words like bomb bath which is ridiculous, but overall aye'm enjoying my time on it.....

This app is the true definition of spam. The threads continually appear on the feed and you cannot remove them or even elect to have them not appear at all. The only way to interact with this garbage is to actually download the app. Well done, cyber twits. Free tip, add a negative stars option so we can rate you accurately. Enjoy the review.

This app always has a technical issue or error to bother you with. Lately my profile got stuck with login problems and the messages tab just totally disappeared. Tried to open a new account but it got deleted 30 minutes later with no reason, no appeal option and nowhere to complain. Not worth it anymore

I love the option to save different types of feeds and add the topics and profiles to be in there without needing to follow them. I wish that they would update the following feed to be more real time, where you can see your new thread show up right away. I also would like to see replies to threads show up in following feeds. For following feed it should be tailored toward seeing reactions, responses, and new posts sooner in order to react with your direct following smoothly.

title: TomTom - Maps & Traffic
description:
TomTom â€“ GPS Navigation App for Every Driver
Meet your new go-to navigation app. Whether you're planning a weekend road trip, commuting to work, or simply exploring new roads, TomTom provides the GPS navigation experience drivers trust. Built with the latest maps, real-time traffic alerts, and precision routing, this navigation app is designed to get you where you need to goâ€”faster and safer.

Navigate With Confidence
Enjoy detailed turn-by-turn GPS navigation globally. TomTomâ€™s regularly updated maps offer accurate road geometry, lane guidance, and intersection viewsâ€”so you never miss a turn. Itâ€™s smart, flexible, and ready for the road.

Real-Time Traffic Information
Avoid delays and bottlenecks with accurate traffic data updated in real time. Receive warnings about road closures, congestion, and incidents ahead. With live traffic updates, the app automatically adjusts your navigation route to keep you moving efficiently.

Complete Driving Support
â€¢ More than just a GPS tool, TomTom is your all-in-one driving companion.
â€¢ Get speed camera alerts and current vs. limit speed info
â€¢ Choose multiple route types: fastest, shortest, or most efficient
â€¢ View real-time traffic flows and lane suggestions

Android Auto Compatibility
Project your GPS navigation experience to your carâ€™s screen with Android Auto. The clean interface is distraction-freeâ€”no ads, no pop-upsâ€”just clear maps, directions, and traffic info designed for safer driving.

Smart Features for Smarter Navigation

TomTom helps you make the most of your drive with essential navigation tools:
â€¢ Detailed maps for cities and rural areas alike
â€¢ Community-powered reports for hazards and speed traps
â€¢ Location-based suggestions for rest stops, food, and services
â€¢ Reliable ETAs powered by live traffic and real-time rerouting

Safe, Private, and Ad-Free
Focus on the road ahead. With TomTom, your data stays private, and your navigation is never interrupted by ads or tracking.

Download the TomTom GPS Navigation app now â€“ drive smarter with real-time traffic, precise maps, and expert-level GPS navigation.
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Use of TomTom app is subject to Terms & Conditions at: https://www.tomtom.com/navigation/mobile-apps/tomtom-app/disclaimer/
