summary: Formerly AmiGO - Now TomTom

scraped_reviews.content: Most apps put the option to avoid certain roads under settings. With Tomtom , you have to configure it when setting up your route. It's saved, but it's an odd place to put it.. Another problem that needs resolving is not showing the actual street you're supposed to turn on, but just showing distance from the turn and an arrow pointing to the right of left. This sometimes forces users with hearing lost to spend more time staring at the map to avoid missing a turn than watching the road.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Edward, thanks for your trust and for updating your rating. Drive safely! ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: "updated" app sucks. Freezes every time I type in an address or location name. I hope you have better luck than me. I'll stick with Google Maps. I downloaded the app for a 3rd time. I can input my home and work addresses. App closes when adding favorites, or looking at the map. Open the app and it closes. I'm back with the reliable Google maps, works without fault for me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mike, thanks for the details. We have released the app update, please install it from Play Store and test it again. Let us know how the current version works for you. Your insights are valuable and play a key role in shaping its development. Regards, ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: changing voices. I downloaded this app because I remember the GPS's in the past where you could change the voices to funny characters or whatever. it seems that this app does not have that. I would love it if they could bring it back so we could have the voices of our choice. if there is a way to change the voice, please let me know somebody. thank you
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Thomas, thank you for your input. We rely on feedback like yours to identify areas for improvement and enhance our services. We appreciate your suggestion and will share it with the team for future consideration. Greetings, ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: Clean interface but less flexible than my old hardware GPS. No apparent way to program in alternate stops or routes. Only options that are preprogrammed: eco, fast, short, winding. with certain selections to avoid routing through tollways, interstates, ferries, etc. This means having to manually route multiple separate segments if you want to do a route different from what the algorithm chooses for you. That's a step back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for your feedback. We are actively monitoring users' feedback and requested features, and will include yours for the team to review. Stay tuned for upcoming app updates, and we appreciate your contribution! ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: This was just working on Android Auto, but it was very slow in drawing or redrawing the maps, following a route, directions, and speed cameras appearing, but after the last update. Tomtom will only load a map if near wifi or mobile signal. It fails completely if the phone is not in a wifi signal or using the phone data, or there is no phone signal. It fails to load an offline map or a GPS signal position. so the saved offline maps fails to load. All I get is a black screen and a error message.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Alan, We're sorry to hear about the issues you're experiencing with the app on Android Auto. Please note that TomTom is an online app, and you will need at least one active data connection, either through Wi-Fi or mobile data, for it to function properly. Thank you! ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: They screwed up the Android Auto experience. Can't navigate or get speed limit without putting in a destination. Can't adjust the speed warning margin. Also it doesn't register with Android as a navigation app, so can't click on an address and navigate. Also doesn't give the ability to plan a drive between two locations other than where I'm at right now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Weâ€™re sorry to hear that your Android Auto experience has been negatively affected. We understand that navigating and accessing speed limits without a destination is frustrating, and that adjustable speed warning margins are needed. Your feedback is important, and weâ€™ll share your concerns with our team. Thank you! ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: the app will get you from point A to point B no problem but I think for it being from Tom Tom, it's missing some modern features. First, I like how it displays the route shield which is easier to follow, but sometimes if you get on a divided highway, it won't give you the direction (i.e I-81 N). Also, there is no lane monitor for exits like most other apps do. Overall, the idea is great but I think if they add these features, then it would be better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gabriel, appreciate your view. Our lane-guidance module is integrated. Please provide the route data and exact GPS coordinates for I-81 N to enable reproducible testing. Thanks, ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: This was a good navigation app until one of the recent updates. Now for some reason it directs me to the HOV lane each day. Not only can I not use that because I don't have enough people in my car it is also a toll lane if you don't have enough people. Please tell me if there is somewhere I'm not seeing to turn off the HOV routing. Completely ruins the ETAs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Weâ€™re sorry to hear about the issues with HOV lane routing after the recent update. Please check the app settings to see if thereâ€™s an option to disable HOV lane routing. Your feedback is important, and weâ€™ll share your concerns with our team. Thank you! ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: Superb routing algorithm around traffic. However the POI database is quite limited. Please work on improving the POI database. EDIT: Hi Jas, thanks for your response! What I meant by limited POI database is that many local places â€” such as community centres, restaurants, cafÃ©s, parking areas, and even smaller retail stores â€” often donâ€™t appear in search results. In some cases, the listed POIs are outdated or have incorrect names/locations.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Aditya, thanks for your reply. We appreciate your insights regarding POIs. Your feedback has been logged and will be shared with the team to help improve the accuracy and coverage of our database in future updates. Thanks again for helping us enhance the app! ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: I wanted to like the app but after trying it locally, it gave several lots of very confusing directions which would have resulted in me going the wrong way numerous times, so I can't trust it in an area I don't know. At one point, it also tried to direct me, off left, through an industrial estate instead of straight on the dual carriageway and left at the roundabout, what's that about, I want to use the main road not some random cut through?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Karen, We are very sorry that your experience with AmiGO wasn't the best. We need the following information to be able to reproduce the problem and resolve it quickly. Â·Start and end point? Expected behavior? Date & time of the incident occurrence. ^Nikita

scraped_reviews.content: This app is promising. I'm looking for a Google maps replacement. if you can completely plan a trip beforehand, great. 1. I don't see where I can add stops along the way towards a destination. This means planning and storing a lot of smaller trips. 2. I am unable to use a phrase like, "near me", which is a very valuable function. I would like to be able to say, "this store, near me", while I am driving but using voice. 3. Would like to "resume".
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello John, Thank you for your feedback and for considering our app. We appreciate your suggestions on adding stops along the way and improving voice commands like "near me." The "resume" feature is also a great idea. Your input is valuable as we work on enhancing the app. If you have any more suggestions, feel free to share! ^Noor

scraped_reviews.content: This has options that Google maps does not. You get 4 choices of how your route is created. You can favor travel time, distance driven, saving fuel, or make it more "thrilling." The type of route a driving app gives you is one of the most important things to me! That makes it a great alternative to the pre installed maps app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thank you for your positive review. We are pleased that you like our app and that it meets your expectations. We're committed to continually enhancing your app experience. Cheers! ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: The routing is good and the app is honestly really slick and I enjoyed it. There were times when the screen on android auto would be black when the car started and you'd have to restart the app on your phone to get it to come back up. The whole reason for the 2* review is that it is a complete battery hog! Even while plugged in, my phone was losing about 1% every 2 or 3 minutes. I deleted it, went back to Google Maps and all of a sudden no more battery drain while navigating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Chris, thanks for flagging this. Clear the app cache, close background apps, reboot, and test with only TomTom running. After 30â€“60 mins, check battery usage and update us. On Android Auto, clear caches, ensure Location is â€œAlways allow,â€ battery is â€œUnrestricted,â€ and power-saving is off. Restart both devices and try again. ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: I used this for the first time on an Android Auto screen on the motorbike (Go Ride isn't compatible with Android Auto, sadly). It worked very well. It was useful to get a view of the upcoming road and to keep an eye on the speed limits and any speed scameras. It would be nice to have a few more features, such as the ability to record a route, add waypoints, etc. Also, personally, I'd like a little more contrast on the map.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gary, customer feedback is invaluable to us, and we're committed to improving the navigation experience of the TomTom AmiGO community. Your insights help us ensure that the app meets and exceeds your expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. The same will be forwarded to the relevant team for review. ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: Increasingly sending me to the wrong place. I put in Carl's Jr and it sent me to Sonic. This kind of thing has happened several times. When I'm delivering, sometimes it will get me close to where I'm going, but down the street, or around the corner, or even sends me down sketchy allys.... This app needs A LOT of bug fixing / improvements to its maps. I can not recommend this to anyone who NEEDS accuracy in their GPS app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Apologies for the letdown, Mike. Please share the make and model of your vehicle. Which profile is selected in the app? Regards, ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: I like that it was free. The graphics kind of remind me of Garmin's, which is a good thing. The font size on my phone is so small for upcoming roads that it makes it half as helpful as it could be. (Difficult even with brand new prescription eyeglasses. I'm not sure I could have read it at any distance even when I was a teenager.) When navigating to an address, I like that little flash It give you as a heads up. It seems they want to make this some sort of social app as well. That has no appeal.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Nick, Thanks for bringing this to our attention! We rely on input such as this to make us aware of things that can be done better. Please help us improve our app rating to five stars if you like the new features. ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: Dropping my review all the way down to 1 star. When I pointed out the trip progress line across the bottom of my screen no longer shows upcoming traffic, the response was to clear cache and make sure permissions are allowed. So basically putting the blame on me. I did all that, even double checked settings and reinstalled. STILL NO TRAFFIC showing up on the line across the bottom of the screen. Stop blaming the user and fix your app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Keith, sorry for the frustration caused. We appreciate you trying those steps. Please email us at tomtom-gonav-support@tomtom.com with your phone make and model so we can look into it further. ^Noor

scraped_reviews.content: Map is missing too many streets. App doesn't allow nearly enough customization (ie. you're stuck with the blue arrow as the vehicle icon). Very disappointing given how exceptionally well TomTom's SatNav devices performed. Additional: despite reporting missing streets, the map remains unchanged. Outdated maps are of little use. This app isn't worthy of TomTom. Uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sean, sorry to hear about the issue with the App. We have shared your feedback internally with the team and will ensure to improve our services. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. ^Nikita

scraped_reviews.content: Editing review almost a year after the developer promissed to resolve the issue which I mentioned earlier hasn't been resolved! The overlay function that appears on top of Maps was fantastic along with speed limit. But speed limit isn't displaying anymore. Now it only shows speed I am travelling which is shown by my dash camera and the Maps too. If speed limit isn't included then there's no point having this app. Thanks for this app, I've enjoyed for over 5 years, now it's time to say, "See ya"!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sagun, thanks for your feedback. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Your input is valuable as we strive to improve the app. Weâ€™ll be sure to pass your suggestions along to the team! If you have more insights, feel free to share! ^Monika

scraped_reviews.content: I bought the Tom-gadget and one has to use this app for that. There are missing roads, unnecessary detours and it wanted me to go into a one-way street. It also doesn't show the lane when exiting the highway. and sometimes the blue line for you to follow disappears. There's also a lot less options in this app compared to the normal Tomtom app. I'm switching back to the normal Tomtom app even though it costs money because this app is totally unusable. I wish the gadget would work with regular app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Marcel, sorry to hear about your experience. For the missing roads, please share the coordinates so we can verify. For detours and one-way streets, send the start/end points and the affected streets. Meanwhile, go to App Settings- General- Route Updates and select Manual. The blue route line (Route Tube) one is already under review. ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: I am still using the app post upgrade. But it has lost the nice features that made Amigo stand out above the other phone navigation apps. Being able to switch to overlay on known roads was brilliant, may I suggest you make the speedo icon larger now it is top left. And voice warnings were always better than just a "Beep". Sad to say but the app has become average.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kevin, we understand this may not be what you prefer.To learn more about the transition, auto-start, and overlay, please check this link: https://bit.ly/46SD7rz. Verbal warnings: Please check Settings, Warnings, and ensure all are enabled with voice. If there is no change, share your car phone setup. ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: For some reason roads in the UK have their UK number (eg M8, A701) and they also have an E number showing. This is on both the map itself and exit instructions. E is not used in the UK road numbering system. Also I can send a location in Android to Google Maps and Sygic (both of which I use), I cannot send a destination to TomTom. Please correct the above.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Giles, We appreciate your feedback regarding the road numbering issue in the UK and the inability to send locations to TomTom from Android. We understand how important accurate information and functionality are for your navigation needs.^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: Finally they merged the two apps. That's good news! Now work on some issues and it will be perfect. For instance the display during traffic jams is quite confusing. It updates on a irregular basis, like after driving 2km it will eventually update the remaining distance and time in the traffic jam. Also I cannot tell in the app that an hazard is no longer there.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Frederic, thanks for sharing your observation. Please force close the app and restart your phone. Ensure that Location is set to â€œAllow all the timeâ€, battery usage is â€œUnrestrictedâ€, and power-saving mode is turned off. Then try again and see if the issue persists. Keep us posted on how the live services are performing. ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: It was a 5+ star app. My main use was when my phone was in my pocket and locked. It would start automatically and alert me if I went over the speed limit. The camera alerts were a nice add on and the overlay mode when navigating was useful. Now all the good bits have gone and we're just left with camera alerts. Speed alerts were hit and miss for the last few years. If there is some reason why you can't do them anymore, just say that. Uninstalling for now, but I'll come back to check on it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Ian! We're sorry to hear that the update has removed many features you valued, such as automatic start and overlay mode. We understand your frustration with the changes and the inconsistent speed alerts. Your feedback is important, and we appreciate you considering returning in the future. ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: Useless since it was changed from AmiGo. There are no longer audio voice warnings for speed cameras or audio telling you your average speed when you are on an average speed route. Instead, you get a beep sound and a message on the screen meaning you got to take your eyes off the road to try and read it. All boxes have been ticked for audio options and warnings but they are not what they used to be. I really feel that something that was good has become dangerous due to having to read warnings.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Daniel, The transition to the TomTom app involves upgrading the technical infrastructure, allowing for improved app performance, easier implementation of new features and faster responses to user feedback. ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: As a long time user I'm very disappointed with the latest update. The auto start and voice alerts were USPs and now they're gone and it's just become another standard nav app like Waze or Google Maps. Update: the voice alerts are now working but they're too quiet. Previously there was an option to play the alerts through the phone speaker which was my preference but that option seems to have gone and I can't see any way to increase the volume when it comes through my car Bluetooth connection.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tim, We have started noting down the features our users would like to see. We will include your suggestion in our list so that our developers can start working on improvements behind the scenes. ^Monika

scraped_reviews.content: Since the update from AmiGo to TomTom, settings (like 3d buildings, traffic flow etc.) set in the app on phone do not apply when using the app on Android auto. Traffic also does not show at all while using AA. Selected map view just randomly resets during the drive, and is not saved for the next time you use the app. Also, it seems that you can't pan the map at all. So yeah, quite big things to fix.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Goran, we understand the situation you described. Android Auto currently follows its default behavior unlike in the app. This is under review, and weâ€™re working to optimize how Android Auto templates handle this going forward. Appreciate your contribution. Thanks, ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: not particularly pleased with the recent changes from "amigo" to just "GPS". I'm missing the linking it to the car, but far worse is the fact that you are very late in updating the texts for the directions you want to go. e.g. when going in .nl from the A12 onto the A28 you tell us to follow roadsigns for "Groningen". they aren't there. The signs say "Hengelo" and other places. that isn't the only place where the app is effectively misdirecting the user.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! The automatic start and shutdown feature when connecting to your car's Bluetooth has been deprioritized due to low usage. However, we continue to assess user feedback for potential reconsideration.^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: The last "update" is an elimination of features. You claim to make enhancements, but the truth is, it's a downgrade, pushing that users switch to the paid app, which cannot be downloaded in some countries from the PlayStore. No more overlay mode, running in the background stops navigation and warnings, voice alerts gone. Can't report any hazards, speed-cameras (where is this community-driven?), no automatic start when connecting to Bluetooth. Settings are crippled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Tom, Thank you for your feedback! Weâ€™re sorry to hear that the recent update has removed important features like overlay mode and voice alerts. We understand your frustration and appreciate your insights. Our team is actively working to address these concerns and improve the app. Your patience is valued!^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: I am looking for navigation that provides accurate travel time based on traffic. This seems promising but I am troubled it doesn't tell me which lane to be in and doesn't accurately know some road names or exit numbers. Lastly, the alerts about traffic ahead are really helpful but popup on top of the drive time. please think about moving it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tammy, thanks for your trust and for providing the details. We believe you are referring to the situation on Android Auto. Regarding lane guidance: does this happen when taking an exit? For road names and exit numbers, could you provide a bit more detail with a few examples? Looking forward to your response. ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: Amigo was excellent app. The replacement, TomTom has very little functionality, the warnings do not work, you can not change voice, no option to login to bring in your favorites and settings, no automatic start .... The list goes on. Typical example of trying to fix what was not broken and disappointing users in the process.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi M K, sorry to hear that. Please ensure voice alerts are enabled in the app settings. Currently, log-in functionality isn't supported, but we may consider it in the future. The auto start feature has been deprioritized due to low usage, though we appreciate your feedback. For more about our goals, visit: https://bit.ly/46SD7rz. ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: In reply to your response. It's impossible to zoom in or out or even access the map before a route is planned because there is a 'Drive Now' box in the way, and there is no way of closing it. In Waze there is a X in the top corner which lets you click it and close this box. When a route is chosen this box disappears, but it is still not possible to zoom in or out or pinch zoom the map. You have absolutely destroyed Amigo by making all these changes. It's a complete disaster on Android Auto.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, We have started noting down the features our users would like to see. We will include your suggestion in our list so that our developers can start working on improvements behind the scenes. Stay tuned! ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: This was a great app with clever ideas, but now seems to have removed anything innovative and added bugs. Routing seems better, but please fix the stuff you broke! Especially fix the voice warnings for those of us that like to hear the navigation instead of looking at our phones when we should be looking at the roads. It is app version 10.45.1 showing "always" and "voice". I'm also greatly missing the access to calendar and contacts from the destination search.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi John, we noted down your request for calendar and contacts which in the backlog. We will include your suggestion in our list so that our developers can start working on improvements behind the scenes. ^Monika

scraped_reviews.content: This was a 5* app before you removed the overlay mode. I used to be able to leave my phone locked in my pocket and still get alerted for speed cameras. Now you're trying to force us to use your app for navigation too? Uninstalled, it's so unfortunate the devs have gotten greedy. I'm sure most people use this app for the overlay and will be upset to see it gone. Add it back, until then, you've lost me as a user.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Avnish, we decided to eliminate overlay feature to focus on providing a comprehensive suite of driving tools that support users in various scenarios, rather than as a standalone warning tool. We encourage you to leverage the full capabilities of the TomTom app for safer and more enjoyable journeys. ^Monika

scraped_reviews.content: The app itself is fine. Works well and nicely presented.... BUT , I recently bought the "TOM" addition to place on the dash.... although it alerts to cameras, speed,etc... I can't get it to report anything?? All connected fine, and when you press to report a incident, it doesn't show on the app??
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kevin, sorry to hear about the issue youâ€™re facing. Weâ€™d like to take a closer look and help you get it resolved quickly. Please reach out to us at tomtom-app-support@tomtom.com with a brief description of the problem and your app version, so our team can assist you directly. Thanks for your patience and cooperation. ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: Fresh take on navigation, let me go with the things that I liked the most, It gives you option to select the preferred navigation mode, 1. Fuel 2. Time 3. Distance 4. Adventure UI is cleaner compared to other apps, still provides alerts. 3d buildings and navigation. Things that I didn't like, (Canada) Tolls. I specifically selected to avoid tolls, it still took me through 407 ETR on almost every trip. Maps are not updated, road closures are not shown Hope these issues are fixed soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there, We have started noting down the features our users would like to see. We will include your suggestion in our list so that our developers can start working on improvements behind the scenes. Stay tuned! ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: Under "settings" the unit for distance defaults to "automatic". I am in the UK so miles and yards is what I expect and is what I get on screen. However, the voice always gives me km and metres! This can be frustrating and I need to change it to "manual" every time I open the app. And, of course, you must be stopped and engine off to do this! Please fix this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Chris, sorry for the inconvenience. This is a known one currently under investigation, and we hope to have it fixed in upcoming updates. Thanks for your patience. Regards, ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: This was a great app when it was AmiGO because it came on automatically when connected to Bluetooth in my car and gave me speed camera alerts and warnings. I gave it a 5 star review. Since the update to TomTom I cannot find a setting to enable the app to automatically start up when connected to my car Bluetooth. Have you removed this function?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! The automatic start and shutdown feature when connecting to your car's Bluetooth has been deprioritized due to low usage. However, we continue to assess user feedback for potential reconsideration. Thank you for your input! ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: Disappointing update. Previously, Amigo did everything I wanted. I particularly liked the audible warnings when exceeding the speed limit. Now, even though it's on in the settings, there are no audible alerts, so I'm back to staring at the speedometer instead of watching the road, which is where my eyes should be.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Dave, Hello! Weâ€™re aware that the app only provides a beep on speed camera instead of voice alerts, and we are actively working on resolving this issue. Thank you for your feedback! ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: Tomtom have replaced Amigo, a good satnav app, with an unfinished app. My home address is now wrong and can't be corrected (apparently every house on the lane is #39). Worse, while the units are correctly auto set to miles/yards, the voice tells me everything in km and meters, again, there is no option to change. Additionally, sound from the app rarely works on Android Auto. The navigation engine is listed as a release candidate version. Bring Amigo back until Tomtom gets past the Alpha stage.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Pat, we understand your disappointment. Addresses database: Please use our MapShare link to report it,https://bit.ly/47j5kVD, and share the report ID so we can quickly resolve it. Voice alerts in km/ mt. is the known one. Voice on AA: We are already on it. Expect it to be resolved soon in upcoming updates. Thanks for your patience. ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: *edited* used to be good, why has overlay/speedometer mode been removed on the last update? this was the part if the app i used most as u could overlay it wherever i like â˜¹ï¸ -----------------------------â€---------------------- Good little app, works well and notifies of most cameras, current speed limit is very useful although sometimes displays the wrong speed limit! would be nice if you could adjust the size of the window in overlay mode. If you drive a lot I'd definately recommend it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Phil, Its designed to offer comprehensive features that assist drivers in various situations, rather than serving as a standalone warning tool. We encourage you to use the complete app. Weâ€™re continuously working on updating our map data. If you experience any errors please report on https://www.tomtom.com/mapshare/tools/new/mapshare/. ^Nikita

scraped_reviews.content: This was a 5 star app, but since the last update September 25 you have taken away all the things that made it 5*. No auto start/stop anymore. No overlay mode anymore. No voice warning for speed camera's and average speed zones it's just a ping now, What's that all about. I'm going back to Waze until you sort this out. I've been using this app for 8 years this last update is very disappointing do your research before changing everything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Bob, thanks for sharing your view. Auto Start is retired due to low usage to focus on higherâ€‘value work. Overlay: The new version aims to enhance the driving experience, so we recommend using the complete app for alerts, traffic info, and optimal routes for a safer journey. Voice alerts: Enable it via the app's settings. Regards, ^Jas

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using the app for several years as an overlay with Google Maps and really enjoyed having two sets of eyes for speed cameras (5 stars!). Unfortunately it looks as though the overlay feature is no longer available..? (1 stars if true) Also, there's also been a conflict with alerts where they'll try to sound at the same time but, rather than sounding one after the other they override each other, cancel each other out, so neither is fully announced-can they be queued after each other?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear that the overlay feature is no longer available. The changes have been made to enhance core functionalities, but we recognize their significance. Regarding the alert conflicts, your feedback about queuing them is valuable, and we're looking into improvements. ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: The enshitification of TomTom products continues. The limited but viable AmiGo has been replaced with this abomination that shows "General Error. Please try again later." whenever you enter any destination. Search can no longer find ANYTHING, no matter how common or obvious. Every "update" makes the product less useful. Pure garbage all round. I guess TomTom is to be commended for keeping otherwise unemployable people off the dole.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Weâ€™re sorry to hear about your frustrating experience. Do you have an active internet connection, and are you using any VPN that might be blocking the app's connection? This information will help us investigate the issue further. Thank you! ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: The update is smoother and works well, but some key features are missing. The app no longer auto-starts with Bluetooth, speed limits are often inaccurate (e.g. random 48mph on UK roads), and the voice alert option for speed cameras â€“ where you could choose how early or late it played â€“ has been removed. Please bring these back for a more reliable experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello!Thanks for the review- This feature has been deprioritized due to low usage, but we continue to assess user feedback for potential reconsideration.. ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: App autostart/stop in same time with car bluetooth connection has been removed!!! to make us buy a Tom i assume. Evryone is complaining but response is that was low use...Really.??? No more..., speed and camera warning given even on lock screen without starting the app yourself...I got other better options If I have to use the phone to start navigation. Still, very clear screen layout. Rerouting works fine for me. No ads so far.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Weâ€™re sorry to hear about the removal of the auto start/stop feature with car Bluetooth. We understand how important speed and camera warnings are, especially without needing to start the app manually. Your feedback is valuable, and weâ€™ll share your concerns with our team.^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: I used old Amigo app in background to get audible warnings of speed cameras, accidents etc. Since upgrade audible warning no longer works, so app is now useless for me. Can't see any improvements with the upgrade. Fiddled about with colours etc but once again seems to be upgrade to fix what wasn't broken in the first place. Now doesn't work properly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're sorry to hear that the upgrade hasn't met your expectations and that the audible warnings are no longer functioning. This feature is on our roadmap, and we understand how important it is for your experience. We're committed to addressing these issues and appreciate your feedback as we work to improve the app! ^Rahyl

scraped_reviews.content: Speed camera alert sound has changed from a beep to some weird clicking sound. Very distracting and the first time I heard it I thought something had happened while I was driving. Whoever came up with the terrible idea for this new sound has turned this app into a danger for anyone using it. Edit: I wish I could remove the remaining star. The app is now a shadow of its former self with most of the features now removed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Mark, we appreciate your feedback and understand your concerns about the lack of vocal alerts. We recognize that voice navigation is crucial for safe driving and are actively working to restore this feature. Your input is invaluable, and weâ€™re committed to improving the app for a better user experience. Thank you for your patience! ^Nikita

scraped_reviews.content: Great app, I prefer using TomTom over other navigation apps. However, after the latest update, I can no longer find the Route Options (to avoid tolls, highways, etc.) under Settings. At the moment, these can only be selected before starting a Drive on the mobile app, and in the Android Auto version they are not available at all. Additionally, after the update there is no Settings button on Android Auto. Please consider adding back Route Options under Settings and settings button on Android Auto.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Elyar Hp, Thank you for your review! Weâ€™re delighted to hear you love the app. Your insights on Route Options and Android Auto settings are incredibly valuable to us. We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts, and weâ€™re committed to making your experience even better! ^ TomTom team

scraped_reviews.content: Doesn't work. Tried it twice via Android Auto. First time it simply didn't pick up location. Told it to navigate to home and all it did was centre map on home area. Second time it sorted of picked up location but jumped to random nearby locations as I drove, didn't give driving directions and was this useless. Swapped back to Google Maps en route which immediately picked up location and gave perfect directions
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Robert, clear the cache for Android Auto and the app, remove AA from Bluetooth list (phone), and ensure Location- allow all the time, battery- unrestricted, and power settings are correct. Restart both devices. If it still doesnâ€™t work, were you setting the destination verbally or manually? Check the appâ€™s speaker icon and phone volume. ^Jas

title: Google Drive
description:
Google Drive lets you securely store, intelligently organize and collaborate on files and folders from anywhere, on any device.

With Drive, you can:
â€¢ Safely store and access your files anywhere
â€¢ Edit and store 100+ file types, including PDFs, Office files, videos and more
â€¢ Scan and upload paper documents using your deviceâ€™s camera
â€¢ Quickly access recent and important files
â€¢ Search for files by name and content
â€¢ Filter files by type, last modified date and more
â€¢ Share and set permissions for files and folders
â€¢ View your content on the go while offline
â€¢ Receive notifications about important activity on your files
â€¢ View files more easily on Android tablets with side by side view, drag and drop functionality and more

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Drive functionality, including:
â€¢ Using AI to summarize information, retrieve quick facts, and surface insights from your files
â€¢ Security and management controls for admins to help meet data compliance needs
â€¢ Sharing files and folders directly with groups or teams within your organization
â€¢ Creating a shared drive to store all of your teamâ€™s content
â€¢ Requesting electronic signatures and manage vendor agreements, customer contracts, and more

Learn more about Drive in Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/drive/

Learn more about Google Apps update policy: https://support.google.com/a/answer/6288871

Google accounts get 15GB of storage, shared across Google Drive, Gmail, and Google Photos. For additional storage, you can upgrade to Google One as an in-app purchase. In the US, subscriptions start at $1.99/month for 100 GB with Google One. Plans and prices can vary by region.

Google Privacy Policy: https://www.google.com/intl/en_US/policies/privacy
Google Drive Terms of Service: https://www.google.com/drive/terms-of-service

Follow us for more:
X: https://x.com/googleworkspace and https://x.com/googledrive
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace/

scraped_reviews.content: Typical of Google's half baked apps, I find the file system very lacking. For example, why does the file line NOT show the file size? it makes me go 2 extra steps to select More Information to see it. Quite a nuisance when I'm trying to manage my storage. I use a 3rd party file manager (CX File Explorer) to see relevant information. Either the devs are incompetent or Google is doing this on purpose so you aren't watching your space until it's time to try to sell us more. Try harder Google!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi John. Is there something we could help you with to turn that frown upside down? Please visit the Help Center: (goo.gle/3GFExFq) or the Community Forum: (goo.gle/3GvPskW) for any additional assistance. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: This app sucks for a cloud storage app. It doesn't allow you to look up the folder properties (size, number of folders, or number of files in a folder), and it doesn't allow you to copy a folder from one location to another. These are basic features that any cloud storage app should have. Google's competitor Mega has both. That Google doesn't have either in 2025 is really backwards.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Richard. Thanks for the feedback! You can also send it here: Google Drive app > Menu > Help & Feedback. Appreciate it.

scraped_reviews.content: Drive works great on a desktop...but this is the app version and it can't even download files consistently, or keep track of them to download. If you download multiple files it doesn't queue them but tries to do them all at once. It's super buggy and takes forever to show thumbnails. The only reason I use this app is because I don't have another one and I paid for extra storage. It shouldn't take an hour to download ten photos.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Ben. Please check your internet connection by doing a Google search for 'internet speed test' as connection may be poor. Keep us updated!

scraped_reviews.content: App is great... until you use it a lot. As soon as you get storage use up to 80% or so it constantly badgers you to buy more, even when you have tons of space left. Annoying and cloying, bullying you to buy space you don't need. But stops your workflow constantly asking to upgrade on everything connected - email, files, pictures, etc. Every Google app now crawls because of popups to buy space - and you can't dismiss them for more than a single time and they come back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cody. Is there something we could help you with to turn that frown upside down? Please visit the Help Center (https://goo.gl/3Wq58E) or the Community Forum (https://goo.gl/DvMg7m) for any additional assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Since Google started counting Photo as part of the storage, I've been constantly fighting with "You're at 80% full! BUY MORE STORAGE." Oddly, my Drive docs are the only thing I need to access on multiple devices, but also taking up a miniscule amount of space (.doc and .pdf are NOT large files). Thus I'll be moving everything over to Proton to see how that goes. This may be a complete transfer depending on results. End of an era?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nicole. Your storage is shared across Google Drive, Gmail, and Google Photos. You can see the exact files taking up your storage quota here: https://goo.gle/4qjTt3H. Hope this info helps.

scraped_reviews.content: This app has potential. Unfortunately it doesn't respond to the user interface. Started uploading a music file from my phone, changed my mind and hit "cancel", and nothing happened. I actually ended up disabling the app. Then I enabled it again and it tried to start uploading again. Thankfully this time I was given the option to delete the file, which I had to do. Guys that's WAY TOO STUPID for a company of your status to have an app that doesn't do the simple things. ðŸ˜”
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thurman. Let's try resetting the app data. More info here (see "Clear the app's cache" section): https://goo.gl/gX7ctA Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: when it works, I like it. But then, I have gotten to rely on it and occasionally it won't let me open a file on my Android phone, even though I own the file. This has happened repeatedly over several years. have talk for the support multiple times. sometimes things help. sometimes nothing helps. eventually it will start to work again. very annoying when this happens! update: can't click/open the support link that I was given that I was given
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Martin. Let's connect you with our Support Team for help. Follow the link to get some help: https://goo.gl/LcAuFy. Keep us posted!

scraped_reviews.content: The app makes file backup and organization very, very easy. It's been great. However-- my one request is that the "you're running out of room" notice use an algorithm based on how quickly you use to your storage to set a more reasonable notice schedule. For instance, I have 200gb. Drive has been telling me for a year that I'm almost out of storage, because I hit 175gb. I don't need to know that every few days. I'm not using up the storage that quickly, so jeez, I get it.

So, I thought it was just my phone until I read the reviews after purchasing data I didn't need. I have come to the conclusion that this app just sucks. This app takes forever to upload documents only to have it disappear. I have lost very important and memorable photos that can not be replaced. I have cleaned my phone, purchased more storage, reset my phone, and nothing has changed. It seems to me that every new update becomes more of a headache. PLEASE DO BETTER! THIS IS SO FRUSTRATING!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Please check your internet connection by doing a Google search for 'internet speed test' as connection may be poor. These tips may help with finding your missing files: goo.gle/3fdh04f. Also, You can also send it here: Google Drive app > Menu > Help & Feedback. Hope this helps.

scraped_reviews.content: This has been a nightmare!! I'm a musician in the St. Louis & Chicago area and perform solo acoustic gigs in between Band performance. I have many backing tracks that are very time consuming and tedious to create sometimes ( I put tons of detail into them ) and every time I turn around there are more Files that " won't play " & the kicker is that it happens when I'm not even in here. Last time was 2 days ago and I had to delete 4 of them, come back this morning and 6 more ðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘Ž
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Louie. Could you try to access Google Drive in an incognito mode or a different browser? If it doesn't work, you may try using a different network. For more details, you can check on this guide: https://goo.gle/2PZZBil. Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Seems like it's been a long time since I've been able to upload files to Drive from my phone. Using WiFi, Cellular, charging, makes no difference. It will just sit on preparing upload and never move. I have let it sit for hours without change. Not sure when the issue strayed but it's been this way for a few updates. Pretty annoying to have to move files from phone to PC, upload to drive from PC, and then continue what i was working on...maybe the devs will fix it one day. :shrug:
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Geramy. Let's try resetting the app data. More info here (see "Clear the app's cache" section): https://goo.gl/gX7ctA. Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Ever since last year I've encountered a bug where whenever I make a file available offline, it'll tell me that it's not available. If I make more than, lets say 100, files available offline, the next day I'll receive a notification for "making 800 files available offline" it's not always 800, it's reached over 1K, but it's so damn annoying as it doesnt even make them offline, it just resets it and so I can't see it. This also happens with several other phones, including my old one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Exreye. Could you try uninstalling and then reinstalling the Drive app itself? If this doesn't help, please visit our Community Forum for any additional assistance: https://goo.gl/DvMg7m.

scraped_reviews.content: You can't find your files on the phone app nor computer You want people to pay for storage? I have almost no access to my files. Poor app design. Inefficient!I Just can't really rely on this app. Needs lots of improvement. It doesn't work. I will never consider paying for storage until I'm able to find my files easily. It has been some years from this review and it's still the same! it should be easy to access, no manual should be needed. your file to review can't be opened.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Klau. Check out this handy guide for tips to advance search for the files (See 'More on how to find the files' section): goo.gle/3fdh04f. Keep us posted how it goes.

scraped_reviews.content: constantly drops uploads from gallery. sometimes one file makes it, sometimes half of them, sometimes none. completely unreliable, and I'm looking for a superior solution. shouldn't be hard to find. and my internet connection is fine, so don't bother. it's the app. edit: I have cleared the cache, I've cleared the data I've uninstalled/reinstalled the app. just selected 37 photos to upload, and 25 of them made it, so now I have to go figure out which ones because the app can't even find dupes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, William. Let's try resetting the app data. More info here (see "Clear the app's cache" section): https://goo.gl/gX7ctA Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Suddenly cannot open .flac files in any capacity. I've accessed the same files many times before, but now when I select "Open with" it does not offer any available media players, and instead launches to browser and returns an error. The same files can be opened no problem from my computer. Really annoyed to be paying for inadequately accessible storage. And yes, I have already cleared the cache. Please fix.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Stephanie. Could you try uninstalling and then reinstalling the Drive app itself? Follow the steps here: https://goo.gle/2SoitJl. If this doesn't help, please visit our Community Forum for any additional assistance: https://goo.gl/DvMg7m.

scraped_reviews.content: it can't do the simplest of tasks, uploading files. there's not even another point to this without the files. i have cleared the cache, cleared the data, un-installed and re-installed, tried on Wi-Fi, tried without Wi-Fi. you name it. nothing is fixing this issue that tons of others have been experiencing for quite a long time based on a quick internet search. zero stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Let's connect you with our Support Team for help. Follow the link to get some help: https://goo.gl/LcAuFy. Keep us posted!

scraped_reviews.content: This was an amazing and usefull app, but ya'll changed the organization system. Now instead of files looking organized side by side, they expand to fill the whole screen. For some reason, this only happens on the 'My Drive' tab, but it is still just as annoying. You can no longer comfortably scroll through pictures and files; both on mobile and on a desktop.

I'm afraid to leave a review for fear I might jinx myself. I find it to be a very useful app. I have created several folders and it's easy to upload from all my devices (Android, Desktop computer, laptop, iPad). I love how it syncs accross all my devices that have the app installed. The only issue I've had lately is it took about 40 minutes and a lot of refreshing to have access to a file I had uploaded on another device. Decent amount of cloud storage for free. ðŸ‘ðŸ¼

The app is great, super convenient just like the online version. But, trying to upload multiple and/or large media files is dreadful! Most times I have to attempt to upload them at least 3 times, 2 different ways to get the files to upload. It will literally show that it is uploading for several hours, but the files will never completely upload... unless I start over again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Jasmine. If you're syncing large numbers of files at the same time, please try doing them separately. Hope this helps.

scraped_reviews.content: The phone app doesn't sync well with computers anymore. The desktop version doesn't have a "Retry All" button on the errors list, so if you lose internet for a split second, to get your files to upload off the computer, you have to click every file and then retry. This is thousands of mouse clicks just to get your files into the cloud, then the files don't even stay in the folders you put them in. You can delete the file, then it will show up an hour later like nothing happened.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Bandon. Thanks for the feedback. You can report feedback at Drive > Help (question-mark icon) > Send feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: No longer allows uploading of batch photos from your phone. In the past, you could select lots of photos and SEND TO Drive. It "preparing" them and then there was a notification status showing the photos uploading.   This no longer works.   It never leaves the preparing function. You can manually go into the app and refresh to start the transfer, but it is woefully slow on wifi. It stops, starts, all seemingly at random. It "works" over the cellular connection better, but still stalls.   I just don't understand how something that was rock solid for years suddenly broke.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Patrick! We've found the issue (i.e. whether to upload over Wifi or mobile data). There's 2 workarounds until we fix this: (1) Connect to WiFi! (2) Disable the setting "Transfer Files only over WiFi" (mind you, this might incur data costs depending on your plan).

scraped_reviews.content: Love being able to create files within files within files and to customize the colors of the files for ease of organization. However, 2 BIG problems that have been happening over the past year, at the least. First, the app keeps freezing after using it for even 15-20min and freezes more frequently the longer I am using the app. Second, I am unable to transfer some pictures into the sub files. This seems to be a more recent problem. Annoying and inconvenient.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Starr. Could you try uninstalling and then reinstalling Drive app itself? Follow the steps here: https://goo.gle/2SoitJl. If this doesn't help, please visit our Community Forum for any additional assistance: https://goo.gl/DvMg7m.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app for managing, uploading, and downloading remote files. Great alternative to the Cloud, DropBox, etc. The premium prices and added storage are very reasonable. It would be nice if I could designate certain downloads to be stored directly to the Drive. As it is, I have to first download the file, THEN upload it to Drive, and THEN download it again from there when I'm ready to access it. It's like I have to download the same thing 3 times if I just want to have it for later.

The recent redesign has made it impossible to use the app. I have a set of files I keep in a specific folder and need access to regularly. With the redesign, now I see "recent" documents first, which would be fine for one person, but I have about 100 colleagues that regularly share documents with everyone and they often show up in the "recent" meaning it's much more difficult for me to find my documents. Just give me a way to see my drive normally as the default!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kyle. Thanks for the review. Could you please submit that as feedback in the Google Drive app? Menu - Help & feedback - Send feedback. This is the best way to get this feedback to our Drive engineers. Thanks again!ï»¿

scraped_reviews.content: It's good. It does what it's suppose to. 99% of the time. But lacks a lot of quality of life features. It has a upload bar, but doesn't tell you what's being uploaded at the moment. Just all files. It will desync, but doesn't tell you at what file. It doesn't question if you have uploaded the same file multiple times via file name. Google drive as a whole, needs to add a tag system for easy discovery.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Thanks for the suggestion, you can also send it here: Google Drive app > Menu > Help & feedback > Send feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: I love Google Drive. It's really well made, and very useful. The Mobile version is lacking, however. I'm on Android, and I never successfully upload big files. Google drive just says "uploading", spinning a wheel with no progress bar. I typically resort to sending via WhatsApp (my Wi-Fi is not the problem).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Logan. Let's try resetting the app data. More info here (see "Clear the app's cache" section): https://goo.gl/gX7ctA Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: I shouldn't have updated drive. It's small nitpicks because I love this app, but transparent images now have the white/grey checkerboard that I don't want to see. Also I'm pretty sure the thumbnails are much shorter than usual. There could be some trimming to make more of the image come through. Was hoping that updating would fix an issue with a gif not loading on mobile, but some gifs just don't work on mobile.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Kevin. Please submit feedback, you can also send it here: Google Drive app > Menu > Help & feedback > Send feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Online usage is pretty seamless, but all kinds of issues while traveling. App will not upload even tho connected to wifi/mobile from Bltimore airport (I verified connectivity through multiple other apps). From the air, cannot access PDF files previosly marked as Available Offline because the app requires a connection. No way to seelct a different app afaict. What happened to you Google...?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Brian. Let's try resetting the app data. More info here (see "Clear the app's cache" section): https://goo.gl/gX7ctA Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Its ok, but not amazing - dont ditch your hard drive for this. The one thing I hate about this subscription, is the fact that it takes over most of the apps and my Gmail account. I have a 200gb storage, which is used up, but I refuse to upgrade to 2TB as its too much. Google needs to have a rethink on delivering a more cost effective stragedy and not present bullying tactics, which is what it feels like here. I will consider unsubscribing altogether by June when my annual fee is due up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Karl. Thanks for the feedback! You can also send it here: Google Drive app > Menu > Help & Feedback. Appreciate it.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been user of Google Drive for more than 8 years and the recent changes have introduced such a buggy interface I'm forced to consider other cloud storage services. Whenever I try to upload something I get a notification that upload is successful but in app file continuous to be depicted as under process of upload for days and stays inaccessible. The worse part is that this issue has lingered for a month and despite so many similar reviews pointing same, no fix has been introduced.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Siddharth. Could you try uninstalling and then reinstalling the Drive app itself? If this doesn't help, please visit our Community Forum for any additional assistance: https://goo.gl/DvMg7m.

scraped_reviews.content: Review update: Wish I could take away the one star I gave it. It's still an absolutely worthless app. Thank you for your response, Google. Yes, I have tried various networks, and uploads still hang. I wish I could send you a screenshot. This is the most frustrating 1st party app on an android phone I've used in years. What a disappointment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Joshua. Let's try resetting the app data. More info here (see "Clear the app's cache" section): https://goo.gl/gX7ctA Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: unable to download my files to my android phone. I was able to 1 day, next day I cant. It's been like this for a week. I checked my connection, my phone has plenty of storage left, I uninstalled and reinstalled, cleared cache and nothing worked. I pay for extra storage on one of my accounts and I actively rely on Drive to work so I can use my marketing assets. What is the fix?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Jacob. Let's connect you with our Support Team for help. Follow the link to get some help: https://goo.gl/LcAuFy. Keep us posted!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using GDrive for quite some time and it really is a great app. However, I've been facing some sort of bug or issue. I'm a student, and whenever someone sends me a link to upload my outputs, it will only lead me to a browser version and I can't really upload my file. I have the app, tried re-installingâ€”still no change. It has been difficult for me, especially since my laptop isn't working at the moment. I hope this issue will be resolved soon as it does affect student mobile users. ðŸ™‚
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lia. Have you tried to upload the file from Google Drive using a different network? Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Weird glitch - when I upload new files and try to open them, I get the "Input/output error. Storage may be full." error message but it's definitely not full. The only way to resolve the issue is to reinstall the app again everytime. Very frustrating. EDIT - reply to developer: No, you should fix the app. This only started happening after your last update. Figure it out ffs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gregarious. Could you try uninstalling and then reinstalling the Drive app itself? If this doesn't help, please visit our Community Forum for any additional assistance: https://goo.gle/3XIOpsV.

scraped_reviews.content: Uploading many files at once is a big problem. The app should upload files one by one, not all together. I tried to upload 30 files. They all got to 10% progress, then a brief signal loss made the entire upload fail and restart from zero. All progress was lost. If they uploaded one by one, some files would have already finished. This system makes big uploads completely unreliable and it needs to be fixed. It's a huge waste of data and time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Petr. Thanks for your review! In order to help you, could you kindly elaborate on your feedback? If problems persist, you can also visit our Help Center (https://goo.gle/3GFExFq) or visit our Community Forum (https://goo.gle/3GvPskW). We hope we helped.

scraped_reviews.content: SHARING MALICIOUS FILES - I've been receiving shared files constantly for the past week from random users I don't know. These are obviously malicious, because they're .html files with names like "low disk space" or "server error". I haven't opened any of these files, but other users won't be so fortunate. Google cannot detect and block them automatically. I've been reporting the files and blocking the users, but it's getting tedious now as I'm getting them daily.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Please report the files to remove them and help train our systems (https://goo.gle/2SwoC6B). We are constantly working to make our detection better and give users more options for managing the spam that sneaks through.

scraped_reviews.content: Doesn't download anything to my phone. But duly stores everything and says storage is full. Download button is not working. Just when I need my files. Horrible. update - It worked when I tried today. I had cleared the cache yesterday as well, it didn't work. But when I did today it started working. Thanks for fixing it within a day. But I did have to use a cable yesterday. I'm changing my rating to 4 now that it's fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Manish. Let's try resetting the app data. More info here (see "Clear the app's cache" section): https://goo.gle/4leWgsg. Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Since the most recent update (31st October) Google Drive app has been consistently displaying a "waiting for WiFi connection " whenever uploading or downloading a file, even though there is a verified working WiFi connection. Clearing cache or reinstalling does nothing. Had to go back to an older version to sort it out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Terry. Please visit the Help Center (goo.gle/3Wq58E) or the Community Forum for any additional assistance (goo.gle/DvMg7m). Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Backing up my phone data & WhatsApp chats is the main reason I use Google Drive. But like many others have noticed, the "Backups" option in the hamburger menu has disappeared. It's a convenient way to view my phone & WhatsApp backups, showing date & time of latest backup. I managed to temporarily get it back by clearing cache & data, but it disappeared again the next day. Can you fix this in the next update? I hope it's just a bug, & not something that you are going to permanently remove!

Google Drive is an excellent cloud storage service. Itâ€™s very reliable, fast, and easy to use for storing and sharing files. I can access my documents, photos, and videos anytime from any device, which is super convenient. The file syncing is smooth, and the interface is clean and simple. Highly recommended for both personal and professional use!

While it's useful for keeping files and organization of files, the scanning option to make PDFs needs work. here recently, just about every time I've tried to scan something to make a PDF it freezes after it has me give the file a name and do all that stuff. Unfortunately for me, I need this feature to work to be able to complete school assignments so I'm very affected by this issue, it is also just extremely frustrating to have to continuously scan a paper just for it not to save.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Evelyn. Let's try resetting the app data. More info here (see "Clear the app's cache" section): https://goo.gle/4leWgsg. Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Constant bugs that are always new and exciting and annoying as can be. Currently facing an issue where I can't download a file to my phone from Drive, either browser or app. Force stopped, cleared cache, cleared data, updated permissions, reinstalled, logged out and back in, tried different files, mobile data or wifi, absolutely nothing will fix this issue. And this is just the current flavor of the week. I'm sure next week uploads will fail, or sharing will break, etc. etc.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Erik. Let's connect you with our Support Team for help. Follow the link to get some help: https://goo.gle/3FVe8bC. Hope this helps.

scraped_reviews.content: This is the world's dumbest cloud storage. I can't download any files even when I am on WiFi (I also disabled Transfer files only over WiFi). It only displays "1 item will be downloaded" and nothing happens. Not even a progress bar in notifications. Unreliable and cannot be used for critical and important moments.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jay. Let's connect you with our Support Team for help. Follow the link to get some help: https://goo.gl/LcAuFy. Keep us posted!

scraped_reviews.content: They removed the "Send to Drive" option and now it can't upload more than 83 photos at a time. It just goes blank and then gives up and goes back to the source selection. It also can't pause uploads or check for duplicate files being uploaded.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tom. Let's try resetting the app data. More info here (see "Clear the app's cache" section): https://goo.gl/gX7ctA. Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: I thought updating it would fix things. It did but temporarily. I cannot upload again. I already cleared cache and data. Restarted my phone but I still cannot upload. Also, it kept waiting for WiFi to upload when I already turn it off in the settings to upload using mobile data.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Have you tried to upload the file to Google Drive using a different network? Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Told me I got 8GB of data on GDrive, yet it can only shows 4 measly files not even 100MB total. All just so they can shove their paid subscription to my face every chance they got. I tried the customer service and didn't get a response. If this wasn't so tied into my Gmail and Android ecosystem, i would have moved to others. Money be damned.

upload on Android is a nightmare when files are large because for some reason it copies the files as app data first and does the upload which causes the whole thing to take ages. also there is no sorting files based on size which is a feature softwares from 1990s had but this one doesn't. and yes Google I have tried using another network, so maybe you should work on issues instead of giving grandma level advice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ali. Is there something we could help you with to turn that frown upside down? Please visit the Help Center (https://goo.gl/3Wq58E) or the Community Forum (https://goo.gl/DvMg7m) for any additional assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: After new update,I can't able to open my any files even after trying to clear cache and unistallâ†’reinstall app. but when I uninstall updates then the file was opening (that is, in previous versions)... There might be some bugs in the new update, maybe. Please resolve this issue."
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Siddiqui. Thanks for the feedback! You can also send it here: Google Drive app > Menu > Help & Feedback. Appreciate it.

scraped_reviews.content: I love Google drive but the software on the app is probably some of the worst I've ever encountered. Constant bugs and glitches, unclear messaging, just ate 2gb of my internet data downloading a file that I tried to download yesterday. Having this standard of app from one of the richest software companies in the world is a joke.

I've been using this for some time now and it has been great, although I've encountered a problem that made this app unusable, which is that it won't work I try to switch accounts (when i try to click my profile picture and I get to the switch accounts interface, I can't press anything). This issue is present in almost all Google apps so please ðŸ¥º fix this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ivan. Let's try resetting the app data. More info here (see "Clear the app's cache" section): https://goo.gle/4leWgsg. Hope this helps!

title: OldRoll - Vintage Film Camera
description:
Hey guys, here we come!
The new realistic analog camera is online. The retro texture brings you back to the 80s. Have you ever imagined that all pictures can be as beautiful as movies? With this free pocket video / photo app, you can do it too. We reproduce the style of classic cameras and stunning vintage film.
 
#Awesome Analog Camera
â€¢ The Classic M camera is inspired by the Leica M6, which has classic nomo film tones. The magic of filmm is that it can restore light and shadow, time and temperature. This lens brings fine and mellow tones to your photos.
â€¢ The 503 CW is a classic camera. Its color saturation is real and natural, and the dark part description is great, especially under cloudy skies and low illumination.
â€¢ INS P polaroid filter is designed for you to date with your best friends. Take a polaroid zip photo for each other. The aesthetic and artistic tezza photo frames will never go out of style.
â€¢ TOY F is a disposable camera from David and Emma specially created for you. It has the texture of loopsie. Its warm  foodie color is suitable for shooting food. Itâ€™s not inferior to kamon. Take our pocket camera to get instants free prints!
â€¢ The color of ROL 3.5 lens is rich and classic. It uses Lomo retro and kuni vintage style filter with rni film presets, gets you back to the old paris.
â€¢ NK F has a Japanese fresh texture, its photo filter is very artistic, come and receive your gift camera :D
â€¢ The leather cavity camera embodies elegance and sophistication. 120 V brings you the charm of retro filto film.
â€¢ The romantic pink purple of PINK camera gives the picture of a moly fairyland feeling.
â€¢ CHEESE camera is perfect for gourmet food. Enjoy your meal!
â€¢ Inspired by kodak portra 400 filter. TOY K has a special retrica old grain filter.
â€¢ Try our print camera to get photobooth effect!
â€¢ Kira camera has wonderful sparkle glitter effect and shining stars.
â€¢ We also provide half-frame cameras, our fun fish eye camera and double-exposure feature, as well as random photo frames to let you feel the charm of retro cameras
 
#Outstanding features
â€¢ Itâ€™s not a photo editor or a video editor, you don't need to edit or retouch the photo. The most realistic film photography is instantly presented with a single click. Give you a real photo-taking experience by one step.
â€¢ Photos with square film frame and retro scratch effect are convenient to share to Instagram
â€¢ Post office function allows you to send photos straightly to recipientâ€™s home screen. Come and share every moment with your friends.
â€¢ Post your dazz cam footage or wonderful ins style photos with stunning film presets to social media platform such as Instagram, Facebook, Tik Tok and Youtube etc.
â€¢ Flash helps you create daze cam d3d blockbusters in low-light situations
â€¢ Custom fun date stamp watermark, you can also freely modify the timestamp on the photo, why not tell your friends that you have been to this place 20 years ago?
â€¢ Flip the lens to take a retro photo and experience the art of selfie!
â€¢ Most trendy effects: We provide light leaks of 1888 or 1998 style. You can enjoy the vhs and glitch effect with retro grain here, print some cinematic lomograph photos and get film3d photos to experience prequel and sequel feeling. 
â€¢ Retro texture rarevision different from digital cameras.
â€¢ The photo shooting timer allows you to free your hands to pose.
â€¢ Excellent photo mirror effect allow you to rotate and flip the photos and create a great mirror image.


We will also bring you camcorders of 8mm & 16mm & 35mm to let you enjoy video shooting soon or later, letâ€™s look forward to the video filters and effects for vcr and live 3d photos!
Come on! Become a super video star! This will be your most chic cam in your phone!

scraped_reviews.content: Exceptional! I love this app a lot! gives us access to many sort of "cameras" and filters. gives you that nostalgic, retro effects & you can even mess around with your own editing. the only problem i have is that sometimes if you're using the app after, maybe, 3-5 minutes of use, it'll start slowing down and lagging. so hopefully they fix this issue and make it smooth.

Very affordable and well worth every penny! I love the info sections for each camera, which are very informative and helpful! It's a really cool app!! My only issue is that when using one of the Polaroid cameras (INS G), there is literally no way to return to the main screen! So i have to uninstall and reinstall!

I love the filters. But it's so hard to use when you want to import pictures and apply filters to them. The preview screen doesn't preview filters so you can't compare different filters on the photo before saving it. You have to upload the photo, select camera, hit save and that's when you can finally see what the picture looks like with the filter on. Good contents, but bad userbility. Could you please improve the preview screen???? If that's fixed, its a really good app!!

So far really enjoying the experience. Would love a feature that allows you to favorite certain cameras or organize them yourself. It's a bit tedious and annoying having to scroll through all the cameras and find the right one. Gonna hold off on buying the lifetime membership until something like that is added. Overall though a lot of fun and a lot of cool camera effects!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for your suggestion. At present, there is a collection function in our app, but it is exclusive to our members. After becoming a member, you can manage your camera more conveniently through it. Welcome to try it!

scraped_reviews.content: Definitely what I've been looking for in a camera app. Coming from someone who loves Fuji Film and any disposable camera, this was so perfect. The light leaks could use some work and maybe a little more realism. They definitely should have a collage/ setup/ filter like they do in the instructional part with the film roll background for the pictures used as examples for each filter and other things during the tutorial. Overall, this is the app I've been looking for since PixArt. So it's good

Completely exceeded my expectations. Seriously, get this app. You will not regret it. The photos look like the authentic camera style pictures. I was surprised it captured it so well. I felt like I was looking at real photos from 90s/80s. Some camera filters are paid but others are free. But honestly it's worth paying for because the features are amazing. There are a few ads but I appreciate that they are not intrusive like most apps. Hands down 10/10.

I have used this app for years. Every trip, birthday or important moment. I probably edited hundreds of photos using it. Today I see that everything is different. It's no longer possible to bulk edit the pictures how I want and just save them. i see a new bulk option but it's random and if I want to save I need premium. I understand adding things to premium. But removing this feature is going backwards. I don't know if I will continue using this app unfortunately.

Great experience so far. But I have one problem, I can't remove the face filter. It just automatically apply/appear on my portrait photos and I can't remove it. I don't know why, maybe it's because of their new update. I hope it gets removed and go back to the manual set-up just like before.

Quite a well made app! It has all sorts of old cameras that are very interactive and, high quality, I mean thats basically a summery of the app. The only thing that's keeping it away from a 5 star is that I filing it a liiiittle ridiculous that you need to pay for a couple of the cameras. Other than that, great app! highly recommended

I really liked using OldRoll to edit my photos and for its unique design, but the latest update removed the ability to apply my favorite camera style and image ratio to a bulk selection of photos from my library. It was my most common use for the app, and now I can't do it. :(
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello, the new version includes several useful new features:

â‘¡ More adjustment parameters & filter effects

scraped_reviews.content: love it, so much fun taking photos with different cameras. i have taken more pics in a couple of hours, than in the entire year of using this phone. well worth the money, also the interfaces of the cameras look amazing.great job by the programmer(s). its been a year and i still love it!

Good but IOS seems better :( iOS has simple mode which hides the retro controls and body shells from the cameras being emulated. Makes taking photos more intuitive and faster. I appreciate being able to see the older models but I don't wanna be forced to. Is simple mode planned for android at all???
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, the simple mode for Android is under development, so stay tuned.

scraped_reviews.content: @accordion I like the app very much but can you pleaseeeeeeee add a profile account where we save our login through Gmail or something so that when I change my handset I can still get all photos and videos as it is in the app please please please. no other complain but just it it's a 10/10 app but it has just this problem

I've been using it for a few minutes, but it was enough to see so much love and attention to detail was put into the app and for that alone I give it 5 stars. Some may find the different UI for each camera distracting, but I find it endearing.

It edits the photos I upload with a canvas every time. I can't download them as just photos. And it also has too many ads. It takes back every edit I do and makes me start from the beginning every time. I don't recommend.
