love this app honestly even though I cannot afford all the cameras I love the ones I'm limited to and happy to have the options to capture art and keep them in my little digital album.

I love the app! been using it for years. However, there's no account or login so when I lost my phone all my photos and paid cameras were lost. It makes me not to want to pay for anything because it will only get lost if you lose your phone

it's great i guess but there's a lot of you need to pay if you want the camera and i'm broke and there's little camera rolls the other ones you need to pay it so i think you should put some more free camera rolls okay thank you very much

Old Roll is a great app! I love its vintage camera style and the filters look so aesthetic. The photos come out like film, which makes them unique and nostalgic. Perfect for people who love retro vibes! ðŸ“¸âœ¨
Good cam but it's shutter is too slow also it's almost impossible to take a shot when you try to focus by tapping on an object.
The camera's are really gorgeous.......but you have to buy those camera's which are very dreamy,Pinteresty. Overall this is a good one ðŸ‘.
All the memorable features of this app were turned into premium in the last update. I've been using this app for almost a year now so it's very disappointing.

gave it 5 stars in 2023 and it has been a go to for any basic photo edits to add some texture and different taste ALL up until this recent update a couple days ago and now the entire functionality and User interface experience is trash. it is SO bad now that it's not even worth it to use and it's easier to replace for a different vintage film edit app. From 5 starts to 1 --> To Dev. No update matters if they make you NOT want to use the app

scraped_reviews.content: used to absolutely love this app but the new update has made editing photos from the phone gallery so much longer. I used to enjoy this app specifically for the ease of applying a vintage cam filter to batches of photos but now it's one by one

scraped_reviews.content: an great app made for iOS only the iOS app has much better features and usability. it's disappointing because I want to really like this app but coming from iPhone to android, there is no comparison.

scraped_reviews.content: honestly I had no hope with this app but it's actually good!! Some cameras aren't free but the "default" one is extra good: it gives that vintage orangish vibe I was going for If you want to do edits and extra modifications it is not for you, but if you want to add a cool vintage look to some of your pictures, go for it ;)

Hello developers of oldroll, I know this is probably a lot to ask... I have been using this app for a few months now and really enjoying the different effects im getting from the different cameras in this app. I have one issue that has to do with the model of phone I am using. I use the Xiaomi 15 Ultra with the Photography kit extension. I am not able to use my camera grip extension to control the app and would love to have it work. If you could, please ðŸ™ðŸ½ then it would be 10/10. Thank you

OldRoll! one of the best cameras i've ever used. it's better than my own camera.it improved my photography and editing sense. i really love it. it shows feeling on each and every photo! really useful if you wanna do photography but you're not financially able to buy a camera. you have multiple camera options and it's free.(some are paid)

i just download it and it is fantastic. the monthly pack is only 260. I installed this pack and I am enjoying it. I am download this app in my tab . my tab camera was not okay but when I installed this app my tab convert to a digital camera ðŸ“¸ðŸ¤³.I remmomend this app . try it . and also sorry for my English

â£ï¸this app is very goodðŸ¤ŒðŸ», you should definitely download it.â¤ï¸ You take very good photos, ðŸŽ¥this app is very niceðŸ©·. This is very very good. I think you should definitely download it.ðŸ¤ŒðŸ»â¤ï¸
It's not recognizing my payment after 6 months. I sent an email, I hope you can help!
This is the ABSOLUTE BEST camera app for that 2000's Regina George vibe type for pics. Tho I feel like I shouldn't have to pay like 5$ for a few stencils, still recommend it!

It was a fun experience, worth the lifetime subscription. I downloaded multiple vintage camera apps and none are as good as this, I wanted a camera that feels like the one in those Backroom videos/games, I hope you guys can add a mechanical sound when zooming in and out of the cameras. Anyway good app all in all!

Using this app feels like opening a box of old memories. The retro filters make every click look like it was taken years ago, with warm tones and soft textures. Itâ€™s like holding a camp photo from the past â€” cozy, grainy, and full of stories. Every picture feels more personal and nostalgic, as if itâ€™s part of a vintage album. I love how it turns everyday moments into timeless keepsakes.

It would get a 4/5 but I'm not paying for all the premium presets. the free ones are great, if only the premium presets were bundled together in one spot because going down the line trying to figure out which is free is annoying.

If you are into old school photography before the clinical CMOS sensor came about, this is the app to have, it's brilliant. The option of different types of cameras for stills and video are amazing. You will not be disappointed

i dont usually rate apps, but this one is really good. it's super worth the lifetime purchase, and the latest update is really good. The filters are really nice and the option to write in the "back" of the photo is really charming to me. i love how the latest update has a random developing option, makes every photo unpredictable and unique.

it's a great app and I love one of their certain cameras which is the DCR one and the photos are really good too. But recently I have noticed that they have edited that camera's setting, like the brightness looks terrible and the exposure, so and so. I request the Oldroll team to fix this. The previous settings were very good.

I just downloaded it , it's great app,but there's only few camera effect for free, and so even if we take a photo with it in right top there is showing "2025 happy new year"..and there is no option to remove it ,thus destroy the whole photo hope the developers remove that writing from that part

I reckon the free version should have more than just the two different cameras avaliable, or at least show what's premium. it does save your images automatically without downloading them onto your phone which is a big plus

Wonderful and fun. Lots of variations and filters. Also the sound effects are so iconic and nostalgic. I wonder if there can be a manual tightening option for the old isntsnt cameras that needed to be manually rolled to the next film slot? That'd be fun
legit the coolest photo app ive seen for unique style filters and classic style looks, the UI is also unique and really fun, i recommend giving it a shot

honestly it just feels like a glorified filer app. The emulation looks nothing like the cameras it's supposed to emulate, and they're all paid and pretty expensive on top of that. I wish it was better, since the UI is pretty cool.
I love this app. It's so good and also the camera quality and features are so Good.

HELP! PLEASE! i bought the lifetime purchase in 2022 but it stopped allowing me to access the new cameras for some reason. when i followed the instructions (close app, open google play under the acct i bought it on, reopen app. if that fails, uninstall and reinstall the app) assuming my photos would be saved to my account, i lost YEARS worth of sentimental photos. hundreds if not thousands. i emailed the feedback service over a month ago but no reply. i love this app so much, please help :(

I don't write reviews but I just had to on this app although you can only use 2 cameras the first one is sooo good like especially with my phone the photos are so bad quality but when using this app omgg they come out so goodd and so clear it's magic even sunset photos or photos at night OMGG it's so clear it bringggss out such vibrant and bright colours the lighting plus the filter over them is so gooddd I love this app sm and I recommend it for everyone ESPECIALLY ANDROID USERSS !!
Love the app! It has a lot of different cameras to take pictures with or upload pictures from your gallery to edit as if you were using those cameras. Also, they add new cameras often to try!

Amazing! Would recommend it to EVERYONE LOOKING FOR A VINTAGE WASH TO THEIR PHOTOS. Not all the cameras are free to use! So what? But please make some more free for better reviews. The rest are amazing, you don't need to do long editing to achieve what you want, the cameras are all set to go! However there are still some bugs like getting a wide or too narrow picture when clicking horizontally
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please send the device model, system version number, and application version number at the bottom of the settings page to our email feedbackservice@163.com, and attach the operation recording screen, our staff will solve it for you as soon as possible, thank you Love and support for OldRoll~

title: Marriott Bonvoy: Book Hotels
description:
Book directly with Marriott Bonvoy to enjoy exclusive offers, take the stress out of travel planning, and find the best hotel deals. 

Search hotels, resorts, and luxury destinations across 9,000+ hotels, 130+ countries, and over 35 brands. Whether you are on a business trip or family vacation, join for free and earn rewards when booking with Marriott Bonvoy. 

(1) BOOK YOUR HOTEL
SEARCH HOTELS, BOOK STAYS, AND EARN REWARDS: 
â€¢	Earn points for your stays booked directly with Marriott.
â€¢	Not sure where to go? Let our â€˜Exploreâ€™ and â€˜Road Tripâ€™ feature inspire your journey.
â€¢	Choose from our 35+ brands to fit your personal style of travel.

BEST RATE GUARANTEE: 
â€¢	Some things in life arenâ€™t guaranteed â€” but your hotel rate can be.
â€¢	Find a better rate? We'll match it + 25% off or 5,000 points. Limitations and exclusions apply.

FLEXIBLE CANCELLATIONS: 
â€¢	Need a last-minute hotel change? We offer flexible cancellation options to reassure you when booking your next stay with us. Use the app to adjust travel plans with ease.


(2) BEFORE YOUR STAY
COMPLETE CONTACTLESS CHECK-IN TO YOUR HOTEL ROOM: 
â€¢	Check-in to your hotel from anywhere with our Mobile Check-In feature. 
â€¢	Let us know when you are scheduled to arrive, and youâ€™ll get a notification when your hotel room is ready.


EASY ACCESS VIA MOBILE HOTEL KEY: 
â€¢	Never worry about losing your key card again. Use your mobile device to open your hotel room and easily access hotel amenities like the parking garage, fitness center, lounge, and pool. 
â€¢	With Mobile Key, you can get to your room faster. Once opted in, weâ€™ll send you a notification to your iPhone, Android, or Apple Watch when your room is ready.


(3) DURING YOUR STAY 
ORDER FOOD AND DRINKS AHEAD OF TIME: 
â€¢	Out exploring? Browse and order food and drinks from your hotelâ€™s menu, and it will be ready when you return. Available at participating properties.

CONVENIENTLY CHAT WITH YOUR PROPERTY: 
â€¢	Mobile Chat lets you talk directly to your hotel before, during, and after your stay.
â€¢	For the best travel experience, ask the front desk for local recommendations, request amenities, and more - all while on-the-go.
â€¢	Need something? Mobile Request allows you to customize your stay and even ask for something you forgot -like a comb or toothpaste.
â€¢	Free Wi-Fi offered at most hotels for Marriott Bonvoy members

(4) AFTER YOUR STAY
ENJOY EXCLUSIVE MARRIOTT BONVOY HOTEL OFFERS:
â€¢	Check your point balance and view your stay history and hotel bill.
â€¢	Unlock travel rewards and redeem your points on hotels, experiences, restaurants, rideshares, and more. Take advantage of our numerous partnerships! 

Not a Marriott Bonvoy member? Join for free on the app to access exclusive member rates at over 30 hotel brands around the world.
MARRIOTT BONVOY HOTEL BRANDS:
Use the Marriott Bonvoy app to book hotel stays with any of our 30+ brands, including AC Hotels by MarriottÂ®, AloftÂ® Hotels, Autograph CollectionÂ® Hotels, BulgariÂ®, City Express, CourtyardÂ®, Delta HotelsÂ®, Design Hotelsâ„¢, EDITIONÂ®, ElementÂ®, Fairfield Inn & SuitesÂ®, Four PointsÂ® by Sheraton, Gaylord HotelsÂ®, JW MarriottÂ®, LeMÃ©ridienÂ®, MoxyÂ® Hotels, Marriott Executive ApartmentsÂ®, Apartments by Marriott Bonvoy Â® , Marriott HotelsÂ®, Marriott Vacation ClubÂ®, Protea HotelsÂ®, RenaissanceÂ® Hotels, Residence InnÂ®, SheratonÂ®, SpringHill SuitesÂ®, St. RegisÂ®, The Luxury CollectionÂ®, The Ritz-CarltonÂ®, TownePlace SuitesÂ®, MGM Collection Â®, StudioResÂ®, Homes & Villas by Marriott Bonvoy Â® , Sonder by Marriott Bonvoy Â® , Tribute PortfolioÂ®, WÂ® Hotels and WestinÂ® Hotels & Resorts.

scraped_reviews.content: Can't use the app. Says my device is rooted when it's not. Automatically shuts down the app. No one is going to factory reset their device to hope that the app might work again. Edit: after uninstalling then reinstalling a couple more times, it now works. It works fine like it did for the first 10 minutes I had the app upon initial download. Edit2: after coming back to it after some time it's doing the same thing. Edit: 2 years later still doing it. Fail.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brandon, thank you for your review. To protect our Bonvoy Members, the app closes automatically when the device is either rooted or has rooting software such as Magisk installed. Do you have rooting software on your phone?

scraped_reviews.content: When the app works, it's great. However, since the last update, it crashes immediately with an alert about a bug. This was especially frustrating while traveling overseas without a computer, as I relied on my Android devices to book and contact hotels. The app's constant crashing made it nearly impossible to use. My phone is even overheating now as I write this, so Iâ€™m uninstalling the app.

The app is horrible when it comes to customer service, or it might be Marriott in general. In a digital age, they do not publish email addresses or have a chat option to reach a hotel. Instead, they publish in international numbers, which doesn't make any sense for foreign guests. Chat is also only available if you have an active booking, which, if you have issues with crediting, you're SOL.

Frequent crashes, trouble loading, and hard to use. Trying to use your mobile key to get into the room? Just take the plastic key out of your wallet..... saves you about 30 minutes of loading time. Want to book a room? Allow 3 to 5 business days for a list of hotels to load. Checking in or out? Definitely start doing that about 2 weeks before you even arrive. This app is SO BAD. It used to work GREAT and be an amazing app. But now, it's pure trash.

If you are using a corporate code then you still have to check in at the front desk, you can't get a mobile key before. Messages to the hotel went unanswered, such as for an extra blanket. The FAQs on the website about the issues were useless. I called reservations since that was the only number I could find listed. They said the technical support line was eliminated, and even he could not reach any technical staff within Marriott.

For my last two stats, it failed to check me in and failed to activate cloud key. It completely lost track of the reservation once the stay started, even though the trip was still viewable on the web site. It's full of stupid bugs. For example, there's a feature that is supposed to allow you to look up and add current and past trips... But when you try to enter the check-in date, the app will not let you pick a date in the past. They should really spend some money on QA people.

This app is so frustrating. It's really slow to load. I had booked a few stays and then canceled some when I found a better rate. The app showed I only had 1 stay but turns out the ones I canceled on the app didn't cancel and I was charged for a no show. I couldn't check under canceled list on the app because when you click on that tab it just turns and won't open up I'm still trying to fight the charge because it was not my fault. Fix the app!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Had to uninstall and reinstall to stop it from freezing (had to do this last year too). Otherwise it works well. Easy to navigate and control bookings. The mobile key feature (when it works) is hidden behind too many menus and hit or miss if it will open the door. Look to Hilton for a better style of this. Free stay certificates can't be done through the app. It'll just use your points instead. Having an option during the booking to use the certificate would be splendid.

It's great when it works. Half the time results won't load; the screen will just sit on "retrieving results" for as long as you feel like staring at it. Depending on a mobile key? Good luck. Probably want to get a physical key too, just in case. There's a way to save your search preferences so you don't have to edit how many travelers and such every time. It never saves my preferences. I still have to change them every single time. But...yeah. When everything decides to work it's a nice app

Super buggy and undependable. There have been times where my reservations didn't appear, so I wasn't able to check in or even get the addresses, which is really the bare minimum I ask for from an app. There is an issue tracking lifetime nights. Sometimes I'll try to check in online only to be met with a failure message, but trying again immediately works. On the flip side, when it works, it's a five star app. Update: on the latest version of the app, it crashes constantly when scrolling. 0/5.

In the past it would push notifications. This no longer happens, you need to open the app to receive updates. Update: Now I am unable to make reservations with the app, I can find a hotel, check rates but when I try to finalize the reservation, I receive an error message, stating that they are working on it. I have called and emailed, no resolution or fix suggestion.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback!  Yes, The button on the bottom right is your main navigation, you can either tap to get to the information you are looking for, or you can press and hold to get to a menu of available options.

scraped_reviews.content: If you're booking a single room the app is easy. If you want to book more than one room with different nuber of guests it's not so easy. I did not find a way to easily compare different hotels in the same area. This almost drove me to Hilton Honors instead. When looking for a hotel I dont need the picture. It takes up too much room. I need the location and rate. Maybe a clickable map with rate would have been easier. Once i selected the room everything was very easy.

Marriott has done a great job with this app. I love that I can easily find a hotel and book it in 2 clicks once my account is setup! I can't imagine an easier booking experience. Also, having really easy access to my point balance, nights stayed, etc is very nice. My only wish is that certain pieces of info were highlighted and/or easier to find for each hotel. Parking cost is a big one. During COVID, breakfast options and pool closures is another one.

Update for Android 10: They removed the ability to hold-press to perform actions most likely because 10 gives the ability to "pause app" and this would stop the background tracking. It asks for too many permissions. runs in the background and drains battery and uses background data to collect information from your device such as location and sends it to Marriott. I usually install, check-in to hotel, the uninstall it to save battery and maintain privacy. Really useless except for early check-in

Member number format fills in with spaces between the numbers in such a format that I can't log in, much less use the app productively. S9. UPDATE: Despite using fingerprint authentication, I am prompted for a password every single time. Upon entering said password, the app tells me it is incorrect. I just got off the phone with customer support, who told me "the app is having issues" and I should "try using the website instead." Never an issue with SPG... Yet another reason to switch to Hilton!

Luckily, have not experienced the troubles and frustration as other users. I read on someone's review that they weren't able to search for hotels outside of their current location? I don't know what they did there, but you most certainly can look up hotels from ANY location. Simple & straightforward app. You earn points for every booking. You can check in/out from the app (turn on notification setting in app) Make sure you check the promotions page for any deals before booking.

The app is really slow to load and is constantly giving errors. I also don't see my upcoming reservation's. I tried to add them by confirmation number; but it says it can't because my name doesn't match...? My profile name and reservation are the same and I actually booked the reservation through my Marriott account on the website. No idea why it is not showing up. Seems easier to just use your email confirmation.

THE WORST!! Every time i try to log in either on the website or Bonvoy app, it takes me forever because my member number and password are never recognized. I change it ...go through all the frustrating steps over and over, finally get in and then am logged out again when trying to make reservations. This has been going on for 2 years. It's enough frustration to lead me purposely not to stay in Marriot hotels of any kind.

The app works fine for searching hotels and making reservations. However if you are a rewards member and need to do any other thing like reporting missing stays, it is a big fail. I travel a lot and may stay at multiple hotels in different cities during a month's time and almost inevitably I will have a missing stay. The app is useless when trying to fill out the missing stay form and I end up having to call guest services which has me on hold for a while.

I'm sitting here in the hotel, checked in, and the Bonvoy app still says "Hello. We're looking forward to your arrival." Also, the front desk has pushed the mobile key to my app 3 times, i clicked the button to accept, and the mobile key still doesn't show up in the app. I don't find any way within the app to send feedback or request support, and the front desk people can't fix it, so it's a pretty broken experience.

The data feed is so unreliable. I frequently get "No Results Found" then reload and get something. Sometimes my account info populates, sometimes it doesnt. Sometimes I get a list of booking options, sometimes I dont. It feels 50/50 that I will get to see what I expected. On the plus side the UI is polished and looks impressive, but it is meaningless in moments with no data filling in. Bummer, especially for a program that is pretty friendly to the traveler earning Elite status.

Edit: Phone key hasn't reliably worked at multiple locations on multiple phones. The new app looks flashy but is terrible to actually use. Super slow and i mean really really slow to open. With a GS8 it's the only app i have that isn't basicly instantaneous to open and use...it takes almost 10 seconds. Also, it uses a massive amount of memory for what it does. Obviously really poor developers. As a gold member it's really disappointing.

When it works, it's good, albeit slow at times. The issue is that it often believes that my phone is rooted (it's not) and won't stay open. This issue has been an intermittent year long issue. The interwebs says I'm not the only person with this issue. It takes an update, an uninstall, and reinstallation to get it to work again. Not worth the trouble.

Slow. This app was good and 2orked well for years until the most recent update on 8/10/23. Now, I can't even search for hotels. I've waited up to 5 minutes for a list or the map to populate, and nothing happened. It sure would be nice to book hotels through marriot but since the app isn't working I've been forced to look elsewhere. Please fix!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kyle, thank you for your review. We are sorry you experienced issues! We implemented a fix with version 10.22.1. If the issue persists, please force close the app by going to: Settings > Apps. Select the Bonvoy app from recently opened apps, or tap "See all" and select the app. In the Bonvoy App info menu, tap "Force stop." Then reopen the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Had errors the last three status I tried to use it. Can't check in, can't use mobile key. Different errors each time too. One time the app crashed every time i tried to check in, next time the mobile key just said it "will be ready soon" for the entire duration of my stay, and now I'm trying to check in and it says I need to give them at the 30 minutes notice, even though I'm entering my arrival time as 1.5 hours from now. Basically a completely useless app.

This app is terrible! How do you find your reservations? it should be on the first page! instead...ads for the credit card, other resorts, etc. The old app was way better - I travel a bit - about 40 nights so far this year. to date, split between groups. In the past I have tried to be loyal to Marriott, but this is so hard to use and the Hyatt app is easier and clearly shows my reservations.

It is cumbersome to use. In 10 minutes I could not figure out how to check in. Keeps asking me to book a room (which I have already done weeks before) and continues to open the browser to show web pages. Very bad, especially for such a large app (one of the largest to download). Doesn't worth your data download time and costs, not to mention storage space on the device. Better see a clerk instead

Terrible. I tried adding 2 trips to my profile using confirmation numbers and neither would work. I received an error message stating to call customer service. Now I'm in a 10 minute queue waiting to speak to a person. The Hilton app is far superior. Edit: app is still terrible. Mobile key does not work. When you press "call front desk" in the mobile key error screen you're connected to a call center - not the hotel front desk. Garbage app

Update 6/14/2020 I still hate this app. It won't let me select any city to search for rates. It's stays blank. So annoying ans frustrating. I hate the new update. Sometimes I can't see my existing reservations and when I do see them, I can't cancel them. I'm not getting all available hotels when I enter my dates which I know because I checked on a computer at the same time.

Fix it, this used to be good. But the past couple of versions....not so much. At first I thought it was just due to possible server issues. But then I installed the Apple version on my work phone and it works flawless, just like this version USED to. Not sure what changes they made or why they'd release versions that are so terrible, but here we are.

Doesn't work, had me call a number that was ran on voice recognition that was awful. When asking to speak with a representative it made me answer several questions, (multiple times because the system sucks) to finally talk with a person. That person could see my reservation with my confirmation #, but couldn't verify my multiple rooms. After confirming that yes we do have reservations (my cc showed over $3K), I was simply told ya sounds like the app isn't working. Don't waste your time!

Same issue as everyone else.... Unbelievable that you could get the same feedback from so many of us and still ignore the issue. Can't see my reservations, can't use the mobile key, can't even access the address of properties so I know where I'm going after I land. At least have the courage to tell us you're not going to fix the issues until the launch of the new app. This entire experience has been brutal since the SPG acquisition, I miss the SPG team.

This app is almost completely nonfunctional. Nothing ever loads, and on the few occasions anything does, it takes multiple minutes. It is literally less hassle to call the hotel to make reservations or request early check in or literally anything. Mobile key has never worked. Even when I check in on the app, I still have to check in at the hotel in person to get my room number. Everything on the home page is bloat - resort promotions that never change, etc. Absolutely horrible app experience.

Can't get into the gift card point redemption. Called into customer service & they said don't do it on the app it doesn't work, you need to do it on a computer. Well why is it on the app then!? So then i try to redeem gift cards on the computer like the customer service person said. Guess what it doesn't work either! Same problems as the app! You're asked to relog in, you need a verification code, get the code, enter code & same freaking error as the app! So im frustrated now &try to call

How does this have 4 stars? I recieved an email because I have an upcoming reservation to download the app to check in and get reminders when your room is ready, etc. Sounds awesome! Download app and nothing shows up, nor is there any way to enter a conf. number to maybe add it manually? Already deleted this worthless app that's really just a way to advertise and get you to sign up for some lame credit card. Again, 4 stars? Must be a lot of shills.

What happened??? The app was great, or at least I could actually use it, before this 'upgrade'. Now, nothing loads.... photos, hotel information, etc. I have a trip this weekend and I went to look at the dining options for this hotel. It's in a major city and I know they have a restaurant in the hotel. However, I could not find any information on any dining at all. When I clicked on the "+" sign next to dining nothing expands. Honestly that's one of many complaints I have with this app.

Most recent version is terrible. It is much slower than it used to be, it takes more menu changes to achieve the same tasks, and has less data immediately visible when you open it. Worst of all the mobile check-in simply does not work anymore and always says service unavailable. The old app worked great and I used to give it a high rating. What on earth possessed you to release an overhauled version that is ten steps backwards??

I hate the updated version of this app. Every time I try to use my Corp rate, it is not saved and doesn't even work. I called to complain but no one can fix the problem. I am able to get my Corp Rate if I sign in online so not sure what the problem is. The last version was more user friendly. Go back to it please. Don't make things more difficult and adding all of the extra insurance stuff all over making a reservation is aggregating. I've used the app for years with no problem until now.

Loved the app, but recent update showing buggy behaviors; while I am able to log into the app and interact with the booking feature, I am unable to actually confirm or book a stay - every attempt results in an error message that indicates that there was a problem but that I wasn't charged (sorry, I didn't get the error msg number). A few other observations are, as some users have called out, the disappearance of the 'chat with front desk' feature, and the fact that Mobile key no longer shows.

App will randomly sign you out (for 'security' purposes of course) then when trying to sign back in, will not accept the 6-digit code they themselves sent you for verification. Super clunky overall. I could imagine being in a really tough spot, absolutely NEEDING the app for information, and suddenly you're locked out due to a minor error in their login system. But companies are ok doing this, because what are you gonna do about it?

Well the app is big on pictures and hotel information. But the simple ability to select your reservation and display the names of everybody you have entered who will be staying at the hotel does not exist..... Really?? So if I use my points to book a room for somebody else, the only way for me to confirm that they're on the booking is to call member services. Good luck finding the number.

App is nice when it works. Lately, have not been able to add my trips. Everything I try to do in the app is buggy and does not work. Get text verification code to set up biometric login? I get the code texted but then it tells me it is incorrect. I know every user says they're typing credentials correctly, but this is what I do for a living, so I'm confident I did not muck this up 3 times. Fix your app. It's worthless

This new app is pure garbage. How a huge multi- national company allows their IT department to issue something like this is beyond me. I booked some activities under the hotel reservation. Payments were made, but no confirmations and record could be found. One terrible thing is no connection between Cruise Booking with Point, Hotel Booking and others are not consolidated into one website. Stupid website!

Update is terrible! When looking at dates with flexible dates I can see some nights have a lower rate than others, but when going to book, it seems the most expensive rate becomes the rate for all nights. In order to book the lower rates, you have to book separate reservations. What sense does that make?! It used to have a breakdown of the rates per night, but now is the same high rate each night. Making reservations is much more challenging now. Put it back to how it was!

With the new update, I can no longer type in my corporate code on the app. I have to use the desktop version for the rates. When I type it in the app, I press enter, and it just spins and spins, never updating. Then I hit apply and it only shows the"Lowest Regular Rate" option. Because of this, it makes the app somewhat useless to me, even as an Ambassador Elite. Unfortunate.

The application has fine features when you're able to log in. However, I have constant issues logging into the app. I have multiple times logged in and am told to immediately login again. This is after successfully logging in WITH a verification code. The fact that I'm able to successfully log in and then am told that I have to log in again and it doesn't work, is horrendously frustrating! I would have a much higher rating for this application if I could just log in. Still bad months later!

This app has gotten very buggy. I've noticed that it will crash if you switch to another app, and then back. For example, the app also does not work with password managers, so you have to copy paste the password from the password manager, but then the Marriott app crashes when you switch back. It crashes other times as well, so is just pretty horrible.

As many others have said, the app is buggy and completely UNSTABLE! I travel frequently for work and the app experience with mobile check-in and mobile room key are very much a deciding factor on what hotel I stay at. As of now, the app is useless if I run my device through an ad blocking DNS - the app crashes after ~7 seconds. If I turn off the ad blocking DNS, only half the features work. Everything I try and do pops an error telling me to call support.

Worked fine two weeks ago, using digital keys and checking in without issues. Last week, it just failed to work. It forgot I had been logged in, and then I couldn't log in, nothing worked. I could login to the website fine and book hotels, still. I restarted the app and phone multiple times without getting any better. So, I uninstalled it, then reinstalled it. It's a completely different app now. What version had I been using, and why didn't it prompt me to update when a new one was available?

The app made it seem like I could check in using the app. This did not work. I sat in the lobby for a while waiting for my room assignment and key. After about 30 minutes, I waited in line and checked in. 2 hours later, the key started working in the app, but it was inconsistent. Sometimes the key was there. When it was there, sometimes it worked on the door, other times nothing happened. It wasn't reliable enough for me to avoid carrying any other physical key with me.
